the book of mormon the book of mormon an account write by the hand of mormon upon plate take from the plate of nephi wherefore it be an abridgment of the record of the people of nephi and also of the lamanites write to the lamanites who be a remnant of the house of israel and also to jew and gentile write by way of commandment and also by the spirit of prophecy and of revelation write and seal up and hide up unto the lord that they might not be destroy to come forth by the gift and power of god unto the interpretation thereof seal by the hand of moroni and hide up unto the lord to come forth in due time by way of the gentile the interpretation thereof by the gift of god . an abridgment take from the book of ether also which be a record of the people of jar who be scatter at the time the lord confound the language of the people when they be build a tower to get to heaven which be to show unto the remnant of the house of israel what great thing the lord hath do for their father and that they may know the covenant of the lord that they be not cast off forever and also to the convincing of the jew and gentile that jesus be the christ the eternal god manifest himself unto all nation and now if there be fault they be the mistake of men wherefore condemn not the thing of god that ye may be find spotless at the judgment seat of christ . translate by joseph smith jun . the testimony of three witness be it know unto all nation kindred tongue and people unto whom this work shall come that we through the grace of god the father and our lord jesus christ have see the plate which contain this record which be a record of the people of nephi and also of the lamanites their brother and also of the people of jared who come from the tower of which hath be speak . and we also know that they have be translate by the gift and power of god for his voice hath declare it unto u wherefore we know of a surety that the work be true . and we also testify that we have see the engraving which be upon the plate and they have be show unto u by the power of god and not of man . and we declare with word of soberness that an angel of god come down from heaven and he bring and lay before our eye that we behold and saw the plate and the engraving thereon and we know that it be by the grace of god the father and our lord jesus christ that we behold and bear record that these thing be true . and it be marvelous in our eye . nevertheless the voice of the lord command u that we should bear record of it wherefore to be obedient unto the commandment of god we bear testimony of these thing . and we know that if we be faithful in christ we shall rid our garment of the blood of all men and be find spotless before the judgment seat of christ and shall dwell with him eternally in the heaven . and the honor be to the father and to the son and to the holy ghost which be one god . amen . oliver cowdery david whitmer martin harris the testimony of eight witness be it know unto all nation kindred tongue and people unto whom this work shall come that joseph smith jun . the translator of this work have show unto u the plate of which hath be speak which have the appearance of gold and a many of the leaf a the say smith have translate we do handle with our hand and we also saw the engraving thereon all of which have the appearance of ancient work and of curious workmanship . and this we bear record with word of soberness that the say smith have show unto u for we have see and heft and know of a surety that the say smith have get the plate of which we have speak . and we give our name unto the world to witness unto the world that which we have see . and we lie not god bear witness of it . christian whitmer jacob whitmer peter whitmer jun . john whitmer hiram page joseph smith sen. hyrum smith samuel h. smith the first book of nephi his reign and ministry nephi an account of lehi and his wife sariah and his four son be call beginning at the eldest laman lemuel sam and nephi . the lord warn lehi to depart out of the land of jerusalem because he prophesieth unto the people concern their iniquity and they seek to destroy his life . he taketh three day ' journey into the wilderness with his family . nephi taketh his brother and returneth to the land of jerusalem after the record of the jew . the account of their suffering . they take the daughter of ishmael to wife . they take their family and depart into the wilderness . their suffering and affliction in the wilderness . the course of their travel . they come to the large water . nephi 's brother rebel against him . he confoundeth them and buildeth a ship . they call the name of the place bountiful . they cross the large water into the promised land and so forth . this be accord to the account of nephi or in other word i nephi write this record . nephi chapter nephi i nephi have be bear of goodly parent therefore i be taught somewhat in all the learning of my father and have see many affliction in the course of my day nevertheless have be highly favor of the lord in all my day yea have have a great knowledge of the goodness and the mystery of god therefore i make a record of my proceeding in my day . nephi yea i make a record in the language of my father which consist of the learning of the jew and the language of the egyptian . nephi and i know that the record which i make be true and i make it with mine own hand and i make it accord to my knowledge . nephi for it come to pass in the commencement of the first year of the reign of zedekiah king of judah my father lehi have dwell at jerusalem in all his day and in that same year there come many prophet prophesy unto the people that they must repent or the great city jerusalem must be destroy . nephi wherefore it come to pass that my father lehi a he go forth pray unto the lord yea even with all his heart in behalf of his people . nephi and it come to pass a he pray unto the lord there come a pillar of fire and dwelt upon a rock before him and he saw and heard much and because of the thing which he saw and hear he do quake and tremble exceedingly . nephi and it come to pass that he return to his own house at jerusalem and he cast himself upon his bed be overcome with the spirit and the thing which he have see . nephi and be thus overcome with the spirit he be carry away in a vision even that he saw the heaven open and he think he saw god sit upon his throne surround with numberless concourse of angel in the attitude of singing and praise their god . nephi and it come to pass that he saw one descend out of the midst of heaven and he behold that his luster be above that of the sun at noon day . nephi and he also saw twelve others follow him and their brightness do exceed that of the star in the firmament . nephi and they come down and go forth upon the face of the earth and the first come and stand before my father and give unto him a book and bid him that he should read . nephi and it come to pass that a he read he be fill with the spirit of the lord . nephi and he read say wo wo unto jerusalem for i have see thine abomination ! yea and many thing do my father read concern jerusalem that it should be destroy and the inhabitant thereof many should perish by the sword and many should be carry away captive into babylon . nephi and it come to pass that when my father have read and see many great and marvelous thing he do exclaim many thing unto the lord such a great and marvelous be thy work o lord god almighty ! thy throne be high in the heaven and thy power and goodness and mercy be over all the inhabitant of the earth and because thou art merciful thou wilt not suffer those who come unto thee that they shall perish ! nephi and after this manner be the language of my father in the praising of his god for his soul do rejoice and his whole heart be fill because of the thing which he have see yea which the lord have show unto him . nephi and now i nephi do not make a full account of the thing which my father hath write for he hath write many thing which he saw in vision and in dream and he also hath write many thing which he prophesy and spake unto his child of which i shall not make a full account . nephi but i shall make an account of my proceeding in my day . behold i make an abridgment of the record of my father upon plate which i have make with mine own hand wherefore after i have abridge the record of my father then will i make an account of mine own life . nephi therefore i would that ye should know that after the lord have show so many marvelous thing unto my father lehi yea concern the destruction of jerusalem behold he go forth among the people and begin to prophesy and to declare unto them concern the thing which he have both see and hear . nephi and it come to pass that the jew do mock him because of the thing which he testify of them for he truly testify of their wickedness and their abomination and he testify that the thing which he saw and heard and also the thing which he read in the book manifest plainly of the come of the messiah and also the redemption of the world . nephi and when the jew hear these thing they be angry with him yea even a with the prophet of old whom they have cast out and stoned and slain and they also seek his life that they might take it away . but behold i nephi will show unto you that the tender mercy of the lord be over all those whom he hath chosen because of their faith to make them mighty even unto the power of deliverance . nephi chapter nephi for behold it come to pass that the lord spake unto my father yea even in a dream and say unto him bless art thou lehi because of the thing which thou hast do and because thou hast be faithful and declare unto this people the thing which i command thee behold they seek to take away thy life . nephi and it come to pass that the lord command my father even in a dream that he should take his family and depart into the wilderness . nephi and it come to pass that he be obedient unto the word of the lord wherefore he do a the lord command him . nephi and it come to pass that he depart into the wilderness . and he leave his house and the land of his inheritance and his gold and his silver and his precious thing and take nothing with him save it be his family and provision and tent and depart into the wilderness . nephi and he come down by the border near the shore of the red sea and he travel in the wilderness in the border which be nearer the red sea and he do travel in the wilderness with his family which consist of my mother sariah and my elder brother who be laman lemuel and sam . nephi and it come to pass that when he have travel three day in the wilderness he pitch his tent in a valley by the side of a river of water . nephi and it come to pass that he build an altar of stone and make an offering unto the lord and give thanks unto the lord our god . nephi and it come to pass that he call the name of the river laman and it empty into the red sea and the valley be in the border near the mouth thereof . nephi and when my father saw that the water of the river empty into the fountain of the red sea he spake unto laman say o that thou mightest be like unto this river continually run into the fountain of all righteousness ! nephi and he also spake unto lemuel o that thou mightest be like unto this valley firm and steadfast and immovable in keep the commandment of the lord ! nephi now this he spake because of the stiffneckedness of laman and lemuel for behold they do murmur in many thing against their father because he be a visionary man and have lead them out of the land of jerusalem to leave the land of their inheritance and their gold and their silver and their precious thing to perish in the wilderness . and this they say he have do because of the foolish imagination of his heart . nephi and thus laman and lemuel be the eldest do murmur against their father . and they do murmur because they know not the dealing of that god who have create them . nephi neither do they believe that jerusalem that great city could be destroy accord to the word of the prophet . and they be like unto the jew who be at jerusalem who seek to take away the life of my father . nephi and it come to pass that my father do speak unto them in the valley of lemuel with power be fill with the spirit until their frame do shake before him . and he do confound them that they durst not utter against him wherefore they do a he command them . nephi and my father dwelt in a tent . nephi and it come to pass that i nephi be exceedingly young nevertheless be large in stature and also have great desire to know of the mystery of god wherefore i do cry unto the lord and behold he do visit me and do soften my heart that i do believe all the word which have be speak by my father wherefore i do not rebel against him like unto my brother . nephi and i spake unto sam make know unto him the thing which the lord have manifest unto me by his holy spirit . and it come to pass that he believe in my word . nephi but behold laman and lemuel would not hearken unto my word and be grieve because of the hardness of their heart i cry unto the lord for them . nephi and it come to pass that the lord spake unto me say bless art thou nephi because of thy faith for thou hast seek me diligently with lowliness of heart . nephi and inasmuch a ye shall keep my commandment ye shall prosper and shall be lead to a land of promise yea even a land which i have prepare for you yea a land which be choice above all other land . nephi and inasmuch a thy brother shall rebel against thee they shall be cut off from the presence of the lord . nephi and inasmuch a thou shalt keep my commandment thou shalt be make a ruler and a teacher over thy brother . nephi for behold in that day that they shall rebel against me i will curse them even with a sore curse and they shall have no power over thy seed except they shall rebel against me also . nephi and if it so be that they rebel against me they shall be a scourge unto thy seed to stir them up in the way of remembrance . nephi chapter nephi and it come to pass that i nephi return from speak with the lord to the tent of my father . nephi and it come to pass that he spake unto me say behold i have dream a dream in the which the lord hath command me that thou and thy brother shall return to jerusalem . nephi for behold laban hath the record of the jew and also a genealogy of my forefather and they be engraven upon plate of brass . nephi wherefore the lord hath command me that thou and thy brother should go unto the house of laban and seek the record and bring them down hither into the wilderness . nephi and now behold thy brother murmur say it be a hard thing which i have require of them but behold i have not require it of them but it be a commandment of the lord . nephi therefore go my son and thou shalt be favor of the lord because thou hast not murmur . nephi and it come to pass that i nephi say unto my father i will go and do the thing which the lord hath command for i know that the lord giveth no commandment unto the child of men save he shall prepare a way for them that they may accomplish the thing which he commandeth them . nephi and it come to pass that when my father have hear these word he be exceedingly glad for he know that i have be bless of the lord . nephi and i nephi and my brother take our journey in the wilderness with our tent to go up to the land of jerusalem . nephi and it come to pass that when we have go up to the land of jerusalem i and my brother do consult one with another . nephi and we cast lot who of u should go in unto the house of laban . and it come to pass that the lot fell upon laman and laman go in unto the house of laban and he talk with him a he sit in his house . nephi and he desire of laban the record which be engraven upon the plate of brass which contain the genealogy of my father . nephi and behold it come to pass that laban be angry and thrust him out from his presence and he would not that he should have the record . wherefore he say unto him behold thou art a robber and i will slay thee . nephi but laman flee out of his presence and tell the thing which laban have do unto u . and we begin to be exceedingly sorrowful and my brother be about to return unto my father in the wilderness . nephi but behold i say unto them that a the lord liveth and a we live we will not go down unto our father in the wilderness until we have accomplish the thing which the lord hath command u . nephi wherefore let u be faithful in keep the commandment of the lord therefore let u go down to the land of our father 's inheritance for behold he leave gold and silver and all manner of rich . and all this he hath do because of the commandment of the lord . nephi for he know that jerusalem must be destroy because of the wickedness of the people . nephi for behold they have reject the word of the prophet . wherefore if my father should dwell in the land after he hath be command to flee out of the land behold he would also perish . wherefore it must needs be that he flee out of the land . nephi and behold it be wisdom in god that we should obtain these record that we may preserve unto our child the language of our father nephi and also that we may preserve unto them the word which have be speak by the mouth of all the holy prophet which have be deliver unto them by the spirit and power of god since the world begin even down unto this present time . nephi and it come to pass that after this manner of language do i persuade my brother that they might be faithful in keep the commandment of god . nephi and it come to pass that we go down to the land of our inheritance and we do gather together our gold and our silver and our precious thing . nephi and after we have gather these thing together we go up again unto the house of laban . nephi and it come to pass that we go in unto laban and desire him that he would give unto u the record which be engraven upon the plate of brass for which we would give unto him our gold and our silver and all our precious thing . nephi and it come to pass that when laban saw our property and that it be exceedingly great he do lust after it insomuch that he thrust u out and send his servant to slay u that he might obtain our property . nephi and it come to pass that we do flee before the servant of laban and we be oblige to leave behind our property and it fell into the hand of laban . nephi and it come to pass that we flee into the wilderness and the servant of laban do not overtake u and we hide ourselves in the cavity of a rock . nephi and it come to pass that laman be angry with me and also with my father and also be lemuel for he hearken unto the word of laman . wherefore laman and lemuel do speak many hard word unto u their young brother and they do smite u even with a rod . nephi and it come to pass a they smite u with a rod behold an angel of the lord come and stand before them and he spake unto them say why do ye smite your young brother with a rod ? know ye not that the lord hath choose him to be a ruler over you and this because of your iniquity ? behold ye shall go up to jerusalem again and the lord will deliver laban into your hand . nephi and after the angel have speak unto u he depart . nephi and after the angel have depart laman and lemuel again begin to murmur say how be it possible that the lord will deliver laban into our hand ? behold he be a mighty man and he can command fifty yea even he can slay fifty then why not u ? nephi chapter nephi and it come to pass that i spake unto my brother say let u go up again unto jerusalem and let u be faithful in keep the commandment of the lord for behold he be mighty than all the earth then why not mighty than laban and his fifty yea or even than his ten of thousand ? nephi therefore let u go up let u be strong like unto moses for he truly spake unto the water of the red sea and they divide hither and thither and our father come through out of captivity on dry ground and the army of pharaoh do follow and be drown in the water of the red sea . nephi now behold ye know that this be true and ye also know that an angel hath speak unto you wherefore can ye doubt ? let u go up the lord be able to deliver u even a our father and to destroy laban even a the egyptian . nephi now when i have speak these word they be yet wroth and do still continue to murmur nevertheless they do follow me up until we come without the wall of jerusalem . nephi and it be by night and i cause that they should hide themselves without the wall . and after they have hide themselves i nephi crept into the city and go forth towards the house of laban . nephi and i be lead by the spirit not know beforehand the thing which i should do . nephi nevertheless i go forth and a i come near unto the house of laban i behold a man and he have fall to the earth before me for he be drunken with wine . nephi and when i come to him i find that it be laban . nephi and i behold his sword and i draw it forth from the sheath thereof and the hilt thereof be of pure gold and the workmanship thereof be exceedingly fine and i saw that the blade thereof be of the most precious steel . nephi and it come to pass that i be constrain by the spirit that i should kill laban but i say in my heart never at any time have i shed the blood of man . and i shrunk and would that i might not slay him . nephi and the spirit say unto me again behold the lord hath deliver him into thy hand . yea and i also know that he have seek to take away mine own life yea and he would not hearken unto the commandment of the lord and he also have take away our property . nephi and it come to pass that the spirit say unto me again slay him for the lord hath deliver him into thy hand nephi behold the lord slayeth the wicked to bring forth his righteous purpose . it be well that one man should perish than that a nation should dwindle and perish in unbelief . nephi and now when i nephi have hear these word i remember the word of the lord which he spake unto me in the wilderness say that inasmuch a thy seed shall keep my commandment they shall prosper in the land of promise . nephi yea and i also think that they could not keep the commandment of the lord accord to the law of moses save they should have the law . nephi and i also know that the law be engraven upon the plate of brass . nephi and again i know that the lord have deliver laban into my hand for this cause that i might obtain the record accord to his commandment . nephi therefore i do obey the voice of the spirit and take laban by the hair of the head and i smite off his head with his own sword . nephi and after i have smite off his head with his own sword i take the garment of laban and put them upon mine own body yea even every whit and i do gird on his armor about my loin . nephi and after i have do this i go forth unto the treasury of laban . and a i go forth towards the treasury of laban behold i saw the servant of laban who have the key of the treasury . and i command him in the voice of laban that he should go with me into the treasury . nephi and he suppose me to be his master laban for he behold the garment and also the sword gird about my loin . nephi and he spake unto me concern the elder of the jew he know that his master laban have be out by night among them . nephi and i spake unto him a if it have be laban . nephi and i also spake unto him that i should carry the engraving which be upon the plate of brass to my elder brother who be without the wall . nephi and i also bid him that he should follow me . nephi and he suppose that i spake of the brother of the church and that i be truly that laban whom i have slay wherefore he do follow me . nephi and he spake unto me many time concern the elder of the jew a i go forth unto my brother who be without the wall . nephi and it come to pass that when laman saw me he be exceedingly frighten and also lemuel and sam . and they flee from before my presence for they suppose it be laban and that he have slay me and have seek to take away their life also . nephi and it come to pass that i call after them and they do hear me wherefore they do cease to flee from my presence . nephi and it come to pass that when the servant of laban beheld my brother he begin to tremble and be about to flee from before me and return to the city of jerusalem . nephi and now i nephi be a man large in stature and also have receive much strength of the lord therefore i do seize upon the servant of laban and hold him that he should not flee . nephi and it come to pass that i spake with him that if he would hearken unto my word a the lord liveth and a i live even so that if he would hearken unto our word we would spare his life . nephi and i spake unto him even with an oath that he need not fear that he should be a free man like unto u if he would go down in the wilderness with u . nephi and i also spake unto him say surely the lord hath command u to do this thing and shall we not be diligent in keep the commandment of the lord ? therefore if thou wilt go down into the wilderness to my father thou shalt have place with u . nephi and it come to pass that zoram do take courage at the word which i spake . now zoram be the name of the servant and he promise that he would go down into the wilderness unto our father . yea and he also make an oath unto u that he would tarry with u from that time forth . nephi now we be desirous that he should tarry with u for this cause that the jew might not know concern our flight into the wilderness l they should pursue u and destroy u . nephi and it come to pass that when zoram have make an oath unto u our fear do cease concern him . nephi and it come to pass that we take the plate of brass and the servant of laban and depart into the wilderness and journeyed unto the tent of our father . nephi chapter nephi and it come to pass that after we have come down into the wilderness unto our father behold he be fill with joy and also my mother sariah be exceedingly glad for she truly have mourn because of u . nephi for she have suppose that we have perish in the wilderness and she also have complain against my father tell him that he be a who be preserve by the hand of the lord that he might preserve his father jacob and all his household from perish with famine . nephi and they be also lead out of captivity and out of the land of egypt by that same god who have preserve them . nephi and thus my father lehi do discover the genealogy of his father . and laban also be a descendant of joseph wherefore he and his father have keep the record . nephi and now when my father saw all these thing he be fill with the spirit and begin to prophesy concern his seed nephi that these plate of brass should go forth unto all nation kindred tongue and people who be of his seed . nephi wherefore he say that these plate of brass should never perish neither should they be dim any more by time . and he prophesy many thing concern his seed . nephi and it come to pass that thus far i and my father have keep the commandment wherewith the lord have command u . nephi and we have obtain the record which the lord have command u and search them and find that they be desirable yea even of great worth unto u insomuch that we could preserve the commandment of the lord unto our child . nephi wherefore it be wisdom in the lord that we should carry them with u a we journey in the wilderness towards the land of promise . nephi chapter nephi and now i nephi do not give the genealogy of my father in this part of my record neither at any time shall i give it after upon these plate which i be write for it be give in the record which have be keep by my father wherefore i do not write it in this work . nephi for it sufficeth me to say that we be descendant of joseph . nephi and it mattereth not to me that i be particular to give a full account of all the thing of my father for they can not be write upon these plate for i desire the room that i may write of the thing of god . nephi for the fulness of mine intent be that i may persuade men to come unto the god of abraham and the god of isaac and the god of jacob and be save . nephi wherefore the thing which be please unto the world i do not write but the thing which be please unto god and unto those who be not of the world . nephi wherefore i shall give commandment unto my seed that they shall not occupy these plate with thing which be not of worth unto the child of men . nephi chapter nephi and now i would that ye might know that after my father lehi have make an end of prophesy concern his seed it come to pass that the lord spake unto him again say that it be not meet for him lehi that he should take his family into the wilderness alone but that his son should take daughter to wife that they might raise up seed unto the lord in the land of promise . nephi and it come to pass that the lord command him that i nephi and my brother should again return unto the land of jerusalem and bring down ishmael and his family into the wilderness . nephi and it come to pass that i nephi do again with my brother go forth into the wilderness to go up to jerusalem . nephi and it come to pass that we go up unto the house of ishmael and we do gain favor in the sight of ishmael insomuch that we do speak unto him the word of the lord . nephi and it come to pass that the lord that i your young brother should speak unto you yea and set an example for you ? nephi how be it that ye have not hearken unto the word of the lord ? nephi how be it that ye have forget that ye have yea and how be it that ye have forget that the lord be able to do all thing accord to his will for the child of men if it so be that they exercise faith in him ? wherefore let u be faithful to him . nephi and if it so be that we be faithful to him we shall obtain the land of promise and ye shall know at some future period that the word of the lord shall be fulfil concern the destruction of jerusalem for all thing which the lord hath speak concern the destruction of jerusalem must be fulfil . nephi for behold the spirit of the lord ceaseth soon to strive with them for behold they have reject the prophet and jeremiah have they cast into prison . and they have seek to take away the life of my father insomuch that they have drive him out of the land . nephi now behold i say unto you that if ye will return unto jerusalem ye shall also perish with them . and now if ye have choice go up to the land and remember the word which i speak unto you that if ye go ye will also perish for thus the spirit of the lord constraineth me that i should speak . nephi and it come to pass that when i nephi have speak these word unto my brother they be angry with me . and it come to pass that they do lay their hand upon me for behold they be exceedingly wroth and they do bind me with cord for they seek to take away my life that they might leave me in the wilderness to be devour by wild beast . nephi but it come to pass that i pray unto the lord say o lord accord to my faith which be in thee wilt thou deliver me from the hand of my brother yea even give me strength that i may burst these band with which i be bound . nephi and it come to pass that when i have say these word behold the band be loose from off my hand and foot and i stood before my brother and i spake unto them again . nephi and it come to pass that they be angry with me again and seek to lay hand upon me but behold one of the daughter of ishmael yea and also her mother and one of the son of ishmael do plead with my brother insomuch that they do soften their heart and they do cease striving to take away my life . nephi and it come to pass that they be sorrowful because of their wickedness insomuch that they do bow down before me and do plead with me that i would forgive them of the thing that they have do against me . nephi and it come to pass that i do frankly forgive them all that they have do and i do exhort them that they would pray unto the lord their god for forgiveness . and it come to pass that they do so . and after they have do pray unto the lord we do again travel on our journey towards the tent of our father . nephi and it come to pass that we do come down unto the tent of our father . and after i and my brother and all the house of ishmael have come down unto the tent of my father they do give thanks unto the lord their god and they do offer sacrifice and burnt offering unto him . nephi chapter nephi and it come to pass that we have gather together all manner of seed of every kind both of grain of every kind and also of the seed of fruit of every kind . nephi and it come to pass that while my father tarry in the wilderness he spake unto u say behold i have dream a dream or in other word i have see a vision . nephi and behold because of the thing which i have see i have reason to rejoice in the lord because of nephi and also of sam for i have reason to suppose that they and also many of their seed will be save . nephi but behold laman and lemuel i fear exceedingly because of you for behold methought i saw in my dream a dark and dreary wilderness . nephi and it come to pass that i saw a man and he be dress in a white robe and he come and stand before me . nephi and it come to pass that he spake unto me and bid me follow him . nephi and it come to pass that a i follow him i behold myself that i be in a dark and dreary waste . nephi and after i have travel for the space of many hour in darkness i begin to pray unto the lord that he would have mercy on me accord to the multitude of his tender mercy . nephi and it come to pass after i have pray unto the lord i behold a large and spacious field . nephi and it come to pass that i behold a tree whose fruit be desirable to make one happy . nephi and it come to pass that i do go forth and partake of the fruit thereof and i beheld that it be most sweet above all that i ever before taste . yea and i beheld that the fruit thereof be white to exceed all the whiteness that i have ever see . nephi and a i partook of the fruit thereof it fill my soul with exceedingly great joy wherefore i begin to be desirous that my family should partake of it also for i know that it be desirable above all other fruit . nephi and a i cast my eye round about that perhaps i might discover my family also i behold a river of water and it run along and it be near the tree of which i be partake the fruit . nephi and i look to behold from whence it come and i saw the head thereof a little way off and at the head thereof i behold your mother sariah and sam and nephi and they stand a if they know not whither they should go . nephi and it come to pass that i beckon unto them and i also do say unto them with a loud voice that they should come unto me and partake of the fruit which be desirable above all other fruit . nephi and it come to pass that they do come unto me and partake of the fruit also . nephi and it come to pass that i be desirous that laman and lemuel should come and partake of the fruit also wherefore i cast mine eye towards the head of the river that perhaps i might see them . nephi and it come to pass that i saw them but they would not come unto me and partake of the fruit . nephi and i behold a rod of iron and it extend along the bank of the river and lead to the tree by which i stand . nephi and i also behold a strait and narrow path which come along by the rod of iron even to the tree by which i stand and it also lead by the head of the fountain unto a large and spacious field a if it have be a world . nephi and i saw numberless concourse of people many of whom be press forward that they might obtain the path which lead unto the tree by which i stand . nephi and it come to pass that they do come forth and commence in the path which lead to the tree . nephi and it come to pass that there arise a mist of darkness yea even an exceedingly great mist of darkness insomuch that they who have commence in the path do lose their way that they wander off and be lose . nephi and it come to pass that i behold others press forward and they come forth and catch hold of the end of the rod of iron and they do press forward through the mist of darkness cling to the rod of iron even until they do come forth and partake of the fruit of the tree . nephi and after they have partake of the fruit of the tree they do cast their eye about a if they be ashamed . nephi and i also cast my eye round about and behold on the other side of the river of water a great and spacious building and it stand a it be in the air high above the earth . nephi and it be fill with people both old and young both male and female and their manner of dress be exceedingly fine and they be in the attitude of mocking and point their finger towards those who have come at and be partake of the fruit . nephi and after they have taste of the fruit they be ashamed because of those that be scoff at them and they fell away into forbidden path and be lose . nephi and now i nephi do not speak all the word of my father . nephi but to be short in write behold he saw other multitude press forward and they come and catch hold of the end of the rod of iron and they do press their way forward continually hold fast to the rod of iron until they come forth and fell down and partook of the fruit of the tree . nephi and he also saw other multitude feel their way towards that great and spacious building . nephi and it come to pass that many be drown in the depth of the fountain and many be lose from his view wander in strange road . nephi and great be the multitude that do enter into that strange building . and after they do enter into that building they do point the finger of scorn at me and those that be partake of the fruit also but we heed them not . nephi these be the word of my father for as many a heeded them have fall away . nephi and laman and lemuel partook not of the fruit say my father . nephi and it come to pas after my father have speak all the word of his dream or vision which be many he say unto u because of these thing which he saw in a vision he exceedingly fear for laman and lemuel yea he fear l they should be cast off from the presence of the lord . nephi and he do exhort them then with all the feeling of a tender parent that they would hearken to his word that perhaps the lord would be merciful to them and not cast them off yea my father do preach unto them . nephi and after he have preach unto them and also prophesy unto them of many thing he bid them to keep the commandment of the lord and he do cease speaking unto them . nephi chapter nephi and all these thing do my father see and hear and speak a he dwell in a tent in the valley of lemuel and also a great many more thing which can not be write upon these plate . nephi and now a i have speak concern these plate behold they be not the plate upon which i make a full account of the history of my people for the plate upon which i make a full account of my people i have give the name of nephi wherefore they be call the plate of nephi after mine own name and these plate also be call the plate of nephi . nephi nevertheless i have receive a commandment of the lord that i should make these plate for the special purpose that there should be an account engraven of the ministry of my people . nephi upon the other plate should be engraven an account of the reign of the king and the war and contention of my people wherefore these plate be for the more part of the ministry and the other plate be for the more part of the reign of the king and the war and contention of my people . nephi wherefore the lord hath command me to make these plate for a wise purpose in him which purpose i know not . nephi but the lord knoweth all thing from the beginning wherefore he prepareth a way to accomplish all his work among the child of men for behold he hath all power unto the fulfilling of all his word . and thus it be . amen . nephi chapter nephi and now i nephi proceed to give an account upon these plate of my proceeding and my reign and ministry wherefore to proceed with mine account i must speak somewhat of the thing of my father and also of my brother . nephi for behold it come to pas after my father have make an end of speak the word of his dream and also of exhort them to all diligence he spake unto them concern the jew nephi that after they should be destroy even that great city jerusalem and many be carry away captive into babylon accord to the own due time of the lord they should return again yea even be bring back out of captivity and after they should be bring back out of captivity they should possess again the land of their inheritance . nephi yea even six hundred year from the time that my father leave jerusalem a prophet would the lord god raise up among the jew even a messiah or in other word a savior of the world . nephi and he also spake concern the prophet how great a number have testify of these thing concern this messiah of whom he have speak or this redeemer of the world . nephi wherefore all mankind be in a lost and in a fallen state and ever would be save they should rely on this redeemer . nephi and he spake also concern a prophet who should come before the messiah to prepare the way of the lord nephi yea even he should go forth and cry in the wilderness prepare ye the way of the lord and make his path straight for there standeth one among you whom ye know not and he be mighty than i whose shoe 's latchet i be not worthy to the messiah with water . nephi and after he have baptize the messiah with water he should behold and bear record that he have baptize the lamb of god who should take away the sin of the world . nephi and it come to pas after my father have speak these word he spake unto my brother concern the gospel which should be preach among the jew and also concern the dwindling of the jew in unbelief . and after they have slay the messiah who should come and after he have be slain he should rise from the dead and should make himself manifest by the holy ghost unto the gentile . nephi yea even my father spake much concern the gentile and also concern the house of israel that they should be compare like unto an olive tree whose branch should be break off and should be scatter upon all the face of the of the earth . nephi and after the house of israel should be scatter they should be gather together again or in fine after the gentile have receive the fulness of the gospel the natural branch of the . nephi for he that diligently seeketh shall find and the mystery of god shall be unfold unto them by the power of the holy ghost as well in these time a in time of old and as well in time of old a in wickedly in the day of your probation then ye be find unclean before the judgment seat of god and no unclean thing can dwell with god wherefore ye must be cast off forever . nephi and the holy ghost giveth authority that i should speak these thing and deny them not . nephi chapter nephi for it come to pass after i have desire to know the thing that my father have see and believe that the lord be nephi chapter nephi and now my beloved brother i have read these thing that ye might know concern the covenant of the lord that he have covenant with all the house of israel nephi that he have speak repent be the covenant people of the lord and a many of the jew a will not repent shall be cast off for the lord covenanteth with none save it be with them that repent and believe in his son who be the holy one of israel . nephi and now i would prophesy somewhat more concern the jew and the gentile . for after the book of which i have speak shall come forth and be write unto the gentile and seal up again unto the lord there shall be many which shall believe the word which be write and they shall carry them forth unto the remnant of our seed . nephi and then shall the remnant of our seed know concern u how that we come out from jerusalem and that they be descendant of the jew . nephi and the gospel of jesus christ shall be declare among them wherefore they shall be restore unto the knowledge of their father and also to the knowledge of jesus christ which be have among their father . nephi and then shall they rejoice for they shall know that it be a bless unto them from the hand delightsome people . nephi and it shall come to pass that the lord god shall commence his work among all nation kindred tongue and people to bring about the restoration of his people upon the earth . nephi and with righteousness shall the lord god judge the poor and reprove with equity for the meek of the earth . and he shall smite the earth with the rod of his mouth and with the breath of his lip shall he slay the wicked . nephi for the time speedily cometh that the lord god shall cause a great division among the people and the wicked will he destroy and he will spare his people yea even if it so be that he must destroy the wicked by fire . nephi and righteousness shall be the girdle of his loin and faithfulness the girdle of his rein . nephi and then shall the wolf dwell with the lamb and the leopard shall lie down with the kid and the calf and the young lion and the fatling together and a little child shall lead them . nephi and the cow and the bear shall fee their young one shall lie down together and the lion shall eat straw like the ox . nephi and the sucking child shall play on the hole of the asp and the weaned child shall put his hand on the cockatrice 's den . nephi they shall not hurt nor destroy in all my holy mountain for the earth shall be full of the knowledge of the lord a the water cover the sea . nephi wherefore the thing of all nation shall be make know yea all thing shall be make know unto the child of men . nephi there be nothing which be secret save it shall be reveal there be no work of darkness save it shall be make manifest in the light and there be nothing which be seal upon the earth save it shall be loose . nephi wherefore all thing which have be reveal unto the child of men shall at that day be reveal and satan shall have power over the heart of the child of men no more for a long time . and now my beloved brother i make an end of my saying . nephi chapter nephi and now i nephi make an end of my prophesy unto you my beloved brother . nephi and now i would ask of you my beloved brother wherein the lamb of god do fulfil all righteousness in be baptize by water ? nephi know ye not that he be holy ? but notwithstanding he be holy he showeth unto the child of men that accord to the flesh he humbleth himself before the father and witnesseth unto the father that he would be obedient unto him in keep his commandment . nephi wherefore mighty to save . nephi wherefore ye must press forward with a steadfastness in christ have a perfect brightness of hope and a love of god and of all men . wherefore if ye shall press forward feast give under heaven whereby man can be save in the kingdom of god . and now behold this be the doctrine of christ and the only and true doctrine of the father and of the son and of the holy ghost which also . and they be exceedingly more numerous than be they of the nephites and they love murder and would drink the blood of beast . jarom and it come to pass that they come many time against u the nephites to battle . but our king and our leader be mighty men in the faith of the lord and they teach the people the way of the lord wherefore we withstand the lamanites and sweep them away out of our land and begin to fortify our city or whatsoever place of our inheritance . jarom and we multiply exceedingly and spread upon the face of the land and become exceedingly rich in gold and in silver be unquenchable and whose smoke ascendeth up forever and ever . thus hath the lord command me . amen . mosiah chapter mosiah and now it come to pass that when king benjamin have make an end of speak mosiah and they have view themselves in their own carnal state even less than the dust of the earth . and they all cry aloud with one voice say o have mercy and apply the atone blood of christ that we testimony against you . and if ye slay me ye will shed innocent blood and this shall also stand a a testimony against you at the last day . mosiah and now king noah be about to release him for he fear his word for he fear that the judgment of god would come upon him . mosiah but the priest lift up their voice against him and begin to accuse him say he have revile the king . therefore the king be stir up in anger against him and he deliver him up that he might be slay . mosiah and it come to pass that they take him and bind him and scourge his skin with faggot yea even unto death . mosiah and now when the flame begin to scorch him he cry unto them say mosiah behold even a ye have do unto me so shall it come to pass that thy seed shall cause that many shall suffer the pain that i do suffer even the pain of death by fire and this because they believe in the salvation of the lord their god . mosiah and it will come to pass that ye shall be afflict with all manner of disease because of your iniquity . mosiah yea and ye shall be smite on every hand and shall be drive and scatter to and fro even a a wild flock be drive by wild and ferocious beast . mosiah and in that day ye shall be hunt and ye shall be take by the hand of your enemy and then ye shall suffer a i suffer the pain of death by fire . mosiah thus god executeth vengeance upon those that destroy his people . o god receive my soul . mosiah and now when abinadi have say these word he fell have suffer death by fire yea have be put to death because he would not deny the commandment of god have seal the truth of his word by his death . mosiah chapter mosiah and now it come to pass that alma who have flee from the servant of king noah repent of his sin and iniquity and go about privately among the people and begin to teach the word of abinadi mosiah yea concern that which be to come and also concern the resurrection of the dead and the redemption of the people which be to be bring to pass through the power and suffering and death of christ and his resurrection and ascension into heaven . mosiah and as many a would hear his word he do teach . and he teach them privately that it might not come to the knowledge of the king . and many do believe his word . mosiah and it come to pass that as many a do believe him do go forth to a place which be call mormon have receive it name from the king be in the border of the land have be infest by time or at season by wild beast . mosiah now there be in mormon a fountain of pure water and alma resort thither there be near the water a thicket of small tree where he do hide himself in the daytime from the search of the king . mosiah and it come to pass that as many a believe him go thither to hear his word . mosiah and it come to pass after many day there be a goodly number gather together at the place of mormon to hear the word of alma . yea all be gather together that believe on his word to hear him . and he do teach them and do preach unto them repentance and redemption and faith on the lord . mosiah and it come to pass that he say unto them behold here be the water of mormon for thus be they call and now a ye be desirous to come into the fold of god and to be call his people and be willing to bear one another 's burden that they may be light mosiah yea and be willing to mourn with those that mourn yea and comfort those that stand in need of comfort and to stand a witness of god at all time and in all thing and in all place that ye may be in even until death that ye may be redeem of god and be number with those of the first resurrection that ye may have eternal life mosiah now i say unto you if this be the desire of your heart what have you against be baptize in the name of the lord a a witness before him that ye have enter into a covenant with him that ye will serve him and keep his commandment that he may pour out his spirit more abundantly upon you ? mosiah and now when the people have hear these word they clap their hand for joy and exclaim this be the desire of our heart . mosiah and now it come to pass that alma take helam he be one of the first and go and stand forth in the water and cry say o lord pour out thy spirit upon thy servant that he may do this work with holiness of heart . mosiah and when he have say these word the spirit of the lord be upon him and he say helam i baptize thee have authority from the almighty god a a testimony that ye have enter into a covenant to serve him until you be dead a to the mortal body and may the spirit of the lord be pour out upon you and may he grant unto you eternal life through the redemption of christ whom he have prepare from the foundation of the world . mosiah and after alma have say these word both alma and helam be bury in the water and they arise and come forth out of the water rejoice be fill with the spirit . mosiah and again alma take another and go forth a second time into the water and baptize him accord to the first only he do not bury himself again in the water . mosiah and after this manner he do baptize every one that go forth to the place of mormon and they be in number about two hundred and four soul yea and they be baptize in the water of mormon and be fill with the grace of god . mosiah and they be call the church of god or the church of christ from that time forward . and it come to pass that whosoever be baptize by the power and authority of god be add to his church . mosiah and it come to pass that alma have authority from god ordain priest even one priest to every fifty of their number do he ordain to preach unto them and to teach them concern the thing pertain to the kingdom of god . mosiah and he command them that they should teach nothing save it be the thing which he have teach and which have be speak by the mouth of the holy prophet . mosiah yea even he command them that they should preach nothing save it be repentance and faith on the lord who have redeem his people . mosiah and he command them that there should be no contention one with another but that they should look forward with one eye have one faith and one baptism have their heart knit together in unity and in love one towards another . mosiah and thus he command them to preach . and thus they become the child of god . mosiah and he command them that they should observe the sabbath day and keep it holy and also every day they should give thanks to the lord their god . mosiah and he also command them that the priest whom he have ordain should labor with their own hand for their support . mosiah and there be one day in every week that be set apart that they should gather themselves together to teach the people and to worship the lord their god and also as often a it be in their power to assemble themselves together . mosiah and the priest be not to depend upon the people for their support but for their labor they be to receive the grace of god that they might wax strong in the spirit have the knowledge of god that they might teach with power and authority from god . mosiah and again alma command that the people of the church should impart of their substance every one accord to that which he have if he have more abundantly he should impart more abundantly and of him that have but little but little should be require and to him that have not should be give . mosiah and thus they should impart of their substance of their own free will and good desire towards god and to those priest that stand in need yea and to every needy naked soul . mosiah and this he say unto them have be command of god and they do walk uprightly before god impart to one another both temporally and spiritually accord to their need and their want . mosiah and now it come to pass that all this be do in mormon yea by the water of mormon in the forest that be near the water of mormon yea the place of mormon the water of mormon the forest of mormon how beautiful be they to the eye of them who there come to the knowledge of their redeemer yea and how bless be they for they shall sing to his praise forever . mosiah and these thing be do in the border of the land that they might not come to the knowledge of the king . mosiah but behold it come to pass that the king have discover a movement among the people send his servant to watch them . therefore on the day that they be assemble themselves together to hear the word of the lord they be discover unto the king . mosiah and now the king say that alma be stir up the people to rebellion against him therefore he send his army to destroy them . mosiah and it come to pass that alma and the people of the lord be apprise of the come of the king 's army therefore they take their tent and their family and depart into the wilderness . mosiah and they be in number about four hundred and fifty soul . mosiah chapter mosiah and it come to pass that the army of the king return have search in vain for the people of the lord . mosiah and now behold the force of the king be small have be reduce and there begin to be a division among the remainder of the people . mosiah and the less part begin to breathe out threatenings against the king and there begin to be a great contention among them . mosiah and now there be a man among them whose name be gideon and he be a strong man and an enemy to the king therefore he draw his sword and swore in his wrath that he would slay the king . mosiah and it come to pass that he fight with the king and when the king saw that he be about to overpower him he flee and run and get upon the tower which be near the temple . mosiah and gideon pursue after him and be about to get upon the tower to slay the king and the king cast his eye round about towards the land of shemlon and behold the army of the lamanites be within the border of the land . mosiah and now the king cry out in the anguish of his soul say gideon spare me for the lamanites be upon u and they will destroy u yea they will destroy my people . mosiah and now the king be not so much concern about his people a he be about his own life nevertheless gideon do spare his life . mosiah and the king command the people that they should flee before the lamanites and he himself do go before them and they do flee into the wilderness with their woman and their child . mosiah and it come to pass that the lamanites do pursue them and do overtake them and begin to slay them . mosiah now it come to pass that the king command them that all the men should leave their wife and their child and flee before the lamanites . mosiah now there be many that would not leave them but have rather stay and perish with them . and the rest leave their wife and their child and flee . mosiah and it come to pass that those who tarry with their wife and their child cause that their fair daughter should stand forth and plead with the lamanites that they would not slay them . mosiah and it come to pass that the lamanites have compassion on them for they be charm with the beauty of their woman . mosiah therefore the lamanites do spare their life and take them captive and carry them back to the land of nephi and grant unto them that they might possess the land under the condition that they would deliver up king noah into the hand of the lamanites and deliver up their property even one half of all they possess one half of their gold and their silver and all their precious thing and thus they should pay tribute to the king of the lamanites from year to year . mosiah and now there be one of the son of the king among those that be take captive whose name be limhi . mosiah and now limhi be desirous that his father should not be destroy nevertheless limhi be not ignorant of the iniquity of his father he himself be a just man . mosiah and it come to pass that gideon send men into the wilderness secretly to search for the king and those that be with him . and it come to pass that they meet the people in the wilderness all save the king and his priest . mosiah now they have swear in their heart that they would return to the land of nephi and if their wife and their child be slain and also those that have tarry with them that they would seek revenge and also perish with them . mosiah and the king command them that they should not return and they be angry with the king and cause that he should suffer even unto death by fire . mosiah and they be about to take the priest also and put them to death and they flee before them . mosiah and it come to pass that they be about to return to the land of nephi and they meet the men of gideon . and the men of gideon tell them of all that have happen to their wife and their child and that the lamanites have grant unto them that they might possess the land by pay a tribute to the lamanites of one half of all they possess . mosiah and the people tell the men of gideon that they have slay the king and his priest have flee from them far into the wilderness . mosiah and it come to pass that after they have end the ceremony that they return to the land of nephi rejoicing because their wife and their child be not slay and they tell gideon what they have do to the king . mosiah and it come to pass that the king of the lamanites make an oath unto them that his people should not slay them . mosiah and also limhi be the son of the king have the kingdom confer upon him by the people make oath unto the king of the lamanites that his people should pay tribute unto him even one half of all they possess . mosiah and it come to pass that limhi begin to establish the kingdom and to establish peace among his people . mosiah and the king of the lamanites set guard round about the land that he might keep the people of limhi in the land that they might not depart into the wilderness and he do support his guard out of the tribute which he do receive from the nephites . mosiah and now king limhi do have continual peace in his kingdom for the space of two year that the lamanites do not molest them nor seek to destroy them . mosiah chapter mosiah now there be a place in shemlon where the daughter of the lamanites do gather themselves together to sing and to dance and to make themselves merry . mosiah and it come to pass that there be one day a small number of them gather together to sing and to dance . mosiah and now the priest of king noah be ashamed to return to the city of nephi yea and also fear that the people would slay them therefore they durst not return to their wife and their child . mosiah and have tarry in the wilderness and have discover the daughter of the lamanites they lay and watch them mosiah and when there be but few of them gather together to dance they come forth out of their secret place and take them and carry them into the wilderness yea twenty and four of the daughter of the lamanites they carry into the wilderness . mosiah and it come to pass that when the lamanites find that their daughter have be miss they be angry with the people of limhi for they think it be the people of limhi . mosiah therefore they send their army forth yea even the king himself go before his people and they go up to the land of nephi to destroy the people of limhi . mosiah and now limhi have discover them from the tower even all their preparation for war do he discover therefore he gather his people together and laid wait for them in the field and in the forest . mosiah and it come to pass that when the lamanites have come up that the people of limhi begin to fall upon them from their waiting place and begin to slay them . mosiah and it come to pass that the battle become exceedingly sore for they fight like lion for their prey . mosiah and it come to pass that the people of limhi begin to drive the lamanites before them yet they be not half so numerous a the lamanites . but they fight for their life and for their wife and for their child therefore they exert themselves and like dragon do they fight . mosiah and it come to pass that they find the king of the lamanites among the number of their dead yet he be not dead have be wound and leave upon the ground so speedy be the flight of his people . mosiah and they take him and bind up his wound and bring him before limhi and say behold here be the king of the lamanites he have receive a wound have fall among their dead and they have leave him and behold we have bring him before you and now let u slay him . mosiah but limhi say unto them ye shall not slay him but bring him hither that i may see him . and they bring him . and limhi say unto him what cause have ye to come up to war against my people ? behold my people have not break the oath that i make unto you therefore why should ye break the oath which ye make unto my people ? mosiah and now the king say i have break the oath because thy people do carry away the daughter of my people therefore in my anger i do cause my people to come up to war against thy people . mosiah and now limhi have hear nothing concern this matter therefore he say i will search among my people and whosoever have do this thing shall perish . therefore he cause a search to be make among his people . mosiah now when gideon have hear these thing he be the king 's captain he go forth and say unto the king i pray thee forbear and do not search this people and lay not this thing to their charge . mosiah for do ye not remember the priest of thy father whom this people seek to destroy ? and be they not in the wilderness ? and be not they the one who have steal the daughter of the lamanites ? mosiah and now behold and tell the king of these thing that he may tell his people that they may be pacify towards u for behold they be already prepare to come against u and behold also there be but few of u . mosiah and behold they come with their numerous host and except the king doth pacify them towards u we must perish . mosiah for be not the word of abinadi fulfil which he prophesy against u and all this because we would not hearken unto the word of the lord and turn from our iniquity ? mosiah and now let u pacify the king and we fulfil the oath which we have make unto him for it be well that we should be in bondage than that we should lose our life therefore let u put a stop to the shedding of so much blood . mosiah and now limhi tell the king all the thing concern his father and the priest that have flee into the wilderness and attribute the carry away of their daughter to them . mosiah and it come to pass that the king be pacify towards his people and he say unto them let u go forth to meet my people without arm and i swear unto you with an oath that my people shall not slay thy people . mosiah and it come to pass that they follow the king and go forth without arm to meet the lamanites . and it come to pass that they do meet the lamanites and the king of the lamanites do bow himself down before them and do plead in behalf of the people of limhi . mosiah and when the lamanites saw the people of limhi that they be without arm they have compassion on them and be pacify towards them and return with their king in peace to their own land . mosiah chapter mosiah and it come to pass that limhi and his people return to the city of nephi and begin to dwell in the land again in peace . mosiah and it come to pass that after many day the lamanites begin again to be stir up in anger against the nephites and they begin to come into the border of the land round about . mosiah now they durst not slay them because of the oath which their king have make unto limhi but they would smite them on their cheek and exercise authority over them and begin to put heavy burden upon their back and drive them a they would a dumb as mosiah yea all this be do that the word of the lord might be fulfil . mosiah and now the affliction of the nephites be great and there be no way that they could deliver themselves out of their hand for the lamanites have surround them on every side . mosiah and it come to pass that the people begin to murmur with the king because of their affliction and they begin to be desirous to go against them to battle . and they do afflict the king sorely with their complaint therefore he grant unto them that they should do accord to their desire . mosiah and they gather themselves together again and put on their armor and go forth against the lamanites to drive them out of their land . mosiah and it come to pass that the lamanites do beat them and drive them back and slew many of them . mosiah and now there be a great mourning and lamentation among the people of limhi the widow mourning for her husband the son and the daughter mourn for their father and the brother for their brother . mosiah now there be a great many widow in the land and they do cry mightily from day to day for a great fear of the lamanites have come upon them . mosiah and it come to pass that their continual cry do stir up the remainder of the people of limhi to anger against the lamanites and they go again to battle but they be drive back again suffer much loss . mosiah yea they go again even the third time and suffer in the like manner and those that be not slay return again to the city of nephi . mosiah and they do humble themselves even to the dust subject themselves to the yoke of bondage submit themselves to be smite and to be drive to and fro and burden accord to the desire of their enemy . mosiah and they do humble themselves even in the depth of humility and they do cry mightily to god yea even all the day long do they cry unto their god that he would deliver them out of their affliction . mosiah and now the lord be slow to hear their cry because of their iniquity nevertheless the lord do hear their cry and begin to soften the heart of the lamanites that they begin to ease their burden yet the lord do not see fit to deliver them out of bondage . mosiah and it come to pass that they begin to prosper by degree in the land and begin to raise grain more abundantly and flock and herd that they do not suffer with hunger . mosiah now there be a great number of woman more than there be of men therefore king limhi command that every man should impart to the support of the widow and their child that they might not perish with hunger and this they do because of the greatness of their number that have be slay . mosiah now the people of limhi kept together in a body as much a it be possible and secure their grain and their flock mosiah and the king himself do not trust his person without the wall of the city unless he take his guard with him fear that he might by some mean fall into the hand of the lamanites . mosiah and he cause that his people should watch the land round about that by some mean they might take those priest that flee into the wilderness who have steal the daughter of the lamanites and that have cause such a great destruction to come upon them . mosiah for they be desirous to take them that they might punish them for they have come into the land of nephi by night and carry off their grain and many of their precious thing therefore they lay wait for them . mosiah and it come to pass that there be no more disturbance between the lamanites and the people of limhi even until the time that ammon and his brother come into the land . mosiah and the king have be without the gate of the city with his guard discover ammon and his brother and suppose them to be priest of noah therefore he cause that they should be take and bind and cast into prison . and have they be the priest of noah he would have cause that they should be put to death . mosiah but when he find that they be not but that they be his brother and have come from the land of zarahemla he be fill with exceedingly great joy . mosiah now king limhi have send previous to the come of ammon a small number of men to search for the land of zarahemla but they could not find it and they be lose in the wilderness . mosiah nevertheless they do find a land which have be people yea a land which be cover with dry bone yea a land which have be people and which have be destroy and they have suppose it to be the land of zarahemla return to the land of nephi have arrive in the border of the land not many day before the come of ammon . mosiah and they bring a record with them even a record of the people whose bone they have find and it be engraven on plate of ore. mosiah and now limhi be again fill with joy in learn from the mouth of ammon that king mosiah have a gift from god whereby he could interpret such engraving yea and ammon also do rejoice . mosiah yet ammon and his brother be fill with sorrow because so many of their brother have be slay mosiah and also that king noah and his priest have cause the people to commit so many sin and iniquity against god and they also do mourn for the death of abinadi and also for the departure of alma and the people that go with him who have form a church of god through the strength and power of god and faith on the word which have be speak by abinadi . mosiah yea they do mourn for their departure for they know not whither they have flee . now they would have gladly join with them for they themselves have enter into a covenant with god to serve him and keep his commandment . mosiah and now since the come of ammon king limhi have also enter into a covenant with god and also many of his people to serve him and keep his commandment . mosiah and it come to pass that king limhi and many of his people be desirous to be baptize but there be none in the land that have authority from god . and ammon decline do this thing consider himself an unworthy servant . mosiah therefore they do not at that time form themselves into a church wait upon the spirit of the lord . now they be desirous to become even a alma and his brother who have flee into the wilderness . mosiah they be desirous to be baptize a a witness and a testimony that they be willing to serve god with all their heart nevertheless they do prolong the time and an account of their baptism shall be give hereafter . mosiah and now all the study of ammon and his people and king limhi and his people be to deliver themselves out of the hand of the lamanites and from bondage . mosiah chapter mosiah and now it come to pass that ammon and king limhi begin to consult with the people how they should deliver themselves out of bondage and even they do cause that all the people should gather themselves together and this they do that they might have the voice of the people concern the matter . mosiah and it come to pass that they could find no way to deliver themselves out of bondage except it be to take their woman and child and their flock and their herd and their tent and depart into the wilderness for the lamanites be so numerous it be impossible for the people of limhi to contend with them think to deliver themselves out of bondage by the sword . mosiah now it come to pass that gideon go forth and stand before the king and say unto him now o king thou hast hitherto hearken unto my word many time when we have be contend with our brother the lamanites . mosiah and now o king if thou hast not find me to be an unprofitable servant or if thou hast hitherto listen to my word in any degree and they have be of service to thee even so i desire that thou wouldst listen to my word at this time and i will be thy servant and deliver this people out of bondage . mosiah and the king grant unto him that he might speak . and gideon say unto him mosiah behold the back pas through the back wall on the back side of the city . the lamanites or the guard of the lamanites by night be drunken therefore let u send a proclamation among all this people that they gather together their flock and herd that they may drive them into the wilderness by night . mosiah and i will go accord to thy command and pay the last tribute of wine to the lamanites and they will be drunken and we will pass through the secret pas on the left of their camp when they be drunken and asleep . mosiah thus we will depart with our woman and our child our flock and our herd into the wilderness and we will travel around the land of shilom . mosiah and it come to pass that the king hearken unto the word of gideon . mosiah and king limhi cause that his people should gather their flock together and he send the tribute of wine to the lamanites and he also send more wine a a present unto them and they do drink freely of the wine which king limhi do send unto them . mosiah and it come to pass that the people of king limhi do depart by night into the wilderness with their flock and their herd and they go round about the land of shilom in the wilderness and bend their course towards the land of zarahemla be lead by ammon and his brother . mosiah and they have take all their gold and silver and their precious thing which they could carry and also their provision with them into the wilderness and they pursue their journey . mosiah and after be many day in the wilderness they arrive in the land of zarahemla and join mosiah 's people and become his subject . mosiah and it come to pass that mosiah receive them with joy and he also receive their record and also the record which have be find by the people of limhi . mosiah and now it come to pass when the lamanites have find that the people of limhi have depart out of the land by night that they send an army into the wilderness to pursue them mosiah and after they have pursue them two day they could no longer follow their track therefore they be lose in the wilderness . mosiah chapter mosiah now alma have be warn of the lord that the army of king noah would come upon them and have make it know to his people therefore they gather together their flock and take of their grain and depart into the wilderness before the army of king noah . mosiah and the lord do strengthen them that the people of king noah could not overtake them to destroy them . mosiah and they flee eight day ' journey into the wilderness . mosiah and they come to a land yea even a very beautiful and pleasant land a land of pure water . mosiah and they pitch their tent and begin to till the ground and begin to build building yea they be industrious and do labor exceedingly . mosiah and the people be desirous that alma should be their king for he be beloved by his people . mosiah but he say unto them behold it be not expedient that we should have a king for thus saith the lord ye shall not esteem one flesh above another or one man shall not think himself above another therefore i say unto you it be not expedient that ye should have a king . mosiah nevertheless if it be possible that ye could always have just men to be your king it would be well for you to have a king . mosiah but remember the iniquity of king noah and his priest and i myself be catch in a snare and do many thing which be abominable in the sight of the lord which cause me sore repentance mosiah nevertheless after much tribulation the lord do hear my cry and do answer my prayer and have make me an instrument in his hand in bring so many of you to a knowledge of his truth . mosiah nevertheless in this i do not glory for i be unworthy to glory of myself . mosiah and now i say unto you ye have be oppress by king noah and have be in bondage to him and his priest and have be bring into iniquity by them therefore ye be bind with the band of iniquity . mosiah and now a ye have be deliver by the power of god out of these bond yea even out of the hand of king noah and his people and also from the bond of iniquity even so i desire that ye should stand fast in this liberty wherewith ye have be make free and that ye trust no man to be a king over you . mosiah and also trust no one to be your teacher nor your minister except he be a man of god walking in his way and keep his commandment . mosiah thus do alma teach his people that every man should love his neighbor a himself
