that there should be no contention among them . mosiah and now alma be their high priest he be the founder of their church . mosiah and it come to pass that none receive authority to preach or to teach except it be by him from god . therefore he consecrate all their priest and all their teacher and none be consecrate except they be just men . mosiah therefore they do watch over their people and do nourish them with thing pertain to righteousness . mosiah and it come to pass that they begin to prosper exceedingly in the land and they call the land helam . mosiah and it come to pass that they do multiply and prosper exceedingly in the land of helam and they build a city which they call the city of helam . mosiah nevertheless the lord seeth fit to chasten his people yea he trieth their patience and their faith . mosiah nevertheless whosoever putteth his trust in him the same shall be lift up at the last day . yea and thus it be with this people . mosiah for behold i will show unto you that they be bring into bondage and none could deliver them but the lord their god yea even the god of abraham and isaac and of jacob . mosiah and it come to pass that he do deliver them and he do show forth his mighty power unto them and great be their rejoicing . mosiah for behold it come to pass that while they be in the land of helam yea in the city of helam while till the land round about behold an army of the lamanites be in the border of the land . mosiah now it come to pass that the brother of alma flee from their field and gather themselves together in the city of helam and they be much frighten because of the appearance of the lamanites . mosiah but alma go forth and stood among them and exhort them that they should not be frighten but that they should remember the lord their god and he would deliver them . mosiah therefore they hush their fear and begin to cry unto the lord that he would soften the heart of the lamanites that they would spare them and their wife and their child . mosiah and it come to pass the the lord do soften the heart of the lamanites . and alma and his brother go forth and deliver themselves up into their hand and the lamanites take possession of the land of helam . mosiah now the army of the lamanites which have follow after the people of king limhi have be lose in the wilderness for many day . mosiah and behold they have find those priest of king noah in a place which they call amulon and they have begin to possess the land of amulon and have begin to till the ground . mosiah now the name of the leader of those priest be amulon . mosiah and it come to pass that amulon do plead with the lamanites and he also send forth their wife who be the daughter of the lamanites to plead with their brother that they should not destroy their husband . mosiah and the lamanites have compassion on amulon and his brother and do not destroy them because of their wife . mosiah and amulon and his brother do join the lamanites and they be travel in the wilderness in search of the land of nephi when they discover the land of helam which be possess by alma and his brother . mosiah and it come to pass that the lamanites promise unto alma and his brother that if they would show them the way which lead to the land of nephi that they would grant unto them their life and their liberty . mosiah but after alma have show them the way that lead to the land of nephi the lamanites would not keep their promise but they set guard round about the land of helam over alma and his brother . mosiah and the remainder of them go to the land of nephi and a part of them return to the land of helam and also bring with them the wife and the child of the guard who have be leave in the land . mosiah and the king of the lamanites have grant unto amulon that he should be a king and a ruler over his people who be in the land of helam nevertheless he should have no power to do anything contrary to the will of the king of the lamanites . mosiah chapter mosiah and it come to pass that amulon do gain favor in the eye of the king of the lamanites therefore the king of the lamanites grant unto him and his brother that they should be appoint teacher over his people yea even over the people who be in the land of shemlon and in the land of shilom and in the land of amulon . mosiah for the lamanites have take possession of all these land therefore the king of the lamanites have appoint king over all these land . mosiah and now the name of the king of the lamanites be laman be call after the name of his father and therefore he be call king laman . and he be king over a numerous people . mosiah and he appoint teacher of the brother of amulon in every land which be possess by his people and thus the language of nephi begin to be teach among all the people of the lamanites . mosiah and they be a people friendly one with another nevertheless they know not god neither do the brother of amulon teach them anything concern the lord their god neither the law of moses nor do they teach them the word of abinadi mosiah but they teach them that they should keep their record and that they might write one to another . mosiah and thus the lamanites begin to increase in rich and begin to trade one with another and wax great and begin to be a cunning and a wise people a to the wisdom of the world yea a very cunning people delight in all manner of wickedness and plunder except it be among their own brother . mosiah and now it come to pass that amulon begin to exercise authority over alma and his brother and begin to persecute him and cause that his child should persecute their child . mosiah for amulon know alma that he have be one of the king 's priest and that it be he that believe the word of abinadi and be drive out before the king and therefore he be wroth with him for he be subject to king laman yet he exercise authority over them and put task upon them and put task master over them . mosiah and it come to pass that so great be their affliction that they begin to cry mightily to god . mosiah and amulon command them that they should stop their cry and he put guard over them to watch them that whosoever should be find call upon god should be put to death . mosiah and alma and his people do not raise their voice to the lord their god but do pour out their heart to him and he do know the thought of their heart . mosiah and it come to pass that the voice of the lord come to them in their affliction say lift up your head and be of good comfort for i know of the covenant which ye have make unto me and i will covenant with my people and deliver them out of bondage . mosiah and i will also ease the burden which be put upon your shoulder that even you can not feel them upon your back even while you be in bondage and this will i do that ye may stand a witness for me hereafter and that ye may know of a surety that i the lord god do visit my people in their affliction . mosiah and now it come to pass that the burden which be lay upon alma and his brother be make light yea the lord do strengthen them that they could bear up their burden with ease and they do submit cheerfully and with patience to all the will of the lord . mosiah and it come to pass that so great be their faith and their patience that the voice of the lord come unto them again say be of good comfort for on the morrow i will deliver you out of bondage . mosiah and he say unto alma thou shalt go before this people and i will go with thee and deliver this people out of bondage . mosiah now it come to pass that alma and his people in the night time gather their flock together and also of their grain yea even all the night time be they gather the flock together . mosiah and in the morning the lord cause a deep sleep to come upon the lamanites yea and all their task master be in a profound sleep . mosiah and alma and his people depart into the wilderness and when they have travel all day they pitch their tent in a valley and they call the valley alma because he lead their way in the wilderness . mosiah yea and in the valley of alma they pour out their thanks to god because he have be merciful unto them and ease their burden and have deliver them out of bondage for they be in bondage and none could deliver them except it be the lord their god . mosiah and they give thanks to god yea all their men and all their woman and all their child that could speak lift their voice in the praise of their god . mosiah and now the lord say unto alma haste thee and get thou and this people out of this land for the lamanites have awaken and do pursue thee therefore get thee out of this land and i will stop the lamanites in this valley that they come no further in pursuit of this people . mosiah and it come to pass that they depart out of the valley and take their journey into the wilderness . mosiah and after they have be in the wilderness twelve day they arrive in the land of zarahemla and king mosiah do also receive them with joy . mosiah chapter mosiah and now king mosiah cause that all the people should be gather together . mosiah now there be not so many of the child of nephi or so many of those who be descendant of nephi a there be of the people of zarahemla who be a descendant of mulek and those who come with him into the wilderness . mosiah and there be not so many of the people of nephi and of the people of zarahemla a there be of the lamanites yea they be not half so numerous . mosiah and now all the people of nephi be assemble together and also all the people of zarahemla and they be gather together in two body . mosiah and it come to pass that mosiah do read and cause to be read the record of zeniff to his people yea he read the record of the people of zeniff from the time they leave the land of zarahemla until they return again . mosiah and he also read the account of alma and his brother and all their affliction from the time they leave the land of zarahemla until the time they return again . mosiah and now when mosiah have make an end of read the record his people who tarry in the land be strike with wonder and amazement . mosiah for they know not what to think for when they behold those that have be deliver out of bondage they be fill with exceedingly great joy . mosiah and again when they think of their brother who have be slay by the lamanites they be fill with sorrow and even shed many tear of sorrow . mosiah and again when they think of the immediate goodness of god and his power in deliver alma and his brother out of the hand of the lamanites and of bondage they do raise their voice and give thanks to god . mosiah and again when they think upon the lamanites who be their brother of their sinful and polluted state they be fill with pain and anguish for the welfare of their soul . mosiah and it come to pass that those who be the child of amulon and his brother who have take to wife the daughter of the lamanites be displease with the conduct of their father and they would no longer be call by the name of their father therefore they take upon themselves the name of nephi that they might be call the child of nephi and be number among those who be call nephites . mosiah and now all the people of zarahemla be number with the nephites and this because the kingdom have be confer upon none but those who be descendant of nephi . mosiah and now it come to pass that when mosiah have make an end of speaking and reading to the people he desire that alma should also speak to the people . mosiah and alma do speak unto them when they be assemble together in large body and he go from one body to another preach unto the people repentance and faith on the lord . mosiah and he do exhort the people of limhi and his brother all those that have be deliver out of bondage that they should remember that it be the lord that do deliver them . mosiah and it come to pass that after alma have teach the people many thing and have make an end of speak to them that king limhi be desirous that he might be baptize and all his people be desirous that they might be baptize also . mosiah therefore alma do go forth into the water and do baptize them yea he do baptize them after the manner he do his brother in the water of mormon yea and as many a he do baptize do belong to the church of god and this because of their belief on the word of alma . mosiah and it come to pass that king mosiah grant unto alma that he might establish church throughout all the land of zarahemla and give him power to ordain priest and teacher over every church . mosiah now this be do because there be so many people that they could not all be govern by one teacher neither could they all hear the word of god in one assembly mosiah therefore they do assemble themselves together in different body be call church every church have their priest and their teacher and every priest preach the word accord a it be deliver to him by the mouth of alma . mosiah and thus notwithstanding there be many church they be all one church yea even the church of god for there be nothing preach in all the church except it be repentance and faith in god . mosiah and now there be seven church in the land of zarahemla . and it come to pass that whosoever be desirous to take upon them the name of christ or of god they do join the church of god mosiah and they be call the people of god . and the lord do pour out his spirit upon them and they be bless and prosper in the land . mosiah chapter mosiah now it come to pass that there be many of the rise generation that could not understand the word of king benjamin be little child at the time he spake unto his people and they do not believe the tradition of their father . mosiah they do not believe what have be say concern the resurrection of the dead neither do they believe concern the come of christ . mosiah and now because of their unbelief they could not understand the word of god and their heart be harden . mosiah and they would not be baptize neither would they join the church . and they be a separate people a to their faith and remain so ever after even in their carnal and sinful state for they would not call upon the lord their god . mosiah and now in the reign of mosiah they be not half so numerous a the people of god but because of the dissension among the brother they become more numerous . mosiah for it come to pass that they do deceive many with their flattering word who be in the church and do cause them to commit many sin therefore it become expedient that those who commit sin that be in the church should be admonish by the church . mosiah and it come to pass that they be bring before the priest and deliver up unto the priest by the teacher and the priest bring them before alma who be the high priest . mosiah now king mosiah have give alma the authority over the church . mosiah and it come to pass that alma do not know concern them but there be many witness against them yea the people stand and testify of their iniquity in abundance . mosiah now there have not any such thing happen before in the church therefore alma be trouble in his spirit and he cause that they should be bring before the king . mosiah and he say unto the king behold here be many whom we have bring before thee who be accuse of their brother yea and they have be take in diver iniquity . and they do not repent of their iniquity therefore we have bring them before thee that thou mayest judge them accord to their crime . mosiah but king mosiah say unto alma behold i judge them not therefore i deliver them into thy hand to be judge . mosiah and now the spirit of alma be again troubled and he go and inquire of the lord what he should do concern this matter for he fear that he should do wrong in the sight of god . mosiah and it come to pass that after he have pour out his whole soul to god the voice of the lord come to him say mosiah bless art thou alma and bless be they who be baptize in the water of mormon . thou art bless because of thy exceed faith in the word alone of my servant abinadi . mosiah and bless be they because of their exceed faith in the word alone which thou hast speak unto them . mosiah and bless art thou because thou hast establish a church among this people and they shall be establish and they shall be my people . mosiah yea bless be this people who be willing to bear my name for in my name shall they be call and they be mine . mosiah and because thou hast inquired of me concern the transgressor thou art bless . mosiah thou art my servant and i covenant with thee that thou shalt have eternal life and thou shalt serve me and go forth in my name and shalt gather together my sheep . mosiah and he that will hear my voice shall be my sheep and him shall ye receive into the church and him will i also receive . mosiah for behold this be my church whosoever be baptize shall be baptize unto repentance . and whomsoever ye receive shall believe in my name and him will i freely forgive . mosiah for it be i that taketh upon me the sin of the world for it be i that hath create them and it be i that granteth unto him that believeth unto the end a place at my right hand . mosiah for behold in my name be they call and if they know me they shall come forth and shall have a place eternally at my right hand . mosiah and it shall come to pass that when the second trump shall sound then shall they that never know me come forth and shall stand before me . mosiah and then shall they know that i be the lord their god that i be their redeemer but they would not be redeem . mosiah and then i will confess unto them that i never know them and they shall depart into everlasting fire prepare for the devil and his angel . mosiah therefore i say unto you that he that will not hear my voice the same shall ye not receive into my church for him i will not receive at the last day . mosiah therefore i say unto you go and whosoever transgresseth against me him shall ye judge accord to the sin which he have commit and if he confess his sin before thee and me and repenteth in the sincerity of his heart him shall ye forgive and i will forgive him also . mosiah yea and as often a my people repent will i forgive them their trespass against me . mosiah and ye shall also forgive one another your trespass for verily i say unto you he that forgiveth not his neighbor 's trespass when he say that he repent the same hath bring himself under condemnation . mosiah now i say unto you go and whosoever will not repent of his sin the same shall not be number among my people and this shall be observe from this time forward . mosiah and it come to pass when alma have hear these word he write them down that he might have them and that he might judge the people of that church accord to the commandment of god . mosiah and it come to pass that alma go and judge those that have be take in iniquity accord to the word of the lord . mosiah and whosoever repent of their sin and do confess them them he do number among the people of the church mosiah and those that would not confess their sin and repent of their iniquity the same be not number among the people of the church and their name be blot out . mosiah and it come to pass that alma do regulate all the affair of the church and they begin again to have peace and to prosper exceedingly in the affair of the church walk circumspectly before god receive many and baptize many . mosiah and now all these thing do alma and his fellow laborer do who be over the church walking in all diligence teach the word of god in all thing suffer all manner of affliction be persecute by all those who do not belong to the church of god . mosiah and they do admonish their brother and they be also admonish every one by the word of god accord to his sin or to the sin which he have commit be command of god to pray without cease and to give thanks in all thing . mosiah chapter mosiah and now it come to pass that the persecution which be inflict on the church by the unbeliever become so great that the church begin to murmur and complain to their leader concern the matter and they do complain to alma . and alma lay the case before their king mosiah . and mosiah consult with his priest . mosiah and it come to pass that king mosiah send a proclamation throughout the land round about that there should not any unbeliever persecute any of those who belong to the church of god . mosiah and there be a strict command throughout all the church that there should be no persecution among them that there should be an equality among all men mosiah that they should let no pride nor haughtiness disturb their peace that every man should esteem his neighbor a himself labor with their own hand for their support . mosiah yea and all their priest and teacher should labor with their own hand for their support in all case save it be in sickness or in much want and do these thing they do abound in the grace of god . mosiah and there begin to be much peace again in the land and the people begin to be very numerous and begin to scatter abroad upon the face of the earth yea on the north and on the south on the east and on the west build large city and village in all quarter of the land . mosiah and the lord do visit them and prosper them and they become a large and wealthy people . mosiah now the son of mosiah be number among the unbeliever and also one of the son of alma be number among them he be call alma after his father nevertheless he become a very wicked and an idolatrous man . and he be a man of many word and do speak much flattery to the people therefore he lead many of the people to do after the manner of his iniquity . mosiah and he become a great hinderment to the prosperity of the church of god steal away the heart of the people cause much dissension among the people give a chance for the enemy of god to exercise his power over them . mosiah and now it come to pass that while he be go about to destroy the church of god for he do go about secretly with the son of mosiah seek to destroy the church and to lead astray the people of the lord contrary to the commandment of god or even the king mosiah and a i say unto you a they be go about rebel against god behold the angel of the lord appear unto them and he descend a it be in a cloud and he spake a it be with a voice of thunder which cause the earth to shake upon which they stand mosiah and so great be their astonishment that they fell to the earth and understood not the word which he spake unto them . mosiah nevertheless he cry again say alma arise and stand forth for why persecutest thou the church of god ? for the lord hath say this be my church and i will establish it and nothing shall overthrow it save it be the transgression of my people . mosiah and again the angel say behold the lord hath hear the prayer of his people and also the prayer of his servant alma who be thy father for he have pray with much faith concern thee that thou mightest be bring to the knowledge of the truth therefore for this purpose have i come to convince thee of the power and authority of god that the prayer of his servant might be answer accord to their faith . mosiah and now behold can ye dispute the power of god ? for behold doth not my voice shake the earth ? and can ye not also behold me before you ? and i be send from god . mosiah now i say unto thee go and remember the captivity of thy father in the land of helam and in the land of nephi and remember how great thing he have do for them for they be in bondage and he have deliver them . and now i say unto thee alma go thy way and seek to destroy the church no more that their prayer may be answer and this even if thou wilt of thyself be cast off . mosiah and now it come to pass that these be the last word which the angel spake unto alma and he depart . mosiah and now alma and those that be with him fell again to the earth for great be their astonishment for with their own eye they have behold an angel of the lord and his voice be a thunder which shake the earth and they know that there be nothing save the power of god that could shake the earth and cause it to tremble a though it would part asunder . mosiah and now the astonishment of alma be so great that he become dumb that he could not open his mouth yea and he become weak even that he could not move his hand therefore he be take by those that be with him and carry helpless even until he be lay before his father . mosiah and they rehearse unto his father all that have happen unto them and his father rejoice for he know that it be the power of god . mosiah and he cause that a multitude should be gather together that they might witness what the lord have do for his son and also for those that be with him . mosiah and he cause that the priest should assemble themselves together and they begin to fast and to pray to the lord their god that he would open the mouth of alma that he might speak and also that his limb might receive their strength that the eye of the people might be open to see and know of the goodness and glory of god . mosiah and it come to pass after they have fast and pray for the space of two day and two night the limb of alma receive their strength and he stand up and begin to speak unto them bid them to be of good comfort mosiah for say he i have repent of my sin and have be redeem of the lord behold i be bear of the spirit . mosiah and the lord say unto me marvel not that all mankind yea men and woman all nation kindred tongue and people must be bear again yea born of god change from their carnal and fallen state to a state of righteousness be redeem of god become his son and daughter mosiah and thus they become new creature and unless they do this they can in nowise inherit the kingdom of god . mosiah i say unto you unless this be the case they must be cast off and this i know because i be like to be cast off . mosiah nevertheless after wad through much tribulation repent nigh unto death the lord in mercy hath see fit to snatch me out of an everlasting burning and i be bear of god . mosiah my soul hath be redeem from the gall of bitterness and bond of iniquity . i be in the dark abyss but now i behold the marvelous light of god . my soul be rack with eternal torment but i be snatch and my soul be pain no more . mosiah i reject my redeemer and deny that which have be speak of by our father but now that they may foresee that he will come and that he remembereth every creature of his create he will make himself manifest unto all . mosiah yea every knee shall bow and every tongue confess before him . yea even at the last day when all men shall stand to be judge of him then shall they confess that he be god then shall they confess who live without god in the world that the judgment of an everlasting punishment be just upon them and they shall quake and tremble and shrink beneath the glance of his all search eye . mosiah and now it come to pass that alma begin from this time forward to teach the people and those who be with alma at the time the angel appear unto them travel round about through all the land publishing to all the people the thing which they have hear and see and preach the word of god in much tribulation be greatly persecute by those who be unbeliever be smite by many of them . mosiah but notwithstanding all this they do impart much consolation to the church confirm their faith and exhort them with long suffering and much travail to keep the commandment of god . mosiah and four of them be the son of mosiah and their name be ammon and aaron and omner and himni these be the name of the son of mosiah . mosiah and they travel throughout all the land of zarahemla and among all the people who be under the reign of king mosiah zealously strive to repair all the injury which they have do to the church confess all their sin and publish all the thing which they have see and explain the prophecy and the scripture to all who desire to hear them . mosiah and thus they be instrument in the hand of god in bring many to the knowledge of the truth yea to the knowledge of their redeemer . mosiah and how bless be they ! for they do publish peace they do publish good tidings of good and they do declare unto the people that the lord reigneth . mosiah chapter mosiah now it come to pass that after the son of mosiah have do all these thing they take a small number with them and return to their father the king and desire of him that he would grant unto them that they might with these whom they have select go up to the land of nephi that they might preach the thing which they have hear and that they might impart the word of god to their brother the lamanites mosiah that perhaps they might bring them to the knowledge of the lord their god and convince them of the iniquity of their father and that perhaps they might cure them of their hatred towards the nephites that they might also be bring to rejoice in the lord their god that they might become friendly to one another and that there should be no more contention in all the land which the lord their god have give them . mosiah now they be desirous that salvation should be declare to every creature for they could not bear that any human soul should perish yea even the very thought that any soul should endure endless torment do cause them to quake and tremble . mosiah and thus do the spirit of the lord work upon them for they be the very vile of sinner . and the lord saw fit in his infinite mercy to spare them nevertheless they suffer much anguish of soul because of their iniquity suffer much and fear that they should be cast off forever . mosiah and it come to pass that they do plead with their father many day that they might go up to the land of nephi . mosiah and king mosiah go and inquire of the lord if he should let his son go up among the lamanites to preach the word . mosiah and the lord say unto mosiah let them go up for many shall believe on their word and they shall have eternal life and i will deliver thy son out of the hand of the lamanites . mosiah and it come to pass that mosiah grant that they might go and do accord to their request . mosiah and they take their journey into the wilderness to go up to preach the word among the lamanites and i shall give an account of their proceeding hereafter . mosiah now king mosiah have no one to confer the kingdom upon for there be not any of his son who would accept of the kingdom . mosiah therefore he take the record which be engraven on the plate of brass and also the plate of nephi and all the thing which he have keep and preserve accord to the commandment of god after have translate and cause to be write the record which be on the plate of gold which have be find by the people of limhi which be deliver to him by the hand of limhi mosiah and this he do because of the great anxiety of his people for they be desirous beyond measure to know concern those people who have be destroy . mosiah and now he translate them by the mean of those two stone which be fasten into the two rim of a bow . mosiah now these thing be prepare from the beginning and be hand down from generation to generation for the purpose of interpret language mosiah and they have be keep and preserve by the hand of the lord that he should discover to every creature who should possess the land the iniquity and abomination of his people mosiah and whosoever have these thing be call seer after the manner of old time . mosiah now after mosiah have finish translate these record behold it give an account of the people who be destroy from the time that they be destroy back to the building of the great tower at the time the lord confound the language of the people and they be scatter abroad upon the face of all the earth yea and even from that time back until the creation of adam . mosiah now this account do cause the people of mosiah to mourn exceedingly yea they be fill with sorrow nevertheless it give them much knowledge in the which they do rejoice . mosiah and this account shall be write hereafter for behold it be expedient that all people should know the thing which be write in this account . mosiah and now a i say unto you that after king mosiah have do these thing he take the plate of brass and all the thing which he have keep and confer them upon alma who be the son of alma yea all the record and also the interpreter and confer them upon him and command him that he should keep and preserve them and also keep a record of the people hand them down from one generation to another even a they have be hand down from the time that lehi leave jerusalem . mosiah chapter mosiah now when mosiah have do this he send out throughout all the land among all the people desire to know their will concern who should be their king . mosiah and it come to pass that the voice of the people come say we be desirous that aaron thy son should be our king and our ruler . mosiah now aaron have go up to the land of nephi therefore the king could not confer the kingdom upon him neither would aaron take upon him the kingdom neither be any of the son of mosiah willing to take upon them the kingdom . mosiah therefore king mosiah send again among the people yea even a write word send he among the people . and these be the word that be write say mosiah behold o ye my people or my brother for i esteem you a such i desire that ye should consider the cause which ye be call to consider for ye be desirous to have a king . mosiah now i declare unto you that he to whom the kingdom doth rightly belong have decline and will not take upon him the kingdom . mosiah and now if there should be another appoint in his stead behold i fear there would rise contention among you . and who knoweth but what my son to whom the kingdom doth belong should turn to be angry and draw away a part of this people after him which would cause war and contention among you which would be the cause of shed much blood and pervert the way of the lord yea and destroy the soul of many people . mosiah now i say unto you let u be wise and consider these thing for we have no right to destroy my son neither should we have any right to destroy another if he should be appoint in his stead . mosiah and if my son should turn again to his pride and vain thing he would recall the thing which he have say and claim his right to the kingdom which would cause him and also this people to commit much sin . mosiah and now let u be wise and look forward to these thing and do that which will make for the peace of this people . mosiah therefore i will be your king the remainder of my day nevertheless let u appoint judge to judge this people accord to our law and we will newly arrange the affair of this people for we will appoint wise men to be judge that will judge this people accord to the commandment of god . mosiah now it be well that a man should be judge of god than of man for the judgment of god be always just but the judgment of man be not always just . mosiah therefore if it be possible that you could have just men to be your king who would establish the law of god and judge this people accord to his commandment yea if ye could have men for your king who would do even a my father benjamin do for this people i say unto you if this could always be the case then it would be expedient that ye should always have king to rule over you . mosiah and even i myself have labor with all the power and faculty which i have possess to teach you the commandment of god and to establish peace throughout the land that there should be no war nor contention no steal nor plunder nor murder nor any manner of iniquity mosiah and whosoever have commit iniquity him have i punish accord to the crime which he have commit accord to the law which have be give to u by our father . mosiah now i say unto you that because all men be not just it be not expedient that ye should have a king or king to rule over you . mosiah for behold how much iniquity doth one wicked king cause to be commit yea and what great destruction ! mosiah yea remember king noah his wickedness and his abomination and also the wickedness and abomination of his people . behold what great destruction do come upon them and also because of their iniquity they be bring into bondage . mosiah and be it not for the interposition of their all wise creator and this because of their sincere repentance they must unavoidably remain in bondage until now . mosiah but behold he do deliver them because they do humble themselves before him and because they cry mightily unto him he do deliver them out of bondage and thus doth the lord work with his power in all case among the child of men extend the arm of mercy towards them that put their trust in him . mosiah and behold now i say unto you ye can not dethrone an iniquitous king save it be through much contention and the shedding of much blood . mosiah for behold he have his friend in iniquity and he keepeth his guard about him and he teareth up the law of those who have reign in righteousness before him and he trampleth under his foot the commandment of god mosiah and he enacteth law and sendeth them forth among his people yea law after the manner of his own wickedness and whosoever doth not obey his law he causeth to be destroy and whosoever doth rebel against him he will send his army against them to war and if he can he will destroy them and thus an unrighteous king doth pervert the way of all righteousness . mosiah and now behold i say unto you it be not expedient that such abomination should come upon you . mosiah therefore choose you by the voice of this people judge that ye may be judge accord to the law which have be give you by our father which be correct and which be give them by the hand of the lord . mosiah now it be not common that the voice of the people desireth anything contrary to that which be right but it be common for the less part of the people to desire that which be not right therefore this shall ye observe and make it your law to do your business by the voice of the people . mosiah and if the time come that the voice of the people doth choose iniquity then be the time that the judgment of god will come upon you yea then be the time he will visit you with great destruction even a he have hitherto visit this land . mosiah and now if ye have judge and they do not judge you accord to the law which have be give ye can cause that they may be judge of a high judge . mosiah if your high judge do not judge righteous judgment ye shall cause that a small number of your low judge should be gather together and they shall judge your high judge accord to the voice of the people . mosiah and i command you to do these thing in the fear of the lord and i command you to do these thing and that ye have no king that if these people commit sin and iniquity they shall be answer upon their own head . mosiah for behold i say unto you the sin of many people have be cause by the iniquity of their king therefore their iniquity be answer upon the head of their king . mosiah and now i desire that this inequality should be no more in this land especially among this my people but i desire that this land be a land of liberty and every man may enjoy his right and privilege alike so long a the lord see fit that we may live and inherit the land yea even as long a any of our posterity remain upon the face of the land . mosiah and many more thing do king mosiah write unto them unfold unto them all the trial and trouble of a righteous king yea all the travail of soul for their people and also all the murmuring of the people to their king and he explain it all unto them . mosiah and he tell them that these thing ought not to be but that the burden should come upon all the people that every man might bear his part . mosiah and he also unfold unto them all the disadvantage they labor under by have an unrighteous king to rule over them mosiah yea all his iniquity and abomination and all the war and contention and bloodshed and the stealing and the plundering and the committing of whoredom and all manner of iniquity which can not be enumerate tell them that these thing ought not to be that they be expressly repugnant to the commandment of god . mosiah and now it come to pass after king mosiah have send these thing forth among the people they be convince of the truth of his word . mosiah therefore they relinquish their desire for a king and become exceedingly anxious that every man should have an equal chance throughout all the land yea and every man express a willingness to answer for his own sin . mosiah therefore it come to pass that they assemble themselves together in body throughout the land to cast in their voice concern who should be their judge to judge them accord to the law which have be give them and they be exceedingly rejoice because of the liberty which have be grant unto them . mosiah and they do wax strong in love towards mosiah yea they do esteem him more than any other man for they do not look upon him a a tyrant who be seek for gain yea for that lucre which doth corrupt the soul for he have not exact rich of them neither have he delight in the shedding of blood but he have establish peace in the land and he have grant unto his people that they should be deliver from all manner of bondage therefore they do esteem him yea exceedingly beyond measure . mosiah and it come to pass that they do appoint judge to rule over them or to judge them accord to the law and this they do throughout all the land . mosiah and it come to pass that alma be appoint to be the first chief judge he be also the high priest his father have confer the office upon him and have give him the charge concern all the affair of the church . mosiah and now it come to pass that alma do walk in the way of the lord and he do keep his commandment and he do judge righteous judgment and there be continual peace through the land . mosiah and thus commence the reign of the judge throughout all the land of zarahemla among all the people who be call the nephites and alma be the first and chief judge . mosiah and now it come to pass that his father die be eighty and two year old have live to fulfil the commandment of god . mosiah and it come to pass that mosiah die also in the thirty and third year of his reign be sixty and three year old making in the whole five hundred and nine year from the time lehi leave jerusalem . mosiah and thus end the reign of the king over the people of nephi and thus end the day of alma who be the founder of their church . the book of alma the son of alma the account of alma who be the son of alma the first and chief judge over the people of nephi and also the high priest over the church . an account of the reign of the judge and the war and contention among the people . and also an account of a war between the nephites and the lamanites accord to the record of alma the first and chief judge . alma chapter alma now it come to pass that in the first year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi from this time forward king mosiah have go the way of all the earth have war a good warfare walk uprightly before god leave none to reign in his stead nevertheless he have establish law and they be acknowledge by the people therefore they be oblige to abide by the law which he have make . alma and it come to pass that in the first year of the reign of alma in the judgment seat there be a man bring before him to be judge a man who be large and be note for his much strength . alma and he have go about among the people preach to them that which he term to be the word of god bear down against the church declare unto the people that every priest and teacher ought to become popular and they ought not to labor with their hand but that they ought to be support by the people . alma and he also testify unto the people that all mankind should be save at the last day and that they need not fear nor tremble but that they might lift up their head and rejoice for the lord have create all men and have also redeem all men and in the end all men should have eternal life . alma and it come to pass that he do teach these thing so much that many do believe on his word even so many that they begin to support him and give him money . alma and he begin to be lift up in the pride of his heart and to wear very costly apparel yea and even begin to establish a church after the manner of his preaching . alma and it come to pass a he be go to preach to those who believe on his word he meet a man who belong to the church of god yea even one of their teacher and he begin to contend with him sharply that he might lead away the people of the church but the man withstand him admonish him with the word of god . alma now the name of the man be gideon and it be he who be an instrument in the hand of god in deliver the people of limhi out of bondage . alma now because gideon withstand him with the word of god he be wroth with gideon and draw his sword and begin to smite him . now gideon be stricken with many year therefore he be not able to withstand his blow therefore he be slay by the sword . alma and the man who slew him be take by the people of the church and be bring before alma to be judge accord to the crime which he have commit . alma and it come to pass that he stand before alma and plead for himself with much boldness . alma but alma say unto him behold this be the first time that priestcraft have be introduce among this people . and behold thou art not only guilty of priestcraft but hast endeavor to enforce it by the sword and be priestcraft to be enforce among this people it would prove their entire destruction . alma and thou hast shed the blood of a righteous man yea a man who have do much good among this people and be we to spare thee his blood would come upon u for vengeance . alma therefore thou art condemn to die accord to the law which have be give u by mosiah our last king and it have be acknowledge by this people therefore this people must abide by the law . alma and it come to pass that they take him and his name be nehor and they carry him upon the top of the hill manti and there he be cause or rather do acknowledge between the heaven and the earth that what he have teach to the people be contrary to the word of god and there he suffer an ignominious death . alma nevertheless this do not put an end to the spreading of priestcraft through the land for there be many who love the vain thing of the world and they go forth preach false doctrine and this they do for the sake of rich and honor . alma nevertheless they durst not lie if it be know for fear of the law for liar be punish therefore they pretend to preach accord to their belief and now the law could have no power on any man for his belief . alma and they durst not steal for fear of the law for such be punish neither durst they rob nor murder for he that murder be punish unto death . alma but it come to pass that whosoever do not belong to the church of god begin to persecute those that do belong to the church of god and have take upon them the name of christ . alma yea they do persecute them and afflict them with all manner of word and this because of their humility because they be not proud in their own eye and because they do impart the word of god one with another without money and without price . alma now there be a strict law among the people of the church that there should not any man belonging to the church arise and persecute those that do not belong to the church and that there should be no persecution among themselves . alma nevertheless there be many among them who begin to be proud and begin to contend warmly with their adversary even unto blow yea they would smite one another with their fist . alma now this be in the second year of the reign of alma and it be a cause of much affliction to the church yea it be the cause of much trial with the church . alma for the heart of many be harden and their name be blot out that they be remember no more among the people of god . and also many withdraw themselves from among them . alma now this be a great trial to those that do stand fast in the faith nevertheless they be steadfast and immovable in keep the commandment of god and they bore with patience the persecution which be heap upon them . alma and when the priest leave their labor to impart the word of god unto the people the people also leave their labor to hear the word of god . and when the priest have impart unto them the word of god they all return again diligently unto their labor and the priest not esteem himself above his hearer for the preacher be no good than the hearer neither be the teacher any good than the learner and thus they be all equal and they do all labor every man accord to his strength . alma and they do impart of their substance every man accord to that which he have to the poor and the needy and the sick and the afflict and they do not wear costly apparel yet they be neat and comely . alma and thus they do establish the affair of the church and thus they begin to have continual peace again notwithstanding all their persecution . alma and now because of the steadiness of the church they begin to be exceedingly rich have abundance of all thing whatsoever they stand in need an abundance of flock and herd and fatlings of every kind and also abundance of grain and of gold and of silver and of precious thing and abundance of silk and fine twin linen and all manner of good homely cloth . alma and thus in their prosperous circumstance they do not send away any who be naked or that be hungry or that be athirst or that be sick or that have not be nourish and they do not set their heart upon rich therefore they be liberal to all both old and young both bond and free both male and female whether out of the church or in the church have no respect to person a to those who stand in need . alma and thus they do prosper and become far more wealthy than those who do not belong to their church . alma for those who do not belong to their church do indulge themselves in sorcery and in idolatry or idleness and in babbling and in envyings and strife wear costly apparel be lift up in the pride of their own eye persecute lie thieve rob commit whoredom and murder and all manner of wickedness nevertheless the law be put in force upon all those who do transgress it inasmuch a it be possible . alma and it come to pass that by thus exercise the law upon them every man suffer accord to that which he have do they become more still and durst not commit any wickedness if it be know therefore there be much peace among the people of nephi until the fifth year of the reign of the judge . alma chapter alma and it come to pass in the commencement of the fifth year of their reign there begin to be a contention among the people for a certain man be call amlici he be a very cunning man yea a wise man a to the wisdom of the world he be after the order of the man that slew gideon by the sword who be execute accord to the law alma now this amlici have by his cunning draw away much people after him even so much that they begin to be very powerful and they begin to endeavor to establish amlici to be king over the people . alma now this be alarm to the people of the church and also to all those who have not be draw away after the persuasion of amlici for they know that accord to their law that such thing must be establish by the voice of the people . alma therefore if it be possible that amlici should gain the voice of the people he be a wicked man would deprive them of their right and privilege of the church for it be his intent to destroy the church of god . alma and it come to pass that the people assemble themselves together throughout all the land every man accord to his mind whether it be for or against amlici in separate body have much dispute and wonderful contention one with another . alma and thus they do assemble themselves together to cast in their voice concern the matter and they be lay before the judge . alma and it come to pass that the voice of the people come against amlici that he be not make king over the people . alma now this do cause much joy in the heart of those who be against him but amlici do stir up those who be in his favor to anger against those who be not in his favor . alma and it come to pass that they gather themselves together and do consecrate amlici to be their king . alma now when amlici be make king over them he command them that they should take up arm against their brother and this he do that he might subject them to him . alma now the people of amlici be distinguish by the name of amlici be call amlicites and the remainder be call nephites or the people of god . alma therefore the people of the nephites be aware of the intent of the amlicites and therefore they do prepare to meet them yea they do arm themselves with sword and with cimeters and with bow and with arrow and with stone and with sling and with all manner of weapon of war of every kind . alma and thus they be prepare to meet the amlicites at the time of their coming . and there be appoint captain and high captain and chief captain accord to their number . alma and it come to pass that amlici do arm his men with all manner of weapon of war of every kind and he also appoint ruler and leader over his people to lead them to war against their brother . alma and it come to pass that the amlicites come upon the hill amnihu which be east of the river sidon which ran by the land of zarahemla and there they begin to make war with the nephites . alma now alma be the chief judge and the governor of the people of nephi therefore he go up with his people yea with his captain and chief captain yea at the head of his army against the amlicites to battle . alma and they begin to slay the amlicites upon the hill east of sidon . and the amlicites do contend with the nephites with great strength insomuch that many of the nephites do fall before the amlicites . alma nevertheless the lord do strengthen the hand of the nephites that they slew the amlicites with great slaughter that they begin to flee before them . alma and it come to pass that the nephites do pursue the amlicites all that day and do slay them with much slaughter insomuch that there be slain of the amlicites twelve thousand five hundred thirty and two soul and there be slain of the nephites six thousand five hundred sixty and two soul . alma and it come to pass that when alma could pursue the amlicites no longer he cause that his people should pitch their tent in the valley of gideon the valley be call after that gideon who be slay by the hand of nehor with the sword and in this valley the nephites do pitch their tent for the night . alma and alma sent spy to follow the remnant of the amlicites that he might know of their plan and their plot whereby he might guard himself against them that he might preserve his people from be destroy . alma now those whom he have send out to watch the camp of the amlicites be call zeram and amnor and manti and limher these be they who go out with their men to watch the camp of the amlicites . alma and it come to pass that on the morrow they return into the camp of the nephites in great haste be greatly astonish and strike with much fear say alma behold we follow the camp of the amlicites and to our great astonishment in the land of minon above the land of zarahemla in the course of the land of nephi we saw a numerous host of the lamanites and behold the amlicites have join them alma and they be upon our brother in that land and they be flee before them with their flock and their wife and their child towards our city and except we make haste they obtain possession of our city and our father and our wife and our child be slay . alma and it come to pass that the people of nephi take their tent and depart out of the valley of gideon towards their city which be the city of zarahemla . alma and behold a they be cross the river sidon the lamanites and the amlicites be a numerous almost a it be a the sand of the sea come upon them to destroy them . alma nevertheless the nephites be strengthen by the hand of the lord have pray mightily to him that he would deliver them out of the hand of their enemy therefore the lord do hear their cry and do strengthen them and the lamanites and the amlicites do fall before them . alma and it come to pass that alma fight with amlici with the sword face to face and they do contend mightily one with another . alma and it come to pass that alma be a man of god be exercise with much faith cry say o lord have mercy and spare my life that i may be an instrument in thy hand to save and preserve this people . alma now when alma have say these word he contend again with amlici and he be strengthen insomuch that he slew amlici with the sword . alma and he also contend with the king of the lamanites but the king of the lamanites flee back from before alma and send his guard to contend with alma . alma but alma with his guard contend with the guard of the king of the lamanites until he slew and drive them back . alma and thus he clear the ground or rather the bank which be on the west of the river sidon throw the body of the lamanites who have be slay into the water of sidon that thereby his people might have room to cross and contend with the lamanites and the amlicites on the west side of the river sidon . alma and it come to pass that when they have all cross the river sidon that the lamanites and the amlicites begin to flee before them notwithstanding they be so numerous that they could not be number . alma and they flee before the nephites towards the wilderness which be west and north away beyond the border of the land and the nephites do pursue them with their might and do slay them . alma yea they be meet on every hand and slain and drive until they be scatter on the west and on the north until they have reach the wilderness which be call hermounts and it be that part of the wilderness which be infest by wild and ravenous beast . alma and it come to pass that many die in the wilderness of their wound and be devour by those beast and also the vulture of the air and their bone have be find and have be heap up on the earth . alma chapter alma and it come to pass that the nephites who be not slay by the weapon of war after have bury those who have be slain now the number of the slain be not number because of the greatness of their number after they have finish bury their dead they all return to their land and to their house and their wife and their child . alma now many woman and child have be slay with the sword and also many of their flock and their herd and also many of their field of grain be destroy for they be tread down by the host of men . alma and now a many of the lamanites and the amlicites who have be slay upon the bank of the river sidon be cast into the water of sidon and behold their bone be in the depth of the sea and they be many . alma and the amlicites be distinguish from the nephites for they have mark themselves with red in their forehead after the manner of the lamanites nevertheless they have not shorn their head like unto the lamanites . alma now the head of the lamanites be shorn and they be naked save it be skin which be gird about their loin and also their armor which be gird about them and their bow and their arrow and their stone and their sling and so forth . alma and the skin of the lamanites be dark accord to the mark which be set upon their father which be a curse upon them because of their transgression and their rebellion against their brother who consist of nephi jacob and joseph and sam who be just and holy men . alma and their brother seek to destroy them therefore they be curse and the lord god set a mark upon them yea upon laman and lemuel and also the son of ishmael and ishmaelitish woman . alma and this be do that their seed might be distinguish from the seed of their brother that thereby the lord god might preserve his people that they might not mix and believe in incorrect tradition which would prove their destruction . alma and it come to pass that whosoever do mingle his seed with that of the lamanites do bring the same curse upon his seed . alma therefore whosoever suffer himself to be lead away by the lamanites be call under that head and there be a mark set upon him . alma and it come to pass that whosoever would not believe in the tradition of the lamanites but believe those record which be bring out of the land of jerusalem and also in the tradition of their father which be correct who believe in the commandment of god and keep them be call the nephites or the people of nephi from that time forth alma and it be they who have keep the record which be true of their people and also of the people of the lamanites . alma now we will return again to the amlicites for they also have a mark set upon them yea they set the mark upon themselves yea even a mark of red upon their forehead . alma thus the word of god be fulfil for these be the word which he say to nephi behold the lamanites have i curse and i will set a mark on them that they and their seed may be separate from thee and thy seed from this time henceforth and forever except they repent of their wickedness and turn to me that i may have mercy upon them . alma and again i will set a mark upon him that mingleth his seed with thy brother that they may be curse also . alma and again i will set a mark upon him that fighteth against thee and thy seed . alma and again i say he that departeth from thee shall no more be call thy seed and i will bless thee and whomsoever shall be call thy seed henceforth and forever and these be the promise of the lord unto nephi and to his seed . alma now the amlicites know not that they be fulfil the word of god when they begin to mark themselves in their forehead nevertheless they have come out in open rebellion against god therefore it be expedient that the curse should fall upon them . alma now i would that ye should see that they bring upon themselves the curse and even so doth every man that be curse bring upon himself his own condemnation . alma now it come to pass that not many day after the battle which be fight in the land of zarahemla by the lamanites and the amlicites that there be another army of the lamanites come in upon the people of nephi in the same place where the first army meet the amlicites . alma and it come to pass that there be an army send to drive them out of their land . alma now alma himself be afflict with a wound do not go up to battle at this time against the lamanites alma but he send up a numerous army against them and they go up and slew many of the lamanites and drive the remainder of them out of the border of their land . alma and then they return again and begin to establish peace in the land be trouble no more for a time with their enemy . alma now all these thing be do yea all these war and contention be commence and end in the fifth year of the reign of the judge . alma and in one year be thousand and ten of thousand of souls sent to the eternal world that they might reap their reward accord to their work whether they be good or whether they be bad to reap eternal happiness or eternal misery accord to the spirit which they list to obey whether it be a good spirit or a bad one . alma for every man receiveth wage of him whom he listeth to obey and this accord to the word of the spirit of prophecy therefore let it be accord to the truth . and thus endeth the fifth year of the reign of the judge . alma chapter alma now it come to pass in the sixth year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi there be no contention nor war in the land of zarahemla alma but the people be afflict yea greatly afflict for the loss of their brother and also for the loss of their flock and herd and also for the loss of their field of grain which be trodden under foot and destroy by the lamanites . alma and so great be their affliction that every soul have cause to mourn and they believe that it be the judgment of god send upon them because of their wickedness and their abomination therefore they be awaken to a remembrance of their duty . alma and they begin to establish the church more fully yea and many be baptize in the water of sidon and be join to the church of god yea they be baptize by the hand of alma who have be consecrate the high priest over the people of the church by the hand of his father alma . alma and it come to pass in the seventh year of the reign of the judge there be about three thousand five hundred soul that unite themselves to the church of god and be baptize . and thus endeth the seventh year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi and there be continual peace in all that time . alma and it come to pass in the eighth year of the reign of the judge that the people of the church begin to wax proud because of their exceeding rich and their fine silk and their fine twin linen and because of their many flock and herd and their gold and their silver and all manner of precious thing which they have obtain by their industry and in all these thing be they lift up in the pride of their eye for they begin to wear very costly apparel . alma now this be the cause of much affliction to alma yea and to many of the people whom alma have consecrate to be teacher and priest and elder over the church yea many of them be sorely grieve for the wickedness which they saw have begin to be among their people . alma for they saw and beheld with great sorrow that the people of the church begin to be lift up in the pride of their eye and to set their heart upon rich and upon the vain thing of the world that they begin to be scornful one towards another and they begin to persecute those that do not believe accord to their own will and pleasure . alma and thus in this eighth year of the reign of the judge there begin to be great contention among the people of the church yea there be envyings and strife and malice and persecution and pride even to exceed the pride of those who do not belong to the church of god . alma and thus end the eighth year of the reign of the judge and the wickedness of the church be a great stumbling block to those who do not belong to the church and thus the church begin to fail in it progress . alma and it come to pass in the commencement of the ninth year alma saw the wickedness of the church and he saw also that the example of the church begin to lead those who be unbeliever on from one piece of iniquity to another thus bring on the destruction of the people . alma yea he saw great inequality among the people some lift themselves up with their pride despise others turn their back upon the needy and the naked and those who be hungry and those who be athirst and those who be sick and afflicted . alma now this be a great cause for lamentation among the people while others be abase themselves succor those who stand in need of their succor such a impart their substance to the poor and the needy feed the hungry and suffer all manner of affliction for christ 's sake who should come accord to the spirit of prophecy alma look forward to that day thus retain a remission of their sin be fill with great joy because of the resurrection of the dead accord to the will and power and deliverance of jesus christ from the band of death . alma and now it come to pass that alma have see the affliction of the humble follower of god and the persecution which be heap upon them by the remainder of his people and see all their inequality begin to be very sorrowful nevertheless the spirit of the lord do not fail him . alma and he select a wise man who be among the elder of the church and give him power accord to the voice of the people that he might have power to enact law accord to the law which have be give and to put them in force accord to the wickedness and the crime of the people . alma now this man 's name be nephihah and he be appoint chief judge and he sit in the judgment seat to judge and to govern the people . alma now alma do not grant unto him the office of be high priest over the church but he retain the office of high priest unto himself but he deliver the judgment seat unto nephihah . alma and this he do that he himself might go forth among his people or among the people of nephi that he might preach the word of god unto them to stir them up in remembrance of their duty and that he might pull down by the word of god all the pride and craftiness and all the contention which be among his people see no way that he might reclaim them save it be in bear down in pure testimony against them . alma and thus in the commencement of the ninth year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi alma deliver up the judgment seat to nephihah and confine himself wholly to the high priesthood of the holy order of god to the testimony of the word accord to the spirit of revelation and prophecy . alma chapter alma now it come to pass that alma begin to deliver the word of god unto the people first in the land of zarahemla and from thence throughout all the land . alma and these be the word which he spake to the people in the church which be establish in the city of zarahemla accord to his own record say alma i alma have be consecrate by my father alma to be a high priest over the church of god he have power and authority from god to do these thing behold i say unto you that he begin to establish a church in the land which be in the border of nephi yea the land which be call the land of mormon yea and he do baptize his brother in the water of mormon . alma and behold i say unto you they be deliver out of the hand of the people of king noah by the mercy and power of god . alma and behold after that they be bring into bondage by the hand of the lamanites in the wilderness yea i say unto you they be in captivity and again the lord do deliver them out of bondage by the power of his word and we be bring into this land and here we begin to establish the church of god throughout this land also . alma and now behold i say unto you my brother you that belong to this church have you sufficiently retain in remembrance the captivity of your father ? yea and have you sufficiently retain in remembrance his mercy and long suffering towards them ? and moreover have ye sufficiently retain in remembrance that he have deliver their soul from hell ? alma behold he change their heart yea he awaken them out of a deep sleep and they awake unto god . behold they be in the midst of darkness nevertheless their soul be illuminate by the light of the everlasting word yea they be encircle about by the band of death and the chain of hell and an everlasting destruction do await them . alma and now i ask of you my brother be they destroy ? behold i say unto you nay they be not . alma and again i ask be the band of death broken and the chain of hell which encircle them about be they loose ? i say unto you yea they be loose and their soul do expand and they do sing redeeming love . and i say unto you that they be save . alma and now i ask of you on what condition be they save ? yea what ground have they to hope for salvation ? what be the cause of their be loose from the band of death yea and also the chain of hell ? alma behold i can tell you do not my father alma believe in the word which be deliver by the mouth of abinadi ? and be he not a holy prophet ? do he not speak the word of god and my father alma believe them ? alma and accord to his faith there be a mighty change wrought in his heart . behold i say unto you that this be all true . alma and behold he preach the word unto your father and a mighty change be also work in their heart and they humble themselves and put their trust in the true and living god . and behold they be faithful until the end therefore they be save . alma and now behold i ask of you my brother of the church have ye spiritually be bear of god ? have ye receive his image in your countenance ? have ye experience this mighty change in your heart ? alma do ye exercise faith in the redemption of him who create you ? do you look forward with an eye of faith and view this mortal body raise in immortality and this corruption raise in incorruption to stand before god to be judge accord to the deed which have be do in the mortal body ? alma i say unto you can you imagine to yourselves that ye hear the voice of the lord say unto you in that day come unto
