son of ishmael who be a descendant of aminadi and it be the same aminadi who interpret the writing which be upon the wall of the temple which be write by the finger of god . alma and aminadi be a descendant of nephi who be the son of lehi who come out of the land of jerusalem who be a descendant of manasseh who be the son of joseph who be sell into egypt by the hand of his brother . alma and behold i be also a man of no small reputation among all those who know me yea and behold i have many kindred and friend and i have also acquire much rich by the hand of my industry . alma nevertheless after all this i never have know much of the way of the lord and his mystery and marvelous power . i say i never have know much of these thing but behold i mistake for i have see much of his mystery and his marvelous power yea even in the preservation of the life of this people . alma nevertheless i do harden my heart for i be call many time and i would not hear therefore i know concern these thing yet i would not know therefore i go on rebel against god in the wickedness of my heart even until the fourth day of this seventh month which be in the tenth year of the reign of the judge . alma a i be journey to see a very near kindred behold an angel of the lord appear unto me and say amulek return to thine own house for thou shalt fee a prophet of the lord yea a holy man who be a chosen man of god for he have fast many day because of the sin of this people and he be an hungered and thou shalt receive him into thy house and fee him and he shall bless thee and thy house and the blessing of the lord shall rest upon thee and thy house . alma and it come to pass that i obey the voice of the angel and return towards my house . and a i be go thither i find the man whom the angel say unto me thou shalt receive into thy house and behold it be this same man who have be speak unto you concern the thing of god . alma and the angel say unto me he be a holy man wherefore i know he be a holy man because it be say by an angel of god . alma and again i know that the thing whereof he hath testify be true for behold i say unto you that a the lord liveth even so have he send his angel to make these thing manifest unto me and this he have do while this alma hath dwelt at my house . alma for behold he hath bless mine house he hath bless me and my woman and my child and my father and my kinsfolk yea even all my kindred hath he bless and the blessing of the lord hath rest upon u accord to the word which he spake . alma and now when amulek have speak these word the people begin to be astonish see there be more than one witness who testify of the thing whereof they be accuse and also of the thing which be to come accord to the spirit of prophecy which be in them . alma nevertheless there be some among them who think to question them that by their cunning device they might catch them in their word that they might find witness against them that they might deliver them to their judge that they might be judge accord to the law and that they might be slay or cast into prison accord to the crime which they could make appear or witness against them . alma now it be those men who seek to destroy them who be lawyer who be hire or appoint by the people to administer the law at their time of trial or at the trial of the crime of the people before the judge . alma now these lawyer be learn in all the art and cunning of the people and this be to enable them that they might be skilful in their profession . alma and it come to pass that they begin to question amulek that thereby they might make him cross his word or contradict the word which he should speak . alma now they know not that amulek could know of their design . but it come to pass a they begin to question him he perceive their thought and he say unto them o ye wicked and perverse generation ye lawyer and hypocrite for ye be lay the foundation of the devil for ye be lay trap and snare to catch the holy one of god . alma ye be lay plan to pervert the way of the righteous and to bring down the wrath of god upon your head even to the utter destruction of this people . alma yea well do mosiah say who be our last king when he be about to deliver up the kingdom have no one to confer it upon cause that this people should be govern by their own voice yea well do he say that if the time should come that the voice of this people should choose iniquity that be if the time should come that this people should fall into transgression they would be ripe for destruction . alma and now i say unto you that well doth the lord judge of your iniquity well doth he cry unto this people by the voice of his angel repent ye repent for the kingdom of heaven be at hand . alma yea well doth he cry by the voice of his angel that i will come down among my people with equity and justice in my hand . alma yea and i say unto you that if it be not for the prayer of the righteous who be now in the land that ye would even now be visit with utter destruction yet it would not be by flood a be the people in the day of noah but it would be by famine and by pestilence and the sword . alma but it be by the prayer of the righteous that ye be spar now therefore if ye will cast out the righteous from among you then will not the lord stay his hand but in his fierce anger he will come out against you then ye shall be smite by famine and by pestilence and by the sword and the time be soon at hand except ye repent . alma and now it come to pass that the people be more angry with amulek and they cry out say this man doth revile against our law which be just and our wise lawyer whom we have select . alma but amulek stretch forth his hand and cry the mightier unto them say o ye wicked and perverse generation why hath satan get such great hold upon your heart ? why will ye yield yourselves unto him that he may have power over you to blind your eye that ye will not understand the word which be speak accord to their truth ? alma for behold have i testify against your law ? ye do not understand ye say that i have speak against your law but i have not but i have speak in favor of your law to your condemnation . alma and now behold i say unto you that the foundation of the destruction of this people be begin to be lay by the unrighteousness of your lawyer and your judge . alma and now it come to pass that when amulek have speak these word the people cry out against him say now we know that this man be a child of the devil for he hath lie unto u for he hath speak against our law . and now he say that he have not speak against it . alma and again he have revile against our lawyer and our judge . alma and it come to pass that the lawyer put it into their heart that they should remember these thing against him . alma and there be one among them whose name be zeezrom . now he be the foremost to accuse amulek and alma he be one of the most expert among them have much business to do among the people . alma now the object of these lawyer be to get gain and they get gain accord to their employ . alma chapter alma now it be in the law of mosiah that every man who be a judge of the law or those who be appoint to be judge should receive wage accord to the time which they labor to judge those who be bring before them to be judge . alma now if a man owe another and he would not pay that which he do owe he be complain of to the judge and the judge execute authority and send forth officer that the man should be bring before him and he judge the man accord to the law and the evidence which be bring against him and thus the man be compel to pay that which he owe or be strip or be cast out from among the people a a thief and a robber . alma and the judge receive for his wage accord to his time a senine of gold for a day or a senum of silver which be equal to a senine of gold and this be accord to the law which be give . alma now these be the name of the different piece of their gold and of their silver accord to their value . and the name be give by the nephites for they do not reckon after the manner of the jew who be at jerusalem neither do they measure after the manner of the jew but they alter their reckoning and their measure accord to the mind and the circumstance of the people in every generation until the reign of the judge they have be establish by king mosiah . alma now the reckoning be thus a senine of gold a seon of gold a shum of gold and a limnah of gold . alma a senum of silver an amnor of silver an ezrom of silver and an onti of silver . alma a senum of silver be equal to a senine of gold and either for a measure of barley and also for a measure of every kind of grain . alma now the amount of a seon of gold be twice the value of a senine . alma and a shum of gold be twice the value of a seon . alma and a limnah of gold be the value of them all . alma and an amnor of silver be as great a two senums . alma and an ezrom of silver be as great a four senums . alma and an onti be as great a them all . alma now this be the value of the less number of their reckoning alma a shiblon be half of a senum therefore a shiblon for half a measure of barley . alma and a shiblum be a half of a shiblon . alma and a leah be the half of a shiblum . alma now this be their number accord to their reckoning . alma now an antion of gold be equal to three shiblons . alma now it be for the sole purpose to get gain because they receive their wage accord to their employ therefore they do stir up the people to rioting and all manner of disturbance and wickedness that they might have more employ that they might get money accord to the suit which be bring before them therefore they do stir up the people against alma and amulek . alma and this zeezrom begin to question amulek say will ye answer me a few question which i shall ask you ? now zeezrom be a man who be expert in the device of the devil that he might destroy that which be good therefore he say unto amulek will ye answer the question which i shall put unto you ? alma and amulek say unto him yea if it be accord to the spirit of the lord which be in me for i shall say nothing which be contrary to the spirit of the lord . and zeezrom say unto him behold here be six onties of silver and all these will i give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a supreme be . alma now amulek say o thou child of hell why tempt ye me ? knowest thou that the righteous yieldeth to no such temptation ? alma believest thou that there be no god ? i say unto you nay thou unto thee when thou hadst it in thy heart to retain them from me and it be only thy desire that i should deny the true and living god that thou mightest have cause to destroy me . and now behold for shall come but he shall not save his people a though he have authority to command god . alma now amulek saith again unto him behold thou hast lie for thou sayest that i spake a though i have authority to command god because i say he shall not save his people in their sin . alma and i say unto you again that he can not save them in their sin for i can not deny his word and he hath say that no unclean thing can inherit the kingdom of heaven therefore how can ye be save except ye inherit the kingdom of heaven ? therefore ye can not be save in your sin . alma now zeezrom saith again unto him be the son of god the very eternal father ? alma and amulek say unto him yea he be the very eternal father of heaven and of earth and all thing which in them be he be the beginning and the end the and save them from the flame . alma but alma say unto him the spirit constraineth me that i must not stretch forth mine hand for behold the lord receiveth them up unto himself in glory and he doth suffer that they may do this thing or that the people may do this thing unto them accord to the hardness of their heart that the judgment which he shall exercise upon them in his wrath may be just and the blood of the innocent shall stand a a witness against them yea and cry mightily against them at the last day . alma now amulek say unto alma behold perhaps they will burn u also . alma and alma say be it accord to the will of the lord . but behold our work be not finish therefore they burn u not . alma now it come to pass that when the body of those who have be cast into the fire be consume and also the record which be cast in with them the chief judge of the land come and stand before alma and amulek a they be bind and he smite them with his hand upon their cheek and say unto them after what ye have see will ye preach again unto this people that they shall be cast into a lake of fire and brimstone ? alma behold ye see that ye have not power to save those who have be cast into the fire neither have god save them because they be of thy faith . and the judge smite them again upon their cheek and ask what say ye for yourselves ? alma now this judge be after the order and faith of nehor who slew gideon . alma and it come to pass that alma and amulek answer him nothing and he smite them again and deliver them to the officer to be cast into prison . alma and when they have be cast into prison three day there come many lawyer and judge and priest and teacher who be of the profession of nehor and they come in unto the prison to see them and they question them about many word but they answer them nothing . alma and it come to pass that the judge stand before them and say why do ye not answer the word of this people ? know ye not that i have power to deliver you up unto the flame ? and he command them to speak but they answer nothing . alma and it come to pass that they depart and go their way but come again on the morrow and the judge also smite them again on their cheek . and many come forth also and smite them say will ye stand again and judge this people and condemn our law ? if ye have such great power why do ye not deliver yourselves ? alma and many such thing do they say unto them gnash their teeth upon them and spit upon them and say how shall we look when we be damn ? alma and many such thing yea all manner of such thing do they say unto them and thus they do mock them for many day . and they do withhold food from them that they might hunger and water that they might thirst and they also do take from them their clothes that they be naked and thus they be bind with strong cord and confine in prison . alma and it come to pass after they have thus suffer for many day and it be on the twelfth day in the tenth month in the tenth year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi that the chief judge over the land of ammonihah and many of their teacher and their lawyer go in unto the prison where alma and amulek be bind with cord . alma and the chief judge stand before them and smite them again and say unto them if ye have the power of god deliver yourselves from these band and then we will believe that the lord will destroy this people accord to your word . alma and it come to pass that they all go forth and smite them say the same word even until the last and when the last have speak unto them the power of god be upon alma and amulek and they rise and stand upon their foot . alma and alma cry say how long shall we suffer these great affliction o lord ? o lord give u strength accord to our faith which be in christ even unto deliverance . and they break the cord with which they be bind and when the people saw this they begin to flee for the fear of destruction have come upon them . alma and it come to pass that so great be their fear that they fell to the earth and do not obtain the out door of the prison and the earth shake mightily and the wall of the prison be rent in twain so that they fell to the earth and the chief judge and the lawyer and priest and teacher who smite upon alma and amulek be slay by the fall thereof . alma and alma and amulek come forth out of the prison and they be not hurt for the lord have grant unto them power accord to their faith which be in christ . and they straightway come forth out of the prison and they be loose from their band and the prison have fall to the earth and every soul within the wall thereof save it be alma and amulek be slay and they straightway come forth into the city . alma now the people have hear a great noise come run together by multitude to know the cause of it and when they saw alma and amulek come forth out of the prison and the wall thereof have fall to the earth they be strike with great fear and flee from the presence of alma and amulek even a a goat fleeth with her young from two lion and thus they do flee from the presence of alma and amulek . alma chapter alma and it come to pass that alma and amulek be command to depart out of that city and they depart and come out even into the land of sidom and behold there they find all the people who have depart out of the land of ammonihah who have be cast out and stone because they believe in the word of alma . alma and they relate unto them all that have happen unto their wife and child and also concern themselves and of their power of deliverance . alma and also zeezrom lay sick at sidom with a burning fever which be cause by the great tribulation of his mind on account of his wickedness for he suppose that alma and amulek be no more and he suppose that they have be slain because of his iniquity . and this great sin and his many other sin do harrow up his mind until it do become exceedingly sore have no deliverance therefore he begin to be scorch with a burning heat . alma now when he hear that alma and amulek be in the land of sidom his heart begin to take courage and he send a message immediately unto them desire them to come unto him . alma and it come to pass that they go immediately obey the message which he have send unto them and they go in unto the house unto zeezrom and they find him upon his bed sick be very low with a burning fever and his mind also be exceedingly sore because of his iniquity and when he saw them he stretch forth his hand and beseech them that they would heal him . alma and it come to pass that alma say unto him take him by the hand believest thou in the power of christ unto salvation ? alma and he answer and say yea i believe all the word that thou hast taught . alma and alma say if thou believest in the redemption of christ thou canst be heal . alma and he say yea i believe accord to thy word . alma and then alma cry unto the lord say o lord our god have mercy on this man and heal him accord to his faith which be in christ . alma and when alma have say these word zeezrom leap upon his foot and begin to walk and this be do to the great astonishment of all the people and the knowledge of this go forth throughout all the land of sidom . alma and alma baptize zeezrom unto the lord and he begin from that time forth to preach unto the people . alma and alma establish a church in the land of sidom and consecrated priest and teacher in the land to baptize unto the lord whosoever be desirous to be baptize . alma and it come to pass that they be many for they do flock in from all the region round about sidom and be baptize . alma but a to the people that be in the land of ammonihah they yet remain a hard hearted and a stiffnecked people and they repent not of their sin ascribe all the power of alma and amulek to the devil for they be of the profession of nehor and do not believe in the repentance of their sin . alma and it come to pass that alma and amulek amulek have forsake all his gold and silver and his precious thing which be in the land of ammonihah for the word of god he be reject by those who be once his friend and also by his father and his kindred alma therefore after alma have establish the church at sidom see a great check yea see that the people be check a to the pride of their heart and begin to humble themselves before god and begin to assemble themselves together at their sanctuary to worship god before the altar watching and pray continually that they might be deliver from satan and from death and from destruction alma now a i say alma have see all these thing therefore he take amulek and come over to the land of zarahemla and take him to his own house and do administer unto him in his tribulation and strengthen him in the lord . alma and thus end the tenth year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi . alma chapter alma and it come to pass in the eleventh year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi on the fifth day of the second month there have be much peace in the land of zarahemla there have be no war nor contention for a certain number of year even until the fifth day of the second month in the eleventh year there be a cry of war heard throughout the land . alma for behold the army of the lamanites have come in upon the wilderness side into the border of the land even into the city of ammonihah and begin to slay the people and destroy the city . alma and now it come to pass before the nephites could raise a sufficient army to drive them out of the land they have destroy the people who be in the city of ammonihah and also some around the border of noah and take others captive into the wilderness . alma now it come to pass that the nephites be desirous to obtain those who have be carry away captive into the wilderness . alma therefore he that have be appoint chief captain over the army of the nephites and his name be zoram and he have two son lehi and aha now zoram and his two son know that alma be high priest over the church and have heard that he have the spirit of prophecy therefore they go unto him and desire of him to know whither the lord would that they should go into the wilderness in search of their brother who have be take captive by the lamanites . alma and it come to pass that alma inquire of the lord concern the matter . and alma return and say unto them behold the lamanites will cross the river sidon in the south wilderness away up beyond the border of the land of manti . and behold there shall ye meet them on the east of the river sidon and there the lord will deliver unto thee thy brother who have be take captive by the lamanites . alma and it come to pass that zoram and his son cross over the river sidon with their army and march away beyond the border of manti into the south wilderness which be on the east side of the river sidon . alma and they come upon the army of the lamanites and the lamanites be scatter and drive into the wilderness and they take their brother who have be take captive by the lamanites and there be not one soul of them have be lose that be take captive . and they be bring by their brother to possess their own land . alma and thus end the eleventh year of the judge the lamanites have be drive out of the land and the people of ammonihah be destroy yea every living soul of the ammonihahites be destroy and also their great city which they say god could not destroy because of it greatness . alma but behold in one day it be leave desolate and the carcass be mangle by dog and wild beast of the wilderness . alma nevertheless after many day their dead body be heap up upon the face of the earth and they be cover with a shallow covering . and now so great be the scent thereof that the people do not go in to possess the land of ammonihah for many year . and it be call desolation of nehors for they be of the profession of nehor who be slain and their land remain desolate . alma and the lamanites do not come again to war against the nephites until the fourteenth year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi . and thus for three year do the people of nephi have continual peace in all the land . alma and alma and amulek go forth preach repentance to the people in their temple and in their sanctuary and also in their synagogue which be build after the manner of the jew . alma and as many a would hear their word unto them they do impart the word of god without any respect of person continually . alma and thus do alma and amulek go forth and also many more who have be choose for the work to preach the word throughout all the land . and the establishment of the church become general throughout the land in all the region round about among all the people of the nephites . alma and there be no inequality among them the lord do pour out his spirit on all the face of the land to prepare the mind of the child of men or to prepare their heart to receive the word which should be teach among them at the time of his come alma that they might not be harden against the word that they might not be unbelieving and go on to destruction but that they might receive the word with joy and a a branch be graft into the true vine that they might enter into the rest of the lord their god . alma now those priest who do go forth among the people do preach against all lying and deceivings and envyings and strife and malice and revilings and steal rob plunder murder commit adultery and all manner of lasciviousness cry that these thing ought not so to be alma hold forth thing which must shortly come yea hold forth the come of the son of god his suffering and death and also the resurrection of the dead . alma and many of the people do inquire concern the place where the son of god should come and they be teach that he would appear unto them after his resurrection and this the people do hear with great joy and gladness . alma and now after the church have be establish throughout all the land have get the victory over the devil and the word of god be preach in it purity in all the land and the lord pour out his blessing upon the people thus end the fourteenth year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi . alma chapter alma and now it come to pass that a alma be journey from the land of gideon southward away to the land of manti behold to his astonishment he meet with the son of mosiah journeying towards the land of zarahemla . alma now these son of mosiah be with alma at the time the angel first appear unto him therefore alma do rejoice exceedingly to see his brother and what add more to his joy they be still his brother in the lord yea and they have wax strong in the knowledge of the truth for they be men of a sound understanding and they have search the scripture diligently that they might know the word of god . alma but this be not all they have give themselves to much prayer and fast therefore they have the spirit of prophecy and the spirit of revelation and when they teach they teach with power and authority of god . alma and they have be teach the word of god for the space of fourteen year among the lamanites have have much success in bring many to the knowledge of the truth yea by the power of their word many be bring before the altar of god to call on his name and confess their sin before him . alma now these be the circumstance which attend them in their journeying for they have many affliction they do suffer much both in body and in mind such a hunger thirst and fatigue and also much labor in the spirit . alma now these be their journeying have take leave of their father mosiah in the first year of the judge have refuse the kingdom which their father be desirous to confer upon them and also this be the mind of the people alma nevertheless they depart out of the land of zarahemla and take their sword and their spear and their bow and their arrow and their sling and this they do that they might provide food for themselves and a harden and a ferocious people a people who delight in murder the nephites and rob and plunder them and their heart be set upon rich or upon gold and silver and precious stone yet they seek to set among other servant to watch the flock of lamoni accord to the custom of the lamanites . alma and after he have be in the service of the king three day a he be with the lamanitish servant go forth these men . and they begin to weep exceedingly say behold our flock be scatter already . alma now they weep because of the fear of be slay . now when ammon saw this his heart be swell within him with and he will not slay u . alma and it come to pass that they go in search of the flock and they do follow ammon and they rush forth with much swiftness and do head the flock of the king and do gather them together again to the place of water . alma and those men again stand to scatter their flock but ammon say unto his brother encircle the flock round about that they flee not and i go and contend with these men who do scatter our flock . alma therefore they do a ammon command them and he go forth and stand to contend with those who stand by the water of sebus and they be in number not a few . alma therefore they do not fear ammon for they suppose that one of their men could slay him accord to their pleasure for they know not that the lord have promise mosiah that he would deliver his son alma now it be the practice of these lamanites to stand by the water of sebus to scatter the flock of the people that thereby they might drive away many that be scatter unto their own land it be a practice of plunder among them . alma and it come to pass that king lamoni inquire of his servant say where be this man that have such great power ? alma and they say unto him behold he be feed thy alma and it come to pass that after he have say all these thing and expound them to the king that the king believe all his word . alma and he begin to cry unto the lord say o lord have mercy accord to thy abundant mercy which thou hast have upon the people of nephi have upon me and my people . alma and now when he have say this he fell unto the earth a if he be dead . alma and it come to pass that after the manner of the lamanites greatly lament his loss . alma chapter alma and it come to pass that after two day and two night they be about to take his body and lay it in a sepulchre which they of two day and two night and some say that he be not dead but others say that he be dead and that he stinketh and that he ought to be place in the sepulchre but a for myself to me he doth not stink . alma now this be what ammon desire for he know that king lamoni be under the power of god he know that the dark veil of unbelief be be cast away from his mind and the light which do light up his mind that he arise accord to the word of ammon and a he arise he stretch forth his hand unto the woman and say bless be the name of god and bless art thou . alma for as sure a thou liv behold i have see my that by behold this scene it would cause them to believe in the power of god therefore she run forth from house to house make it known unto the people . alma and they begin to assemble themselves together unto the house of the king . and there come a multitude and to their astonishment they behold the king and the queen and their servant prostrate upon the earth and they all lay there a though they be dead and they also saw ammon and behold he be a nephite . alma and now the people begin to murmur among themselves some say that it be a great evil that have come upon them or upon the king and his house because he have suffer that the nephite should remain in the land . alma but others rebuke them say the king hath bring this evil upon his house because he slew his servant who have have their flock scatter at the water of sebus . alma and they be also rebuke by those men who have stand at the water of sebus and scatter the flock which belong to the king for they be angry with ammon because of the number which he have slain of their brother at the water of sebus while defend the flock of the king . alma now one of them whose brother have be slay with the sword of ammon be exceedingly angry with ammon draw his sword and go forth that he might let it fall upon ammon to slay him and a he lift the sword to smite him behold he fell dead . alma now we see that ammon could not be slay for the lord have say unto mosiah his father i will spare him and it shall be unto him accord to thy faith therefore mosiah trust him unto the lord . alma and it come to pass that when the multitude beheld that the man have fall dead who lift the sword to slay ammon fear come upon them all and they durst not put forth their hand to touch him or any of those who have fall and they begin to marvel again among themselves what could be the cause of this great power or what all these thing could mean . alma and it come to pass that there be many among them who say that ammon be the great spirit and others say he be send by the great spirit alma but others rebuke them all say that he be a monster who have be send from the nephites to torment them . alma and there be some who say that ammon be send by the great spirit to afflict them because of their iniquity and that it be the great spirit that have always attend the nephites who have ever deliver them out of their hand and they say that it be this great spirit who have destroy so many of their brother the lamanites . alma and thus the contention begin to be exceedingly sharp among them . and while they be thus contend the woman servant who have cause the multitude to be gather together come and when she saw the contention which be among the multitude she be exceedingly sorrowful even unto tear . alma and it come to pass that she go and take the queen by the hand that perhaps she might raise her from the ground and as soon a she touch her hand she arise and stand upon her foot and cry with a loud voice say o bless jesus who have save me from an awful hell ! o bless god have mercy on this people ! alma and when she have say this she clasp her hand be fill with joy speak many word which be not understood and when she have do this she take the king lamoni by the hand and behold he arise and stand upon his foot . alma and he immediately see the contention among his people go forth and begin to rebuke . alma chapter alma behold now it come to pass that the king of the lamanites send a proclamation among all his people that they should not lay their hand on ammon or aaron or omner or himni nor yea my great god that he hath grant unto u that we might repent of these thing and also that he hath forgiven u of those our many sin and murder which we have commit and take away the guilt from our stain with the blood of our brother for perhaps if we should stain our sword again they can no more be wash bright through the blood of the son of our great god which shall be shed for the atonement alma and thus we see that when these lamanites be bring to believe and to know the truth they be firm and would suffer even unto death rather than commit sin and thus we see that they bury their weapon of peace or they bury the weapon of war for peace . alma and it come to pass that their brother the lamanites make preparation for war and come up to the land of nephi for the purpose of alma now this man go over to the land of jershon also to preach these thing among the people of ammon who be once the people of the lamanites . alma but behold they be more wise than many of the nephites for they take him and bind him and carry him before ammon who be a high priest over that people . alma and it come to pass that he cause that he should be carry out of the land . and he come over into the land of gideon and begin to preach unto them also and here he do not have much success for he be take and bind and carry before the high priest and also the chief judge over the land . alma and it come to pass that the high priest say unto him why do ye go about pervert the way of the lord ? why do ye teach this people that there shall be no christ to interrupt their rejoicing ? why do ye speak against all the prophecy of the holy prophet ? alma now the high priest 's name be giddonah . and korihor say unto him because i do not teach the foolish tradition of your father and because i do not teach this people to bind themselves down under the foolish ordinance and performance which be lay down by ancient priest to usurp power and authority over them to keep them in ignorance that they may not lift up their head but be bring down accord to thy word . alma ye say that this people be a free people . behold i say they be in bondage . ye say that those ancient prophecy be true . behold i say that ye do not know that they be true . alma ye say that this people be a guilty and a fall people because of the transgression of a parent . behold i say that a child be not guilty because of it parent . alma and ye also say that christ shall come . but behold i say that ye do not know that there shall be a christ . and ye say also that he shall be slay for the sin of the world alma and thus ye lead away this people after the foolish tradition of your father and accord to your own desire and ye keep them down even a it be in bondage that ye may glut yourselves with the labor of their hand that they durst not look up with boldness and that they durst not enjoy their right and privilege . alma yea they durst not make use of that which be their own l they should offend their priest who do yoke them accord to their desire and have bring them to believe by their tradition and their dream and their whim and their vision and their pretended mystery that they should if they do not do accord to their word offend some unknown be who they say be god a be who never have be see or know who never be nor ever will be . alma now when the high priest and the chief judge saw the hardness of his heart yea when they saw that he would revile even against god they would not make any reply to his word but they cause that he should be bind and they deliver him up into the hand of the officer and send him to the land of zarahemla that he might be bring before alma and the chief judge who be governor over all the land . alma and it come to pass that when he be bring before alma and the chief judge he do go on in the same manner a he do in the land of gideon yea he go on to blaspheme . alma and he do rise up in great swell word before alma and do revile against the priest and teacher accuse them of lead away the people after the silly tradition of their father for the sake of glut on the labor of the people . alma now alma say unto him thou knowest that we do not glut ourselves upon the labor of this people for behold i have labor even from the commencement of the reign of the judge until now with mine own hand for my support notwithstanding my many travel round about the land to declare the word of god unto my people . alma and notwithstanding the many labor which i have perform in the church i have never receive so much a even one senine for my labor neither have any of my brother save it be in the judgment seat and then we have receive only accord to law for our time . alma and now if we do not receive anything for our labor in the church what doth it profit u to labor in the church save it be to declare the truth that we may have rejoicing in the joy of our brother ? alma then why sayest thou that we preach unto this people to get gain when thou of thyself knowest that we receive no gain ? and now believest thou that we deceive this people that cause such joy in their heart ? alma and korihor answer him yea . alma and then alma say unto him believest thou that there be a god ? alma and he answer nay . alma now alma say unto him will ye deny again that there be a god and also deny the christ ? for behold i say unto you i know there be a god and also that christ shall come . alma and now what evidence have ye that there be no god or that christ cometh not ? i say unto you that ye have none save it be your word only . alma but behold i have all thing a a testimony that these thing be true and ye also have all thing a a testimony unto you that they be true and will ye deny them ? believest thou that these thing be true ? alma behold i know that thou believest but thou art possess with a lie spirit and ye have put off the spirit of god that it may have no place in you but the devil have power over you and he doth carry you about work device that he may destroy the child of god . alma and now korihor say unto alma if thou wilt show me a sign that i may be convince that there be a god yea show unto me that he hath power and then will i be convince of the truth of thy word . alma but alma say unto him thou hast have sign enough will ye tempt your god ? will ye say show unto me a sign when ye have the testimony of all these thy brother and also all the holy prophet ? the scripture be lay before thee yea and all thing denote there be a god yea even the earth and all thing that be upon the face of it yea and it motion yea and also all the planet which move in their regular form do witness that there be a supreme creator . alma and yet do ye go about lead away the heart of this people testify unto them there be no god ? and yet will ye deny against all these witness ? and he say yea i will deny except ye shall show me a sign . alma and now it come to pass that alma say unto him behold i be grieve because of the hardness of your heart yea that ye will still resist the spirit of the truth that thy soul may be destroy . alma but behold it be well that thy soul should be lose than that thou shouldst be the mean of bring many soul down to destruction by thy lying and by thy flattering word therefore if thou shalt deny again behold god shall smite thee that thou shalt become dumb that thou shalt never open thy mouth any more that thou shalt not deceive this people any more . alma now korihor say unto him i do not deny the existence of a god but i do not believe that there be a god and i say also that ye do not know that there be a god and except ye show me a sign i will not believe . alma now alma say unto him this will i give unto thee for a sign that thou shalt be strike dumb accord to my word and i say that in the name of god ye shall be strike dumb that ye shall no more have utterance . alma now when alma have say these word korihor be strike dumb that he could not have utterance accord to the word of alma . alma and now when the chief judge saw this he put forth his hand and write unto korihor say art thou convince of the power of god ? in whom do ye desire that alma should show forth his sign ? would ye that he should afflict others to show unto thee a sign ? behold he have show unto you a sign and now will ye dispute more ? alma and korihor put forth his hand and write say i know that i be dumb for i can not speak and i know that nothing save it be the power of god could bring this upon me yea and i always know that there be a god . alma but behold the devil hath deceive me for he appear unto me in the form of an angel and say unto me go and reclaim this people for they have all go astray after an unknown god . and he say unto me there be no god yea and he teach me that which i should say . and i have teach his word and i teach them because they be please unto the carnal mind and i teach them even until i have much success insomuch that i verily believe that they be true and for this cause i withstand the truth even until i have bring this great curse upon me . alma now when he have say this he beseech that alma should pray unto god that the curse might be take from him . alma but alma say unto him if this curse should be take from thee thou wouldst again lead away the heart of this people therefore it shall be unto thee even a the lord will . alma and it come to pass that the curse be not take off of korihor but he be cast out and go about from house to house beg for his food . alma now the knowledge of what have happen unto korihor be immediately publish throughout all the land yea the proclamation be send forth by the chief judge to all the people in the land declare unto those who have believe in the word of korihor that they must speedily repent lest the same judgment would come unto them . alma and it come to pass that they be all convince of the wickedness of korihor therefore they be all convert again unto the lord and this put an end to the iniquity after the manner of korihor . and korihor do go about from house to house beg food for his support . alma and it come to pass that a he go forth among the people yea among a people who have separate themselves from the nephites and call themselves zoramites be lead by a man whose name be zoram and a he go forth amongst them behold he be run upon and tread down even until he be dead . alma and thus we see the end of him who perverteth the way of the lord and thus we see that the devil will not support his child at the last day but doth speedily drag them down to hell . alma chapter alma now it come to pass that after the end of korihor alma have receive tidings that the zoramites be pervert the way of the lord and that zoram who be their leader be lead the heart of the people to bow down to dumb idols his heart again begin to sicken because of the iniquity of the people . alma for it be the cause of great sorrow to alma to know of iniquity among his people therefore his heart be exceedingly sorrowful because of the separation of the zoramites from the nephites . alma now the zoramites have gather themselves together in a land which they call antionum which be east of the land of zarahemla which lay nearly border upon the seashore which be south of the land of jershon which also border upon the wilderness south which wilderness be full of the lamanites . alma now the nephites greatly fear that the zoramites would enter into a correspondence with the lamanites and that it would be the mean of great loss on the part of the nephites . alma and now a the preaching of the word have a great tendency to lead the people to do that which be just yea it have have more powerful effect upon the mind of the people than the sword or anything else which have happen unto them therefore alma think it be expedient that they should try the virtue of the word of god . alma therefore he take ammon and aaron and omner and himni he do leave in the church in zarahemla but the former three he take with him and also amulek and zeezrom who be at melek and he also take two of his son . alma now the eldest of his son he take not with him and his name be helaman but the name of those whom he take with him be shiblon and corianton and these be the name of those who go with him among the zoramites to preach unto them the word . alma now the zoramites be dissenter from the nephites therefore they have have the word of god preach unto them . alma but they have fall into great error for they would not observe to keep the commandment of god and his statute accord to the law of moses . alma neither would they observe the performance of the church to continue in prayer and supplication to god daily that they might not enter into temptation . alma yea in fine they do pervert the way of the lord in very many instance therefore for this cause alma and his brother go into the land to preach the word unto them . alma now when they have come into the land behold to their astonishment they find that the zoramites have build synagogue and that they do gather themselves together on one day of the week which day they do call the day of the lord and they do worship after a manner which alma and his brother have never behold alma for they have a place build up in the center of their synagogue a place for stand which be high above the head and the top thereof would only admit one person . alma therefore whosoever desire to worship must go forth and stand upon the top thereof and stretch forth his hand towards heaven and cry with a loud voice say alma holy holy god we believe that thou art god and we believe that thou art holy and that thou wast a spirit and that thou art a spirit and that thou wilt be a spirit forever . alma holy god we believe that thou hast separate u from our brother and we do not believe in the tradition of our brother which be hand down to them by the childishness of their father but we believe that thou hast elect u to be thy holy child and also thou hast make it know unto u that there shall be no christ . alma but thou art the same yesterday today and forever and thou hast elect u that we shall be save whilst all around u be elect to be cast by thy wrath down to hell for the which holiness o god we thank thee and we also thank thee that thou hast elect u that we may not be lead away after the foolish tradition of our brother which doth bind them down to a belief of christ which doth lead their heart to wander far from thee our god . alma and again we thank thee o god that we be a chosen and a holy people . amen . alma now it come to pass that after alma and his brother and his son have hear these prayer they be astonish beyond all measure . alma for behold every man do go forth and offer up these same prayer . alma now the place be call by them rameumptom which be interpret be the holy stand . alma now from this stand they do offer up every man the selfsame prayer unto god thank their god that they be choose of him and that he do not lead them away after the tradition of their brother and that their heart be not steal away to believe in thing to come which they know nothing about . alma now after the people have all offer up thanks after this manner they return to their home never speak of their god again until they have assemble themselves together again to the holy stand to offer up thanks after their manner . alma now when alma saw this his heart be grieve for he saw that they be a wicked and a perverse people yea he saw that their heart be set upon gold and upon silver and upon all manner of fine good . alma yea and he also saw that their heart be lift up unto great boasting in their pride . alma and he lift up his voice to heaven and cry say o how long o lord wilt thou suffer that thy servant shall dwell here below in the flesh to behold such gross wickedness among the child of men ? alma behold o god they cry unto thee and yet their heart be swallow up in their pride . behold o god they cry unto thee with their mouth while they be puff up even to greatness with the vain thing of the world . alma behold o my god their costly apparel and their ringlet and their bracelet and their ornament of gold and all their precious thing which they be ornament with and behold their heart be set upon them and yet they cry unto thee and say we thank thee o god for we be a chosen people unto thee while others shall perish . alma yea and they say that thou hast make it know unto them that there shall be no christ . alma o lord god how long wilt thou suffer that such wickedness and infidelity shall be among this people ? o lord wilt thou give me strength that i may bear with mine infirmity . for i be infirm and such wickedness among this people doth pain my soul . alma o lord my heart be exceedingly sorrowful wilt thou comfort my soul in christ . o lord wilt thou grant unto me that i may have strength that i may suffer with patience these affliction which shall come upon me because of the iniquity of this people . alma o lord wilt thou comfort my soul and give unto me success and also my fellow laborer who be with me yea ammon and aaron and omner and also amulek and zeezrom and also my two son yea even all these wilt thou comfort o lord . yea wilt thou comfort their soul in christ . alma wilt thou grant unto them that they may have strength that they may bear their affliction which shall come upon them because of the iniquity of this people . alma o lord wilt thou grant unto u that we may have success in bring them again unto thee in christ . alma behold o lord their soul be precious and many of them be our brother therefore give unto u o lord power and wisdom that we may bring these our brother again unto thee . alma now it come to pass that when alma have say these word that he clap his hand upon all them who be with him . and behold a he clap his hand upon them they be fill with the holy spirit . alma and after that they do separate themselves one from another take no thought for themselves what they should eat or what they should drink or what they should put on . alma and the lord provide for them that they should hunger not neither should they thirst yea and he also give them strength that they should suffer no manner of affliction save it be swallow up in the joy of christ . now this be accord to the prayer of alma and this because he pray in faith . alma chapter alma and it come to pass that they do go forth and begin to preach the word of god unto the people enter into their synagogue and into their house yea and even they do preach the word in their street . alma and it come to pass that after much labor among them they begin to have success among the poor class of people for behold they be cast out of the synagogue because of the coarseness of their apparel alma therefore they be not permit to enter into their synagogue to worship god be esteem a filthiness therefore they be poor yea they be esteem by their brother a dross therefore they be poor a to thing of the world and also they be poor in heart . alma now a alma be teach and speak unto the people upon the hill onidah there come a great multitude unto him who be those of whom we have be speak of whom be poor in heart because of their poverty a to the thing of the world . alma and they come unto alma and the one who be the foremost among them say unto him behold what shall these my brother do for they be despise of all men because of their poverty yea and more especially by our priest for they have cast u out of our synagogue which we have labor abundantly to build with our own hand and they have cast u out because of our exceed poverty and we have no place to worship our god and behold what shall we do ? alma and now when alma heard this he turn him about his face immediately towards him and he behold with great joy for he behold that their affliction have truly humble them and that they be in a preparation to hear the word . alma therefore he do say no more to the other multitude but he stretch forth his hand and cry unto those whom he behold who be truly penitent and say unto them alma i behold that ye be lowly in heart and if so bless be ye . alma behold thy brother hath say what shall we do ? for we be cast out of our synagogue that we can not worship our god . alma behold i say unto you do ye suppose that ye can not worship god save it be in your synagogue only ? alma moreover i would ask do ye suppose that ye must not worship god only once in a week ? alma i say unto you it be well that ye be cast out of your synagogue that ye may be humble and that ye may learn wisdom for it be necessary that ye should learn wisdom for it be because that ye be cast out that ye be despise of your brother because of your exceed poverty that ye be bring to a lowliness of heart for ye be necessarily bring to be humble . alma and now because ye be compel to be humble bless be ye for a man sometimes if he be compel to be humble seeketh repentance and now surely whosoever repenteth shall find mercy and he that findeth mercy and endureth to the end the same shall be save . alma and now a i say unto you that because ye be compel to be humble ye be bless do ye not suppose that they be more blessed who truly humble themselves because of the word ? alma yea he that truly humbleth himself and repenteth of his sin and endureth to the end the same shall be bless yea much more blessed than they who be compel to be humble because of their exceed poverty . alma therefore bless be they who humble themselves without be compel to be humble or rather in other word bless be he that believeth in the word of god and be baptize without stubbornness of heart yea without be bring to know the word or even compel to know before they will believe . alma yea there be many who do say if thou wilt show unto u a sign from heaven then we shall know of a surety then we shall believe . alma now i ask be this faith ? behold i say unto you nay for if a man knoweth a thing he hath no cause to believe for he knoweth it . alma and now how much more cursed be he that knoweth the will of god and doeth it not than he that only believeth or only hath cause to believe and falleth into transgression ? alma now of this thing ye must judge . behold i say unto you that it be on the one hand even a it be on the other and it shall be unto every man accord to his work . alma and now a i say concern faith faith be not to have a perfect knowledge of thing therefore if ye have faith ye hope for thing which be not see which be true . alma and now behold i say unto you and i would that ye should remember that god be merciful unto all who believe on his name therefore he desireth in the first place that ye should believe yea even on his word . alma and now he imparteth his word by angel unto men yea not only men but woman also . now this be not all little child do have word give unto them many time which confound the wise and the learn . alma and now my beloved brother a ye have desire to know of me what ye shall do because ye be afflict and cast out now i do not desire that ye should suppose that i mean to judge you only accord to that which be true alma for i do not mean that ye all of you have be compel to humble yourselves for i verily believe that there be some among you who would humble themselves let them be in whatsoever circumstance they might . alma now a i say concern faith that it be not a perfect knowledge even so it be with my word . ye can not know of their surety at first unto perfection any more than faith be a perfect knowledge . alma but behold if ye will awake and arouse your faculty even to an experiment upon my word and exercise a particle of faith yea even if ye can no more than desire to believe let this desire work in you even until ye believe in a manner that ye can give place for a portion of my word . alma now we will compare the word unto a seed . now if ye give place that a seed may be plant in your heart behold if it be a true seed or a good seed if ye do not cast it out by your unbelief that ye will resist the spirit of the lord behold it will begin to swell within your breast and when you feel these swell motion ye will begin to say within yourselves it must needs be that this be a good seed or that the word be good for it beginneth to enlarge my soul yea it beginneth to enlighten my understanding yea it beginneth to be delicious to me . alma now behold would not this increase your faith ? i say unto you yea nevertheless it hath not grow up to a perfect knowledge . alma but behold a the seed swelleth and sprouteth and beginneth to grow then you must need say that the seed be good for behold it swelleth and sprouteth and beginneth to grow . and now behold will not this strengthen your faith ? yea it will strengthen your faith for ye will say i know that this be a good seed for behold it sprouteth and beginneth to grow . alma and now behold be ye sure that this be a good seed ? i say unto you yea for every seed bringeth forth unto it own likeness . alma therefore if a seed groweth it be good but if it groweth not behold it be not good therefore it be cast away . alma and now behold because ye have try the experiment and plant the seed and it swelleth and sprouteth and beginneth to grow ye must need know that the seed be good . alma and now behold be your knowledge perfect ? yea your knowledge be perfect in that thing and your faith be dormant and this because ye know for ye know that the word hath swell your soul and ye also know that it hath sprout up that your understanding doth begin to be enlighten and your mind doth begin to expand . alma o then be not this real ? i say unto you yea because it be light and whatsoever be light be good because it be discernible therefore ye must know that it be good and now behold after ye have taste this light be your knowledge perfect ? alma behold i say unto you nay neither must ye lay aside your faith for ye have only exercise your faith to plant the seed that ye might try the experiment to know if the seed be good . alma and behold a the tree beginneth to grow ye will say let u nourish it with great care that it may get root that it may grow up and bring forth fruit unto u . and now behold if ye nourish it with much care it will get root and grow up and bring forth fruit . alma but if ye neglect the tree and take no thought for it nourishment behold it will not get any root and when the heat of the sun cometh and scorcheth it because it hath no root it wither away and ye pluck it up and cast it out . alma now this be not because the seed be not good neither be it because the fruit thereof would not be desirable but it be because your ground be barren and ye will not nourish the tree therefore ye can not have the fruit thereof . alma and thus if ye will not nourish the word look forward with an eye of faith to the fruit thereof ye can never pluck of the fruit of the tree of life . alma but if ye will nourish the word yea nourish the tree a it beginneth to grow by your faith with great diligence and with patience look forward to the fruit thereof it shall take root and behold it shall be a tree spring up unto everlasting life . alma and because of your diligence and your faith and your patience with the word in nourish it that it may take root in you behold by and by ye shall pluck the fruit thereof which be most precious which be sweet above all that be sweet and which be white above all that be white yea and pure above all that be pure and ye shall feast upon this fruit even until ye be fill that ye hunger not neither shall ye thirst . alma then my brother ye shall reap the reward of your faith and your diligence and patience and long suffering wait for the tree to bring forth fruit unto you . alma chapter alma now after alma have speak these word they send forth unto him desire to know whether they should believe in one god that they might obtain this fruit of which he have speak or how they should plant the seed or the word of which he have speak which he say must be plant in their heart or in what manner they should begin to exercise their faith . alma and alma say unto them behold ye have say that ye could not worship your god because ye be cast out of your synagogue . but behold i say unto you if ye suppose that ye can not worship god ye do greatly err and ye ought to search the scripture if ye suppose that they have teach you this ye do not understand them . alma do ye remember to have read what zenos the prophet of old have say concern prayer or worship ? alma for he say thou art merciful o god for thou hast heard my prayer even when i be in the wilderness yea thou wast merciful when i pray concern those who be mine enemy and thou didst turn them to me . alma yea o god and thou wast merciful unto me when i do cry unto thee in my field when i do cry unto thee in my prayer and thou didst hear me . alma and again o god when i do turn to my house thou didst hear me in my prayer . alma and when i do turn unto my closet o lord and pray unto thee thou didst hear me . alma yea thou art merciful unto thy child when they cry unto thee to be hear of thee and not of men and thou wilt hear them . alma yea o god thou hast be merciful unto me and hear my cry in the midst of thy congregation . alma yea and thou hast also hear me when i have be cast out and have be despise by mine enemy yea thou didst hear my cry and wast angry with mine enemy and thou didst visit them in thine anger with speedy destruction . alma and thou didst hear me because of mine affliction and my sincerity and it be because of thy son that thou hast be thus merciful unto me therefore i will cry unto thee in all mine affliction for in thee be my joy for thou hast turn thy judgment away from me because of thy son . alma and now alma say unto them do ye believe those scripture which have be write by them of old ? alma behold if ye do ye must believe what zeno say for behold he say thou hast turn away thy judgment because of thy son . alma now behold my brother i would ask if ye have read the scripture ? if ye have how can ye disbelieve on the son of god ? alma for it be not write that zenos alone spake of these thing but zenock also spake of these thing alma for behold he say thou art angry o lord with this people because they will not understand thy mercy which thou hast bestow upon them because of thy son . alma and now my brother ye see that a second prophet of old have testify of the son of god and because the people would not understand his word they stone him to death . alma but behold this be not all these be not the only one who have speak concern the son of god . alma behold he be speak of by moses yea and behold a type be raise up in the wilderness that whosoever would look upon it might live . and many do look and live . alma but few understand the meaning of those thing and this because of the hardness of their heart . but there be many who be so harden that they would not look therefore they perish . now the reason they would not look be because they do not believe that it would heal them . alma o my brother if ye could be heal by merely cast about your eye that ye might be heal would ye not behold quickly or would ye rather harden your heart in unbelief and be slothful that ye would not cast about your eye that ye might perish ? alma if so wo shall come upon you but if not so then cast about your eye and begin to believe in the son of god that he will come to redeem his people and that he shall suffer and die to atone for their sin and that he shall rise again from the dead which shall bring to pass the resurrection that all men shall stand before him to be judge at the last and judgment day accord to their work . alma and now my brother i desire that ye shall plant this word in your heart and a it beginneth to swell even so nourish it by your faith . and behold it will become a tree spring up in you unto everlasting life . and then may god grant unto you that your burden may be light through the joy of his son . and even all this can ye do if ye will . amen . alma chapter alma and now it come to pass that after alma have speak these word unto them he sit down upon the ground and amulek arose and begin to teach them say alma my brother i think that it be impossible that ye should be ignorant of the thing which have be speak concern the come of christ who be teach by u to be the son of god yea i know that these thing be teach unto you bountifully before your dissension from among u . alma and a ye have desire of my beloved brother that he should make know unto you what ye should do because of your affliction and he hath spoken somewhat unto you to prepare your mind yea and he hath exhort you unto faith and to patience alma yea even that ye would have so much faith a even to plant the word in your heart that ye may try the experiment of it goodness . alma and we have behold that the great question which be in your mind be whether the word be in the son of god or whether there shall be no christ . alma and ye also behold that my brother have prove unto you in many instance that the word be in christ unto salvation . alma my brother have call upon the word of zeno that redemption cometh through the son of god and also upon the word of zenock and also he have appeal unto moses to prove that these thing be true . alma and now behold i will testify unto you of myself that these thing be true . behold i say unto you that i do know that christ shall come among the child of men to take upon him the transgression of his people and that he shall atone for the sin of the world for the lord god hath speak it . alma for it be expedient that an atonement should be make for accord to the great plan of the eternal god there must be an atonement make or else all mankind must unavoidably perish yea all be harden yea all be fall and be lose and must perish except it be through the atonement which it be expedient should be make . alma for it be expedient that there should be a great and last sacrifice yea not a sacrifice of man neither of beast neither of any manner of fowl for it shall not be a human sacrifice but it must be an infinite and eternal sacrifice . alma now there be not any man that can sacrifice his own blood which will atone for the sin of another . now if a man murdereth behold will our law which be just take the life of his brother ? i say unto you nay . alma but the law requireth the life of him who hath murder therefore there can be nothing which be short of an infinite atonement which will suffice for the sin of the world . alma therefore it be expedient that there should be a great and last sacrifice and then shall there be or it be expedient there should be a stop to the shedding of blood then shall the law of moses be fulfil yea it shall be all fulfil every jot and tittle and none shall have pass away . alma and behold this be the whole meaning of the law every whit point to that great and last sacrifice and that great and last sacrifice will be the son of god yea infinite and eternal . alma and thus he shall bring salvation to all those who shall believe on his name this
