alma now whether there be more than one time appoint for men to rise it mattereth not for all do not die at once and this mattereth not all be a one day with god and time only be measure unto men . alma therefore there be a time appoint unto men that they shall rise from the dead and there be a space between the time of death and the resurrection . and now concern this space of time what becometh of the soul of men be the thing which i have inquire diligently of the lord to know and this be the thing of which i do know . alma and when the time cometh when all shall rise then shall they know that god knoweth all the time which be appoint unto man . alma now concern the state of the soul between death and the resurrection behold it have be make know unto me by an angel that the spirit of all men as soon a they be depart from this mortal body yea the spirit of all men whether they be good or evil be take home to that god who give them life . alma and then shall it come to pass that the spirit of those who be righteous be receive into a state of happiness which be call paradise a state of rest a state of peace where they shall rest from all their trouble and from all care and sorrow . alma and then shall it come to pass that the spirit of the wicked yea who be evil for behold they have no part nor portion of the spirit of the lord for behold they choose evil work rather than good therefore the spirit of the devil do enter into them and take possession of their house and these shall be cast out into out darkness there shall be weep and wail and gnashing of teeth and this because of their own iniquity be lead captive by the will of the devil . alma now this be the state of the soul of the wicked yea in darkness and a state of awful fearful look for the fiery indignation of the wrath of god upon them thus they remain in this state as well a the righteous in paradise until the time of their resurrection . alma now there be some that have understand that this state of happiness and this state of misery of the soul before the resurrection be a first resurrection . yea i admit it may be term a resurrection the raising of the spirit or the soul and their consignation to happiness or misery accord to the word which have be speak . alma and behold again it hath be speak that there be a first resurrection a resurrection of all those who have be or who be or who shall be down to the resurrection of christ from the dead . alma now we do not suppose that this first resurrection which be speak of in this manner can be the resurrection of the soul and their consignation to happiness or misery . ye can not suppose that this be what it meaneth . alma behold i say unto you nay but it meaneth the reuniting of the soul with the body of those from the day of adam down to the resurrection of christ . alma now whether the soul and the body of those of whom have be speak shall all be reunite at once the wicked as well a the righteous i do not say let it suffice that i say that they all come forth or in other word their resurrection cometh to pass before the resurrection of those who die after the resurrection of christ . alma now my son i do not say that their resurrection cometh at the resurrection of christ but behold i give it a my opinion that the soul and the body be reunite of the righteous at the resurrection of christ and his ascension into heaven . alma but whether it be at his resurrection or after i do not say but this much i say that there be a space between death and the resurrection of the body and a state of the soul in happiness or in misery until the time which be appoint of god that the dead shall come forth and be reunite both soul and body and be bring to stand before god and be judge accord to their work . alma yea this bringeth about the restoration of those thing of which have be speak by the mouth of the prophet . alma the soul shall be restore to the body and the body to the soul yea and every limb and joint shall be restore to it body yea even a hair of the head shall not be lose but all thing shall be restore to their proper and perfect frame . alma and now my son this be the restoration of which have be speak by the mouth of the prophet alma and then shall the righteous shine forth in the kingdom of god . alma but behold an awful death cometh upon the wicked for they die a to thing pertain to thing of righteousness for they be unclean and no unclean thing can inherit the kingdom of god but they be cast out and consign to partake of the fruit of their labor or their work which have be evil and they drink the dreg of a bitter cup . alma chapter alma and now my son i have somewhat to say concern the restoration of which have be speak for behold some have wrest the scripture and have go far astray because of this thing . and i perceive that thy mind have be worry also concern this thing . but behold i will explain it unto thee . alma i say unto thee my son that the plan of restoration be requisite with the justice of god for it be requisite that all thing should be restore to their proper order . behold it be requisite and just accord to the power and resurrection of christ that the soul of man should be restore to it body and that every part of the body should be restore to itself . alma and it be requisite with the justice of god that men should be judge accord to their work and if their work be good in this life and the desire of their heart be good that they should also at the last day be restore unto that which be good . alma and if their work be evil they shall be restore unto them for evil . therefore all thing shall be restore to their proper order every thing to it natural frame mortality raise to immortality corruption to incorruption raise to endless happiness to inherit the kingdom of god or to endless misery to inherit the kingdom of the devil the one on one hand the other on the other alma the one raise to happiness accord to his desire of happiness or good accord to his desire of good and the other to evil accord to his desire of evil for a he have desire to do evil all the day long even so shall he have his reward of evil when the night cometh . alma and so it be on the other hand . if he hath repent of his sin and desire righteousness until the end of his day even so he shall be reward unto righteousness . alma these be they that be redeem of the lord yea these be they that be take out that be deliver from that endless night of darkness and thus they stand or fall for behold they be their own judge whether to do good or do evil . alma now the decree of god be unalterable therefore the way be prepared that whosoever will may walk therein and be save . alma and now behold my son do not risk one more offense against your god upon those point of doctrine which ye have hitherto risk to commit sin . alma do not suppose because it have be speak concern restoration that ye shall be restore from sin to happiness . behold i say unto you wickedness never be happiness . alma and now my son all men that be in a state of nature or i would say in a carnal state be in the gall of bitterness and in the bond of iniquity they be without god in the world and they have go contrary to the nature of god therefore they be in a state contrary to the nature of happiness . alma and now behold be the meaning of the word restoration to take a thing of a natural state and place it in an unnatural state or to place it in a state opposite to it nature ? alma o my son this be not the case but the meaning of the word restoration be to bring back again evil for evil or carnal for carnal or devilish for devilish good for that which be good righteous for that which be righteous just for that which be just merciful for that which be merciful . alma therefore my son see that you be merciful unto your brother deal justly judge righteously and do good continually and if ye do all these thing then shall ye receive your reward yea ye shall have mercy restore unto you again ye shall have justice restore unto you again ye shall have a righteous judgment restore unto you again and ye shall have good reward unto you again . alma for that which ye do send out shall return unto you again and be restore therefore the word restoration more fully condemneth the sinner and justifieth him not at all . alma chapter alma and now my son i perceive there be somewhat more which doth worry your mind which ye can not understand which be concern the justice of god in the punishment of the sinner for ye do try to suppose that it be injustice that the sinner should be consign to a state of misery . alma now behold my son i will explain this thing unto thee . for behold after the lord god send our first parent forth from the garden of eden to till the ground from whence they be take yea he draw out the man and he place at the east end of the garden of eden cherub and a flaming sword which turn every way to keep the tree of life alma now we see that the man have become a god know good and evil and l he should put forth his hand and take also of the tree of life and eat and live forever the lord god place cherub and the flaming sword that he should not partake of the fruit alma and thus we see that there be a time grant unto man to repent yea a probationary time a time to repent and serve god . alma for behold if adam have put forth his hand immediately and partake of the tree of life he would have live forever accord to the word of god have no space for repentance yea and also the word of god would have be void and the great plan of salvation would have be frustrate . alma but behold it be appoint unto man to die therefore a they be cut off from the tree of life they should be cut off from the face of the earth and man become lose forever yea they become fall man . alma and now ye see by this that our first parent be cut off both temporally and spiritually from the presence of the lord and thus we see they become subject to follow after their own will . alma now behold it be not expedient that man should be reclaim from this temporal death for that would destroy the great plan of happiness . alma therefore a the soul could never die and the fall have bring upon all mankind a spiritual death as well a a temporal that be they be cut off from the presence of the lord it be expedient that mankind should be reclaim from this spiritual death . alma therefore a they have become carnal sensual and devilish by nature this probationary state become a state for them to prepare it become a preparatory state . alma and now remember my son if it be not for the plan of redemption lay it aside as soon a they be dead their soul be miserable be cut off from the presence of the lord . alma and now there be no mean to reclaim men from this fall state which man have bring upon himself because of his own disobedience alma therefore accord to justice the plan of redemption could not be bring about only on condition of repentance of men in this probationary state yea this preparatory state for except it be for these condition mercy could not take effect except it should destroy the work of justice . now the work of justice could not be destroy if so god would cease to be god . alma and thus we see that all mankind be fall and they be in the grasp of justice yea the justice of god which consign them forever to be cut off from his presence . alma and now the plan of mercy could not be bring about except an atonement should be make therefore god himself atoneth for the sin of the world to bring about the plan of mercy to appease the demand of justice that god might be a perfect just god and a merciful god also . alma now repentance could not come unto men except there be a punishment which also be eternal a the life of the soul should be affix opposite to the plan of happiness which be a eternal also a the life of the soul . alma now how could a man repent except he should sin ? how could he sin if there be no law ? how could there be a law save there be a punishment ? alma now there be a punishment affixed and a just law give which bring remorse of conscience unto man . alma now if there be no law give if a man murder he should die would he be afraid he would die if he should murder ? alma and also if there be no law give against sin men would not be afraid to sin . alma and if there be no law give if men sin what could justice do or mercy either for they would have no claim upon the creature ? alma but there be a law give and a punishment affixed and a repentance grant which repentance mercy claimeth otherwise justice claimeth the creature and executeth the law and the law inflicteth the punishment if not so the work of justice would be destroy and god would cease to be god . alma but god ceaseth not to be god and mercy claimeth the penitent and mercy cometh because of the atonement and the atonement bringeth to pass the resurrection of the dead and the resurrection of the dead bringeth back men into the presence of god and thus they be restore into his presence to be judge accord to their work accord to the law and justice . alma for behold justice exerciseth all his demand and also mercy claimeth all which be her own and thus none but the truly penitent be save . alma what do ye suppose that mercy can rob justice ? i say unto you nay not one whit . if so god would cease to be god . alma and thus god bringeth about his great and eternal purpose which be prepare from the foundation of the world . and thus cometh about the salvation and the redemption of men and also their destruction and misery . alma therefore o my son whosoever will come may come and partake of the water of life freely and whosoever will not come the same be not compel to come but in the last day it shall be restore unto him accord to his deed . alma if he have desire to do evil and have not repent in his day behold evil shall be do unto him accord to the restoration of god . alma and now my son i desire that ye should let these thing trouble you no more and only let your sin trouble you with that trouble which shall bring you down unto repentance . alma o my son i desire that ye should deny the justice of god no more . do not endeavor to excuse yourself in the least point because of your sin by deny the justice of god but do you let the justice of god and his mercy and his long suffering have full sway in your heart and let it bring you down to the dust in humility . alma and now o my son ye be call of god to preach the word unto this people . and now my son go thy way declare the word with truth and soberness that thou mayest bring soul unto repentance that the great plan of mercy may have claim upon them . and may god grant unto you even accord to my word . amen . alma chapter alma and now it come to pass that the son of alma do go forth among the people to declare the word unto them . and alma also himself could not rest and he also go forth . alma now we shall say no more concern their preaching except that they preach the word and the truth accord to the spirit of prophecy and revelation and they preach after the holy order of god by which they be call . alma and now i return to an account of the war between the nephites and the lamanites in the eighteenth year of the reign of the judge . alma for behold it come to pass that the zoramites become lamanites therefore in the commencement of the eighteenth year the people of the nephites saw that the lamanites be come upon them therefore they make preparation for war yea they gather together their army in the land of jershon . alma and it come to pass that the lamanites come with their thousand and they come into the land of antionum which be the land of the zoramites and a man by the name of zerahemnah be their leader . alma and now a the amalekites be of a more wicked and murderous disposition than the lamanites be in and of themselves therefore zerahemnah appoint chief captain over the lamanites and they be all amalekites and zoramites . alma now this he do that he might preserve their hatred towards the nephites that he might bring them into subjection to the accomplishment of his design . alma for behold his design be to stir up the lamanites to anger against the nephites this he do that he might usurp great power over them and also that he might gain power over the nephites by bring them into bondage . alma and now the design of the nephites be to support their land and their house and their wife and their child that they might preserve them from the hand of their enemy and also that they might preserve their right and their privilege yea and also their liberty that they might worship god accord to their desire . alma for they know that if they should fall into the hand of the lamanites that whosoever should worship god in spirit and in truth the true and the living god the lamanites would destroy . alma yea and they also know the extreme hatred of the lamanites towards their brother who be the people of anti nephi lehi who be call the and the nephites would not suffer that they should be destroy therefore they give them land for their inheritance . alma and the people of ammon do give unto the nephites a large portion of their nephites . alma and it come to pass that he meet the lamanites in the border of jershon and his people be arm with sword and with cimeters and all manner of weapon of war . alma and when the army of the lamanites saw that the people of nephi or that moroni have prepare his people with breastplate and with arm shield yea and also shield to defend their head and also they be dress with thick clothing alma now the army of zerahemnah be not prepared with any such thing they have only their sword and their cimeters their bow and their arrow their stone and their sling and they be naked save the army of the nephites because of their armor notwithstanding their number be so much great than the nephites . alma behold now it come to pass that they durst not come against the nephites in the border of jershon therefore they depart out of the land of antionum into the wilderness and take their journey round about in the wilderness away by the head of the river sidon that they might come into the land of manti and take possession of the land for they do not suppose that the army of moroni would know whither they have go . alma but it come to pass as soon a they have depart into the wilderness moroni send spy into the wilderness to watch their camp and moroni also know of the prophecy of alma sent certain men unto him desire him that he should inquire of the lord whither the army of the nephites should go to defend themselves against the lamanites . alma and it come to pass that the word of the lord come unto alma and alma inform the messenger of moroni that the army of the lamanites be march round about in the wilderness that they might come over into the land of manti that they might commence an attack upon the weak part of the people . and those messenger go and deliver the message unto moroni . alma now moroni leave a part of his army in the land of jershon l by any mean a part of the lamanites should come into that land and take possession of the city take the remain part of his army and march over into the land of manti . alma and he cause that all the people in that quarter of the land should gather themselves together to battle against the lamanites to defend their land and their country their right and their liberty therefore they be prepare against the time of the come of the lamanites . alma and it come to pass that moroni cause that his army should be secrete in the valley which be near the bank of the river sidon which be on the west of the river sidon in the wilderness . alma and moroni place spy round about that he might know when the camp of the lamanites should come . alma and now a moroni know the intention of the lamanites that it be their intention to destroy their brother or to subject them and bring them into bondage that they might establish a kingdom unto themselves over all the land alma and he also know that it be the only desire of the nephites to preserve their land and their liberty and their church therefore he think it no sin that he should defend them by stratagem therefore he find by his spy which course the lamanites be to take . alma therefore he divide his army and bring a part over into the valley and conceal them on the east and on the south of the hill riplah alma and the remainder he conceal in the west valley on the west of the river sidon and so down into the border of the land manti . alma and thus have place his army accord to his desire he be prepare to meet them . alma and it come to pass that the lamanites come up on the north of the hill where a part of the army of moroni be conceal . alma and a the lamanites have pass the hill riplah and come into the valley and begin to cross the river sidon the army which be conceal on the south of the hill which be lead by a man whose name be lehi and he lead his army forth and encircle the lamanites about on the east in their rear . alma and it come to pass that the lamanites when they saw the nephites come upon them in their rear turn them about and begin to contend with the army of lehi . alma and the work of death commence on both side but it be more dreadful on the part of the lamanites for their nakedness be expose to the sword and the loss of blood they be shield from the more vital part of the body or the more vital part of the body be shield from the stroke of the lamanites by their breastplate and their arm shield and their head plate and thus the nephites do carry on the work of death among the lamanites . alma and it come to pass that the lamanites become frightened because of the great destruction among them even until they begin to flee towards the river sidon . alma and they be pursue by lehi and his men and they be drive by lehi into the water of sidon and they cross the water of sidon . and lehi retain his army upon the bank of the river sidon that they should not cross . alma and it come to pass that moroni and his army meet the lamanites in the valley on the other side of the river sidon and begin to fall upon them and to slay them . alma and the lamanites do flee again before them towards the land of manti and they be meet again by the army of moroni . alma now in this case the lamanites do fight exceedingly yea never have the lamanites be know to fight with such exceedingly great strength and courage no not even from the beginning . alma and they be inspire by the zoramites and the amalekites who be their chief captain and leader and by zerahemnah who be their chief captain or their chief leader and commander yea they do fight like dragon and many of the nephites be slay by their hand yea for they do smite in two many of their head plate and they do pierce many of their breastplate and they do smite off many of their arm and thus the lamanites do smite in their fierce anger . alma nevertheless the nephites be inspire by a good cause for they be not fight for monarchy nor power but they be fight for their home and their liberty their wife and their child and their all yea for their rite of worship and their church . alma and they be do that which they felt be the duty which they owe to their god for the lord have say unto them and also unto their father that inasmuch a ye be not guilty of the first offense neither the second ye shall not suffer yourselves to be slay by the hand of your enemy . alma and again the lord have say that ye shall defend your family even unto bloodshed . therefore for this cause be the nephites contend with the lamanites to defend themselves and their family and their land their country and their right and their religion . alma and it come to pass that when the men of moroni saw the fierceness and the anger of the lamanites they be about to shrink and flee from them . and moroni perceive their intent send forth and inspire their heart with these thought yea the thought of their land their liberty yea their freedom from bondage . alma and it come to pass that they turn upon the lamanites and they cry with one voice unto the lord their god for their liberty and their freedom from bondage . alma and they begin to stand against the lamanites with power and in that selfsame hour that they cry unto the lord for their freedom the lamanites begin to flee before them and they flee even to the water of sidon . alma now the lamanites be more numerous yea by more than double the number of the nephites nevertheless they be drive insomuch that they be gather together in one body in the valley upon the bank by the river sidon . alma therefore the army of moroni encircle them about yea even on both side of the encircle about by the nephites they be strike with terror . alma now moroni when he saw their terror command his men that they should stop shed their blood . alma chapter alma and it come to pass that they do stop and withdraw a pace from them . and moroni say unto zerahemnah behold zerahemnah that we do not desire to be men of blood . ye know that ye be in our hand yet we do not desire to slay you . alma behold we have not come out to battle against you that we might shed your blood for power neither do we desire to bring any one to the yoke of bondage . but this be the very cause for which ye have come against u yea and ye be angry with u because of our religion . alma but now ye behold that the lord be with u and ye behold that he have deliver you into our hand . and now i would that ye yea ye see that god will support and keep and preserve u so long a we be faithful unto him and unto our faith and our religion and never will the lord suffer that we shall be destroy except we should be in our hand and i will command my men that they shall fall upon you and inflict the wound of death in your body that ye may become extinct and then we will see who shall have power over this people yea we will see who shall be bring into bondage . alma and now it come to pass that when zerahemnah have hear these saying he come forth and deliver up his sword and his cimeter and his bow into the our child but take our weapon of war and suffer that we may depart into the wilderness otherwise we will retain our sword and we will perish or conquer . alma behold we be not of your faith we do not preserve you . alma and now when zerahemnah have make an end of speak these word moroni return the sword and the weapon of war which he have receive unto zerahemnah say behold we will end the conflict . alma now i can not recall the word which i have speak therefore a the lord liveth ye shall not depart except ye depart with an oath that ye will not return again against u to war . now a ye be in our hand we will spill your blood upon the ground or ye shall submit to the condition which i have propose . alma and now when moroni have say these word zerahemnah retain his sword and he be angry with moroni and he rush forward that he might slay moroni but a he raise his sword behold one of moroni 's soldier smite it even to the earth and it break by the hilt and he also smite zerahemnah that he take off his scalp and it fell to the earth . and zerahemnah withdrew from before them into the midst of his soldier . alma and it come to pass that the soldier who stand by who smite off the scalp of zerahemnah take up the scalp from off the ground by the hair and lay it upon the point of his sword and stretch it forth unto them say unto them with a loud voice alma even a this scalp have fall to the earth which be the scalp of your chief so shall ye fall to the earth except ye will deliver up your weapon of war and depart with a covenant of peace . alma now there be many when they hear these word and saw the scalp which be upon the sword that be strike with fear and many come forth and throw down their weapon of war at the foot of moroni and enter into a covenant of peace . and as many a enter into a covenant they suffer to depart into the wilderness . alma now it come to pass that zerahemnah be exceedingly wroth and he do stir up the remainder of his soldier to anger to contend more powerfully against the nephites . alma and now moroni be angry because of the stubbornness of the lamanites therefore he command his people that they should fall upon them and slay them . and it come to pass that they begin to slay them yea and the lamanites do contend with their sword and their might . alma but behold their naked skin and their bare head be expose to the sharp sword of the nephites yea behold they be pierce and smite yea and do fall exceedingly fast before the sword of the nephites and they begin to be sweep down even a the soldier of moroni have prophesy . alma now zerahemnah when he saw that they be all about to be destroy cried mightily unto moroni promising that he would covenant and also his people with them if they would spare the remainder of their life that they never would come to war again against them . alma and it come to pass that moroni cause that the work of death should cease again among the people . and he take the weapon of war from the lamanites and after they have enter into a covenant with him of peace they be suffer to depart into the wilderness . alma now the number of their dead be not numbered because of the greatness of the number yea the number of their dead be exceedingly great both on the nephites and on the lamanites . alma and it come to pass that they do cast their dead into the water of sidon and they have go judge over the people of nephi . and thus end the record of alma which be write upon the plate of nephi . alma chapter alma behold now it come to pass that the people of nephi be exceedingly rejoice because the lord have again deliver them out of the hand of their enemy therefore they give thanks unto the lord their god yea and they do fast much and pray much and they do worship god with exceedingly great joy . alma and it come to pass in the nineteenth year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi that alma come unto his son helaman and say unto him believest thou the word which i spake unto thee concern those record which have be keep ? alma and helaman say unto him yea i believe . alma and alma say again believest thou in jesus christ who shall come ? alma and he say yea i believe all the word which thou hast spoken . alma and alma say unto him again will ye keep my commandment ? alma and he say yea i will keep thy commandment with all my heart . alma then alma accord to the spirit of revelation which be in me in four hundred year from the time that jesus christ shall manifest himself unto them shall dwindle in unbelief . alma yea and then shall they see war and pestilence yea famine and bloodshed even until the people of nephi shall become extinct alma yea and this because they shall dwindle in unbelief and fall into the work of darkness and lasciviousness and all manner of iniquity yea i say unto you that because they shall sin against so great light and knowledge yea i say unto you that from that day even the fourth generation shall not all pass away before this great iniquity shall come . alma and when that great day cometh behold the time very soon cometh that those who be now or the seed of those who be now number among the people of nephi shall no more be number among the people of nephi . alma but whosoever remaineth and be not destroy in that great and dreadful day shall be number among the lamanites and shall become like unto them all save it be a few who shall be call the disciple of the lord and them shall the lamanites pursue even until they shall become extinct . and now because of iniquity this prophecy shall be fulfil . alma and now it come to pass that after alma have say these thing to helaman he bless him and also his other son and he also bless the earth for the righteous ' sake . alma and he say thus saith the lord god curse shall be the land yea this land unto every nation kindred tongue and people unto destruction which do wickedly when they be fully ripe and a i have say so shall it be for this be the cursing and the blessing of god upon the land for the lord can not look upon sin with the least degree of allowance . alma and now when alma have say these word he bless the church yea all those who should stand fast in the faith from that time henceforth . alma and when alma have do this he depart out of the land of zarahemla a if to go into the land of melek . and it come to pass that he be never hear of more a to his death or burial we know not of . alma behold this we know that he be a righteous man and the say go abroad in the church that he be take up by the spirit or bury by the hand of the lord even a moses . but behold the scripture saith the lord take moses unto himself and we suppose that he have also receive alma in the spirit unto himself therefore for this cause we know nothing concern his death and burial . alma and now it come to pass in the commencement of the nineteenth year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi that helaman go forth among the people to declare the word unto them . alma for behold because of their war with the lamanites and the many little dissension and disturbance which have be among the people it become expedient that the word of god should be declare among them yea and that a regulation should be make throughout the church . alma therefore helaman and his brother go forth to establish the church again in all the land yea in every city throughout all the land which be possess by the people of nephi . and it come to pass that they do appoint priest and teacher throughout all the land over all the church . alma and now it come to pass that after helaman and his brother have appoint priest and teacher over the church that there arise a dissension among them and they would not give heed to the word of helaman and his brother alma but they grow proud be lift up in their heart because of their exceedingly great rich therefore they grow rich in their own eye and would not give heed to their word to walk uprightly before god . alma chapter alma and it come to pass that as many a would not hearken to the word of helaman and his brother be gather together against their brother . alma and now behold they be exceedingly wroth insomuch that they be determine to slay them . alma now the leader of those who be wroth against their brother be a large and a strong man and his name be amalickiah . alma and amalickiah be desirous to be a king and those people who be wroth be also desirous that he should be their king and they be the great part of them the low judge of the land and they be seek for power . alma and they have be lead by the flattery of amalickiah that if they would support him and establish him to be their king that he would make them ruler over the people . alma thus they be lead away by amalickiah to dissension notwithstanding the preaching of helaman and his brother yea notwithstanding their exceedingly great care over the church for they be high priest over the church . alma and there be many in the church who believe in the flattering word of amalickiah therefore they dissent even from the church and thus be the affair of the people of nephi exceedingly precarious and dangerous notwithstanding their great victory which they have have over the lamanites and their great rejoicing which they have have because of their deliverance by the hand of the lord . alma thus we see how quick the child of men do forget the lord their god yea how quick to do iniquity and to be lead away by the evil one . alma yea and we also see the great wickedness one very wicked man can cause to take place among the child of men . alma yea we see that amalickiah because he be a man of cunning device and a man of many flatter word that he lead away the heart of many people to do wickedly yea and to seek to destroy the church of god and to destroy the foundation of liberty which god have grant unto them or which bless god have send upon the face of the land for the righteous ' sake . alma and now it come to pass that when moroni who be the chief commander of the army of the nephites have hear of these dissension he be angry with amalickiah . alma and it come to pass that he rent his coat and he take a piece thereof and write upon it in memory of our god our religion and freedom and our peace our wife and our child and he fasten it upon the end of a pole . alma and he fasten on his head plate and his breastplate and his shield and gird on his armor about his loin and he take the pole which have on the end thereof his rent coat and he call it the title of liberty and he bow himself to the earth and he pray mightily unto his god for the blessing of liberty to rest upon his brother so long a there should a band of christian remain to possess the land alma for thus be all the true believer of christ who belong to the church of god call by those who do not belong to the church . alma and those who do belong to the church be faithful yea all those who be true believer in christ take upon them gladly the name of christ or christian a they be call because of their belief in christ who should come . alma and therefore at this time moroni pray that the cause of the christian and the freedom of the land might be favor . alma and it come to pass that when he have pour out his soul to god he name all the land which be south of the land desolation yea and in fine all the land both on the north and on the south a choose land and the land of liberty . alma and he say surely god shall not suffer that we who be despise because we take upon u the name of christ shall be tread down and destroy until we bring it upon u by our own transgression . alma and when moroni have say these word he go forth among the people wave the rent part of his garment in the air that all might see the writing which he have write upon the rent part and cry with a loud voice say alma behold whosoever will maintain this title upon the land let them come forth in the strength of the lord and enter into a covenant that they will maintain their right and their religion that the lord god may bless them . alma and it come to pass that when moroni have proclaim these word behold the people come run together with their armor gird about their loin rend their garment in token or a a covenant that they would not forsake the lord their god or in other word if they should transgress the commandment of god or fall into transgression and be ashamed to take upon them the name of christ the lord should rend them even a they have rent their garment . alma now this be the covenant which they make and they cast their garment at the foot of moroni say we covenant with our god that we shall be destroy even a our brother in the land northward if we shall fall into transgression yea he may cast u at the foot of our enemy even a we have cast our garment at thy foot to be trodden under foot if we shall fall into transgression . alma moroni say unto them behold we be a remnant of the seed of jacob yea we be a remnant of the seed of joseph whose coat be rent by his brother into many piece yea and now behold let u remember to keep the commandment of god or our garment shall be rent by our brother and we be cast into prison or be sell or be slay . alma yea let u preserve our liberty a a remnant of joseph yea let u remember the word of jacob before his death for behold he saw that a part of the remnant of the coat of joseph be preserve and have not decay . and he say even a this remnant of garment of my son hath be preserve so shall a remnant of the seed of my son be preserve by the hand of god and be take unto himself while the remainder of the seed of joseph shall perish even a the remnant of his garment . alma now behold this giveth my soul sorrow nevertheless my soul hath joy in my son because of that part of his seed which shall be take unto god . alma now behold this be the language of jacob . alma and now who knoweth but what the remnant of the seed of joseph which shall perish a his garment be those who have dissent from u ? yea and even it shall be ourselves if we do not stand fast in the faith of christ . alma and now it come to pass that when moroni have say these word he go forth and also send forth in all the part of the land where there be dissension and gather together all the people who be desirous to maintain their liberty to stand against amalickiah and those who have dissent who be call amalickiahites . alma and it come to pass that when amalickiah saw that the people of moroni be more numerous than the amalickiahites and he also saw that his people be doubtful concern the justice of the cause in which they have undertake therefore fear that he should not gain the point he take those of his people who would and depart into the land of nephi . alma now moroni think it be not expedient that the lamanites should have any more strength therefore he think to cut off the people of amalickiah or to take them and bring them back and put amalickiah to death yea for he know that he would stir up the lamanites to anger against them and cause them to come to battle against them and this he know that amalickiah would do that he might obtain his purpose . alma therefore moroni think it be expedient that he should take his army who have gather themselves together and arm themselves and enter into a covenant to keep the peace and it come to pass that he take his army and march out with his tent into the wilderness to cut off the course of amalickiah in the wilderness . alma and it come to pass that he do accord to his desire and march forth into the wilderness and head the army of amalickiah . alma and it come to pass that amalickiah flee with a small number of his men and the remainder be deliver up into the hand of moroni and be take back into the land of zarahemla . alma now moroni be a man who be appoint by the chief judge and the voice of the people therefore he have power accord to his will with the army of the nephites to establish and to exercise authority over them . alma and it come to pass that whomsoever of the amalickiahites that would not enter into a covenant to support the cause of freedom that they might maintain a free government he cause to be put to death and there be but few who deny the covenant of freedom . alma and it come to pass also that he cause the title of liberty to be hoist upon every tower which be in all the land which be possess by the nephites and thus moroni plant the standard of liberty among the nephites . alma and they begin to have peace again in the land and thus they do maintain peace in the land until nearly the end of the nineteenth year of the reign of the judge . alma and helaman and the high priest do also maintain order in the church yea even for the space of four year do they have much peace and rejoicing in the church . alma and it come to pass that there be many who die firmly believe that their soul be redeem by the lord jesus christ thus they go out of the world rejoicing . alma and there be some who die with fever which at some season of the year be very frequent in the land but not so much so with fever because of the excellent quality of the many plant and root which god have prepare to remove the cause of disease to which men be subject by the nature of the climate alma but there be many who die with old age and those who die in the faith of christ be happy in him a we must need suppose . alma chapter alma now we will return in our record to amalickiah and those who have flee with him into the wilderness for behold he have take those who go with him and go up in the land of nephi among the lamanites and do stir up the lamanites to anger against the people of nephi insomuch that the king of the lamanites send a proclamation throughout all his land among all his people that they should gather themselves together again to go to battle against the nephites . alma and it come to pass that when the proclamation have go forth among them they be exceedingly afraid yea they fear to displease the king and they also fear to go to battle against the nephites lest they should lose their life . and it come to pass that they would not or the more part of them would not obey the commandment of the king . alma and now it come to pass that the king be wroth because of their disobedience therefore he give amalickiah the command of that part of his army which be obedient unto his command and command him that he should go forth and compel them to arm . alma now behold this be the desire of amalickiah for he be a very subtle man to do evil therefore he lay the plan in his heart to dethrone the king of the lamanites . alma and now he have get the command of those part of the lamanites who be in favor of the king and he seek to gain favor of those who be not obedient therefore he go forward to the place which be call onidah for thither have all the lamanites flee for they discover the army come and suppose that they be come to destroy them therefore they flee to onidah to the place of arm . alma and they have appoint a man to be a king and a leader over them be fix in their mind with a determined resolution that they would not be subject to go against the nephites . alma and it come to pass that they have gather themselves together upon the top of the mount which be call antipas in preparation to battle . alma now it be not amalickiah 's intention to give them battle accord to the commandment of the king but behold it be his intention to gain favor with the army of the lamanites that he might place himself at their head and dethrone the king and take possession of the kingdom . alma and behold it come to pass that he cause his army to pitch their tent in the valley which be near the mount antipas . alma and it come to pass that when it be night he send a secret embassy into the mount antipas desire that the leader of those who be upon the mount whose name be lehonti that he should come down to the foot of the mount for he desire to speak with him . alma and it come to pass that when lehonti receive the message he durst not go down to the foot of the mount . and it come to pass that amalickiah send again the second time desire him to come down . and it come to pass that lehonti would not and he send again the third time . alma and it come to pass that when amalickiah find that he could not get lehonti to come down off from the mount he go up into the mount nearly to lehonti 's camp and he send again the fourth time his message unto lehonti desiring that he would come down and that he would bring his guard with him . alma and it come to pass that when lehonti have come down with his guard to amalickiah that amalickiah desire him to come down with his army in the night time and surround those men in their camp over whom the king have give him command and that he would deliver them up into lehonti 's hand if he would make him amalickiah a second leader over the whole army . alma and it come to pass that lehonti come down with his men and surround the men of amalickiah so that before they awake at the dawn of day they be surround by the army of lehonti . alma and it come to pass that when they saw that they be surround they plead with amalickiah that he would suffer them to fall in with their brother that they might not be destroy . now this be the very thing which amalickiah desire . alma and it come to pass that he deliver his men contrary to the command of the king . now this be the thing that amalickiah desire that he might accomplish his design in dethrone the king . alma now it be the custom among the lamanites if their chief leader be kill to appoint the second leader to be their chief leader . alma and it come to pass that amalickiah cause that one of his servant should administer poison by degree to lehonti that he die . alma now when lehonti be dead the lamanites appoint amalickiah to be their leader and their chief commander . alma and it come to pass that amalickiah march with his army for he have gain his desire to the land of nephi to the city of nephi which be the chief city . alma and the king come out to meet him with his guard for he suppose that amalickiah have fulfil his command and that amalickiah have gather together so great an army to go against the nephites to battle . alma but behold a the king come out to meet him amalickiah cause that his servant should go forth to meet the king . and they go and bow themselves before the king a if to reverence him because of his greatness . alma and it come to pass that the king put forth his hand to raise them a be the custom with the lamanites a a token of peace which custom they have take from the nephites . alma and it come to pass that when he have raise the first from the ground behold he stab the king to the heart and he fell to the earth . alma now the servant of the king flee and the servant of amalickiah raise a cry say alma behold the servant of the king have stab him to the heart and he have fall and they have flee behold come and see . alma and it come to pass that amalickiah command that his army should march forth and see what have happen to the king and when they have come to the spot and find the king lying in his gore amalickiah pretend to be wroth and say whosoever love the king let him go forth and pursue his servant that they may be slay . alma and it come to pass that all they who love the king when they hear these word come forth and pursue after the servant of the king . alma now when the servant of the king saw an army pursuing after them they be frighten again and flee into the wilderness and come over into the land of zarahemla and join the people of ammon . alma and the army which pursue after them return have pursue after them in vain and thus amalickiah by his fraud gain the heart of the people . alma and it come to pass on the morrow he enter the city nephi with his army and take possession of the city . alma and now it come to pass that the queen when she have hear that the king be slay for amalickiah have send an embassy to the queen inform her that the king have be slay by his servant that he have pursue them with his army but it be in vain and they have make their escape alma therefore when the queen have receive this message she send unto amalickiah desire him that he would spare the people of the city and she also desire him that he should come in unto her and she also desire him that he should bring witness with him to testify concern the death of the king . alma and it come to pass that amalickiah take the same servant that slew the king and all them who be with him and go in unto the queen unto the place where she sit and they all testify unto her that the king be slay by his own servant and they say also they have flee do not this testify against them ? and thus they satisfy the queen concern the death of the king . alma and it come to pass that amalickiah seek the favor of the queen and take her unto him to wife and thus by his fraud and by the assistance of his cunning servant he obtain the kingdom yea he be acknowledge king throughout all the land among all the people of the lamanites who be compose of the lamanites and the lemuelites and the ishmaelites and all the dissenter of the nephites from the reign of nephi down to the present time . alma now these dissenter have the same instruction and the same information of the nephites yea have be instruct in the same knowledge of the lord nevertheless it be strange to relate not long after their dissension they become more hardened and impenitent and more wild wicked and ferocious than the lamanites drink in with the tradition of the lamanites give way to indolence and all manner of lasciviousness yea entirely forget the lord their god . alma chapter alma and now it come to pass that as soon a amalickiah have obtain the kingdom he begin to inspire the heart of the lamanites against the people of nephi yea he do appoint men to speak unto the lamanites from their tower against the nephites . alma and thus he do inspire their heart against the nephites insomuch that in the latter end of the nineteenth year of the reign of the judge he have accomplish his design thus far yea have be make king over the lamanites he seek also to reign over all the land yea and all the people who be in the land the nephites as well a the lamanites . alma therefore he have accomplish his design for he have harden the heart of the lamanites and blind their mind and stir them up to anger insomuch that he have gather together a numerous host to go to battle against the nephites . alma for he be determine because of the greatness of the number of his people to overpower the nephites and to bring them into bondage . alma and thus he do appoint chief captain of the zoramites they be the most acquainted with the strength of the nephites and their place of resort and the weak part of their city therefore he appoint them to be chief captain over his army . alma and it come to pass that they take their camp and move forth toward the land of zarahemla in the wilderness . alma now it come to pass that while amalickiah have thus be obtain power by fraud and deceit moroni on the other hand have be prepare the mind of the people to be faithful unto the lord their god . alma yea he have be strengthen the army of the nephites and erect small fort or place of resort throw up bank of earth round about to enclose his army and also build wall of stone to encircle them about round about their city and the border of their land yea all round about the land . alma and in their weak fortification he do place the great number of men and thus he do fortify and strengthen the land which be possess by the nephites . alma and thus he be prepare to support their liberty their land their wife and their child and their peace and that they might live unto the lord their god and that they might maintain that which be call by their enemy the cause of christian . alma and moroni be a strong and a mighty man he be a man of a perfect understanding yea a man that do not delight in bloodshed a man whose soul do joy in the liberty and the freedom of his country and his brother from bondage and slavery alma yea a man whose heart do swell with thanksgiving to his god for the many privilege and blessing which he bestow upon his people a man who do labor exceedingly for the welfare and safety of his people . alma yea and he be a man who be firm in the faith of christ and he have swear with an oath to defend his people his right and his country and his religion even to the loss of his blood . alma now the nephites be teach to defend themselves against their enemy even to the shedding of blood if it be necessary yea and they be also teach never to give an offense yea and never to raise the sword except it be against an enemy except it be to preserve their life . alma and this be their faith that by so do god would prosper them in the land or in other word if they be faithful in keep the commandment of god that he would prosper them in the land yea warn them to flee or to prepare for war accord to their danger alma and also that god would make it know unto them whither they should go to defend themselves against their enemy and by so do the lord would deliver them and this be the faith of moroni and his heart do glory in it not in the shedding of blood but in do good in preserve his people yea in keep the commandment of god yea and resist iniquity . alma yea verily verily i say unto you if all men have be and be and ever would be like unto moroni behold the very power of hell would have be shake forever yea the devil would never have power over the heart of the child of men . alma behold he be a man like unto ammon the son of mosiah yea and even the other son of mosiah yea and also alma and his son for they be all men of god . alma now behold helaman and his brother be no less serviceable unto the people than be moroni for they do preach the word of god and they do baptize unto repentance all men whosoever would hearken unto their word . alma and thus they go forth and the people do humble themselves because of their word insomuch that they be highly favor of the lord and thus they be free from war and contention among themselves yea even for the space of four year . alma but a i have say in the latter end of the nineteenth year yea notwithstanding their peace amongst themselves they be compel reluctantly to contend with their brother the lamanites . alma yea and in fine their war never do cease for the space of many year with the lamanites notwithstanding their much reluctance . alma now they be sorry to take up arm against the lamanites because they do not delight in the shedding of blood yea and this be not all they be sorry to be the mean of send so many of their brother out of this world into an eternal world unprepared to meet their god . alma nevertheless they could not suffer to lay down their life that their wife and their child should be massacre by the barbarous cruelty of those who be once their brother yea and have dissent from their church and have leave them and have go to destroy them by join the lamanites . alma yea they could not bear that their brother should rejoice over the blood of the nephites so long a there be any who should keep the commandment of god for the promise of the lord be if they should keep his commandment they should prosper in the land . alma chapter alma and now it come to pass in the eleventh month of the nineteenth year on the tenth day of the month the army of the lamanites be see approach towards the land of ammonihah . alma and behold the city have be rebuild and moroni have station an army by the border of the city and they have cast up dirt around about to shield them from the arrow and the stone of the lamanites for behold they fight with stone and with arrow . alma behold i say that the city of ammonihah have be rebuild . i say unto you yea that it be in part rebuilt and because the lamanites have destroy it once because of the iniquity of the people they suppose that it would again become an easy prey for them . alma but behold how great be their disappointment for behold the nephites have dig up a ridge of earth round about them which be so high that the lamanites could not cast their stone and their arrow at them that they might take effect neither could they come upon them save it be by their place of entrance . alma now at this time the chief captain of the lamanites be astonish exceedingly because of the wisdom of the nephites in prepare their place of security . alma now the leader of the lamanites have suppose because of the greatness of their number yea they suppose that they should be privilege to come upon them a they have hitherto do yea and they have also prepare themselves with shield and with breastplate and they have also prepare themselves with garment of skin yea very thick garment to cover their nakedness . alma and be thus prepare they suppose that they should easily overpower and subject their brother to the yoke of bondage or slay and massacre them accord to their pleasure . alma but behold to their uttermost astonishment they be prepare for them in a manner which never have be know among the child of lehi . now they be prepare for the lamanites to battle after the manner of the instruction of moroni . alma and it come to pass that the lamanites or the amalickiahites be exceedingly astonish at their manner of preparation for war . alma now if king amalickiah have come down out of the land of nephi at the head of his army perhaps he would have cause the lamanites to have attack the nephites at the city of ammonihah for behold he do care not for the blood of his people . alma but behold amalickiah do not come down himself to battle . and behold his chief captain durst not attack the nephites at the city of ammonihah for moroni have alter the management of affair among the nephites insomuch that the lamanites be disappoint in their place of retreat and they could not come upon them . alma therefore they retreat into the wilderness and take their camp and march towards the land of noah suppose that to be the next best place for them to come against the nephites . alma for they know not that moroni have fortify or have build fort of security for every city in all the land round about therefore they march forward to the land of noah with a firm determination yea their chief captain come forward and take an oath that they would destroy the people of that city . alma but behold to their astonishment the city of noah which have hitherto be a weak place have now by the mean of moroni become strong yea even to exceed the strength of the city ammonihah . alma and now behold this be wisdom in moroni for he have suppose that they would be frighten at the city ammonihah and a the city of noah have hitherto be the weak part of the land therefore they would march thither to battle and thus it be accord to his desire . alma and behold moroni have appoint lehi to be chief captain over the men of that city and it be that same lehi who fight with the lamanites in the valley on the east of the river sidon . alma and now behold it come to pass that when the lamanites have find that lehi command the city they be again disappoint for they fear lehi exceedingly nevertheless their chief captain have swear with an oath to attack the city therefore they bring up their army . alma now behold the lamanites could not get into their fort of security by any other way save by the entrance because of the highness of the bank which have be throw up and the depth of the ditch which have be dig round about save it be by the entrance . alma and thus be the nephites prepare to destroy all such a should attempt to climb up to enter the fort by any other way by cast over stone and arrow at them . alma thus they be prepare yea a body of their strong men with their sword and their sling to smite down all who should attempt to come into their place of security by the place of entrance and thus be they prepare to defend themselves against the lamanites . alma and it come to pass that the captain of the lamanites bring up their army before the place of entrance and begin to contend with the nephites to get into their place of security but behold they be drive back from time to time insomuch that they be slay with an immense slaughter . alma now when they find that they could not obtain power over the nephites by the pas they begin to dig down their bank of earth that they might obtain a pas to their army that they might have an equal chance to fight but behold in these attempt they be sweep off by the stone and arrow which be throw at them and instead of fill up their ditch by pull down the bank of earth they be fill up in a measure with their dead and wounded body . alma thus the nephites have all power over their enemy and thus the lamanites do attempt to destroy the nephites until their chief captain be all slain yea and more than a thousand of the lamanites be slay while on the other hand there be not a single soul of the nephites which be slain . alma there be about fifty who be wound who have be expose to the arrow of the lamanites through the pas but they be shield by their shield and their breastplate and their head plate insomuch that their wound be upon their leg many of which be very severe . alma and it come to pass that when the lamanites saw that their chief captain be all slay they flee into the wilderness . and it come to pass that they return to the land of nephi to inform their king amalickiah who be a nephite by birth concern their great loss . alma and it come to pass that he be exceedingly angry with his people because he have not obtain his desire over the nephites he have not subject them to the yoke of bondage . alma yea he be exceedingly wroth and he do curse god and also moroni swear with an oath that he would drink his blood and this because moroni have keep the commandment of god in prepare for the safety of his people . alma and it come to pass that on the other hand the people of nephi do thank the lord their god because of his matchless power in deliver them from the hand of their enemy . alma and thus end the nineteenth year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi . alma yea and there be continual peace among them and exceedingly great prosperity in the church because of their heed and diligence which they give unto the word of god which be declare unto them by helaman and shiblon and corianton and ammon and his brother yea and by all those who have be ordain by the holy order of god be baptize unto repentance and send forth to preach among the people . alma chapter alma and now it come to pass that moroni do not stop make preparation for war or to defend his people against the lamanites for he cause that his army should commence in the commencement of the twentieth year of the reign of the judge that they should commence in dig up heap of earth round about all the city throughout all the land which be possess by the nephites . alma and upon the top of these ridge of earth he cause that there should be timber yea work of timber build up to the height of a man round about the city . alma and he cause that upon those work of timber there should be a frame of picket build upon the timber round about and they be strong and high . alma and he cause tower to be erect that overlook those work of picket and he cause place of security to be build upon those tower that the stone and the arrow of the lamanites could not hurt them . alma and they be prepare that they could cast stone from the top thereof accord to their pleasure and their strength and slay him who should attempt to approach near the wall of the city . alma thus moroni do prepare stronghold against the come of their enemy round about every city in all the land . alma and it come to pass that moroni cause that his army should go forth into the east wilderness yea and they go forth and drive all the lamanites who be in the east wilderness into their own land which be south of the land of zarahemla . alma and the land of nephi do run in a straight course from the east sea to the west . alma and it come to pass that when moroni have drive all the lamanites out of the east wilderness which be north of the land of their own possession he cause that the inhabitant who be in the land of zarahemla and in the land round about should go forth into the east wilderness even to the border by the seashore and possess the land . alma and he also place army on the south in the border of their possession and cause them to erect fortification that they might secure their army and their people from the hand of their enemy . alma and thus he cut off all the stronghold of the lamanites in the east wilderness yea and also on the west fortify the line between the nephites and the lamanites between the land of zarahemla and the land of nephi from the west sea run by the head of the river sidon the nephites possess all the land northward yea even all the land which be northward of the land bountiful accord to their pleasure . alma thus moroni with his army which do increase daily because of the assurance of protection which his work do bring forth unto them do seek to cut off the strength and the power of the lamanites from off the land of their possession that they should have no power upon the land of their possession . alma and it come to pass that the nephites begin the foundation of a city and they call the name of the city moroni and it be by the east sea and it be on the south by the line of the possession of the lamanites . alma and they also begin a foundation for a city between the city of moroni and the city of aaron join the border of aaron and moroni and they call the name of the city or the land nephihah . alma and they also begin in that same year to build many city on the north one in a particular manner which they call lehi which be in the north by the border of the seashore . alma and thus end the twentieth year . alma and in these prosperous circumstance be the people of nephi in the commencement of the twenty and first year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi . alma and they do prosper exceedingly and they become exceedingly rich yea and they do multiply and wax strong in the land . alma and thus we see how merciful and just be all the dealing of the lord to the fulfilling of all his word unto the child of men yea we can behold that his word be verify even at this time which he spake unto lehi say alma bless art thou and thy child and they shall be bless inasmuch a they shall keep my commandment they shall prosper in the land . but remember inasmuch a they will not keep my commandment they shall be cut off from the presence of the lord . alma and we see that these promise have be verify to the people of nephi for it have be their quarrelings and their contention yea their murderings and their plundering their idolatry their whoredom and their abomination which be among themselves which bring upon them their war and their destruction . alma and those who be faithful in keep the commandment of the lord be deliver at all time whilst thousand of their wicked brother have be consign to bondage or to perish by the sword or to dwindle in unbelief and mingle with the lamanites . alma but behold there never be a happy time among the people of nephi since the day of nephi than in the day of moroni yea even at this time in the twenty and first year of the reign of the judge . alma and it come to pass that the twenty and second year of the reign of the judge also end in peace yea and also the twenty and third year . alma and it come to pass that in the commencement of the twenty and fourth year of the reign of the judge there would also have be peace among the people of nephi have it not be for a contention which take place among them concern the land of lehi and the land of morianton which join upon the border of lehi both of which be on the border by the seashore . alma for behold the people who possess the land of morianton do claim a part of the land of lehi therefore there begin to be a warm contention between them insomuch that the people of morianton take up arm against their brother and they be determine by the sword to slay them . alma but behold the people who possess the land of lehi flee to the camp of moroni and appeal unto him for assistance for behold they be not in the wrong . alma and it come to pass that when the people of morianton who be lead by a man whose name be morianton found that the people of lehi have flee to the camp of moroni they be exceedingly fearful l the army of moroni should come upon them and destroy them . alma therefore morianton put it into their heart that they should flee to the land which be northward which be cover with large body of water and take possession of the land which be northward . alma and behold they would have carry this plan into effect which would have be a cause to have be lament but behold morianton be a man of much passion therefore he be angry with one of his maid servant and he fell upon her and beat her much . alma and it come to pass that she flee and come over to the camp of moroni and tell moroni all thing concern the matter and also concern their intention to flee into the land northward . alma now behold the people who be in the land bountiful or rather moroni fear that they would hearken to the word of morianton and unite with his people and thus he would obtain possession of those part of the land which would lay a foundation for serious consequence among the people of nephi yea which consequence would lead to the overthrow of their liberty . alma therefore moroni send an army with their camp to head the people of morianton to stop their flight into the land northward . alma and it come to pass that they do not head them until they have come to the border of the land desolation and there they do head them by the narrow pas which lead by the sea into the land northward yea by the sea on the west and on the east . alma and it come to pass that the army which be send by moroni which be lead by a man whose name be teancum do meet the people of morianton and so stubborn be the people of morianton be inspire by his wickedness and his flattering word that a battle commence between them in the which teancum do slay morianton and defeat his army and take them prisoner and return to the camp of moroni . and thus end the twenty and fourth year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi . alma and thus be the people of morianton bring back . and upon their covenanting to keep the peace they be restore to the land of morianton and a union take place between them and the people of lehi and they be also restore to their land . alma and it come to pass that in the same year that the people of nephi have peace restore unto them that nephihah the second chief judge die have fill the judgment seat with perfect uprightness before god . alma nevertheless he have refuse alma to take possession of those record and those thing which be esteem by alma and his father to be most sacred therefore alma have confer them upon his son helaman . alma behold it come to pass that the son of nephihah be appoint to fill the judgment seat in the stead of his father yea he be appoint chief judge and governor over the people with an oath and sacred ordinance to judge righteously and to keep the peace and the freedom of the people and to grant unto them their sacred privilege to worship the lord their god yea to support and maintain the cause of god all his day and to bring the wicked to justice accord to their crime . alma now behold his name be pahoran . and pahoran do fill the seat of his father and do commence his reign in the end of the twenty and fourth year over the people of nephi . alma chapter alma and now it come to pass in the commencement of the twenty and fifth year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi they have establish peace between the people of lehi and the people of morianton concern their land and have commence the twenty and fifth year in peace alma nevertheless they do not long maintain an entire peace in the land for there begin to be a contention among the people concern the chief judge pahoran for behold there be a part of the people who desire that a few particular point of the law should be alter . alma but behold pahoran would not alter nor suffer the law to be alter therefore he do not hearken to those who have send in their voice with their petition concern the altering of the law . alma therefore those who be desirous that the law should be alter be angry with him and desire that he should no longer be chief judge over the land therefore there arise a warm dispute concern the matter but not unto bloodshed . alma and it come to pass that those who be desirous that pahoran should be dethrone from the judgment seat be call king men for they be desirous that the law should be alter in a manner to overthrow the free government and to establish a king over the land . alma and those who be desirous that pahoran should remain chief judge over the land take upon them the name of freeman and thus be the division among them for the freeman have swear or covenant to maintain their right and the privilege of their religion by a free government . alma and it come to pass that this matter of their contention be settle by the voice of the people . and it come to pass that the voice of the people come in favor of the freeman and pahoran retain the judgment seat which cause much rejoicing among the brother of pahoran and also many of the people of liberty who also put the king men to silence that they durst not oppose but be oblige to maintain the cause of freedom . alma now those who be in favor of king be those of high birth and they seek to be king and they be support by those who seek power and authority over the people . alma but behold this be a critical time for such contention to be among the people of nephi for behold amalickiah have again stir up the heart of the people of the lamanites against the people of the nephites and he be gather together soldier from all part of his land and arm them and prepare for war with all diligence for he have swear to drink the blood of moroni . alma but behold we shall see that his promise which he make be rash nevertheless he do prepare himself and his army to come to battle against the nephites . alma now his army be not so great a they have hitherto be because of the many thousand who have be slay by the hand of the nephites but notwithstanding their great loss amalickiah have gather together a wonderfully great army insomuch that he fear not to come down to the land of zarahemla . alma yea even amalickiah do himself come down at the head of the lamanites . and it be in the twenty and fifth year of the reign of the judge and it be at the same time that they have begin to settle the affair of their contention concern the chief judge pahoran . alma and it come to pass that when the men who be call king men have hear that the lamanites be come down to battle against them they be glad in their heart and they refuse to take up arm for they be so wroth with the chief judge and also with the people of liberty that they would not take up arm to defend their country . alma and it come to pass that when moroni saw this and also saw that the lamanites be come into the border of the land he be exceedingly wroth because of the stubbornness of those people whom he have labor with so much diligence to preserve yea he be exceedingly wroth his soul be fill with anger against them . alma and it come to pass that he send a petition with the voice of the people unto the governor of the land desire that he should read it and give him moroni power to compel those dissenter to defend their country or to put them to death . alma for it be his first care to put an end to such contention and dissension among the people for behold this have be hitherto a cause of all their destruction . and it come to pass that it be grant accord to the voice of the people . alma and it come to pass that moroni command that his army should go against those king men to pull down their pride and their nobility and level them with the earth or they should take up arm and support the cause of liberty . alma and it come to pass that the army do march forth against them and they do pull down their pride and their nobility insomuch that a they do lift their weapon of war to fight against the men of moroni they be hew down and level to the earth . alma and it come to pass that there be four thousand of those dissenter who be hew down by the sword and those of their leader who be not slay in battle be take and cast into prison for there be no time for their trial at this period . alma and the remainder of those dissenter rather than be smite down to the earth by the sword yield to the standard of liberty and be compel to hoist the title of liberty upon their tower and in their city and to take up arm in defence of their country . alma and thus moroni put an end to those king men that there be not any know by the appellation of king men and thus he put an end to the stubbornness and the pride of those people who profess the blood of nobility but they be bring down to humble themselves like unto their brother and to fight valiantly for their freedom from bondage . alma behold it come to pass that while moroni be thus break down the war and contention among his own people and subject them to peace and civilization and make regulation to prepare for war against the lamanites behold the lamanites have come into the land of moroni which be
