in the border by the seashore . alma and it come to pass that the nephites be not sufficiently strong in the city of moroni therefore amalickiah do drive them slay many . and it come to pass that amalickiah take possession of the city yea possession of all their fortification . alma and those who flee out of the city of moroni come to the city of nephihah and also the people of the city of lehi gather themselves together and make preparation and be ready to receive the lamanites to battle . alma but it come to pass that amalickiah would not suffer the lamanites to go against the city of nephihah to battle but keep them down by the seashore leave men in every city to maintain and defend it . alma and thus he go on take possession of many city the city of nephihah and the city of lehi and the city of morianton and the city of omner and the city of gid and the city of mulek all of which be on the east border by the seashore . alma and thus have the lamanites obtain by the cunning of amalickiah so many city by their numberless host all of which be strongly fortify after the manner of the fortification of moroni all of which afford stronghold for the lamanites . alma and it come to pass that they march to the border of the land bountiful drive the nephites before them and slay many . alma but it come to pass that they be meet by teancum who have slay morianton and have head his people in his flight . alma and it come to pass that he head amalickiah also a he be march forth with his numerous army that he might take possession of the land bountiful and also the land northward . alma but behold he meet with a disappointment by be repulse by teancum and his men for they be great warrior for every man of teancum do exceed the lamanites in their strength and in their skill of war insomuch that they do gain advantage over the lamanites . alma and it come to pass that they do harass them insomuch that they do slay them even until it be dark . and it come to pass that teancum and his men do pitch their tent in the border of the land bountiful and amalickiah do pitch his tent in the border on the beach by the seashore and after this manner be they drive . alma and it come to pass that when the night have come teancum and his servant stole forth and go out by night and go into the camp of amalickiah and behold sleep have overpower them because of their much fatigue which be cause by the labor and heat of the day . alma and it come to pass that teancum steal privily into the tent of the king and put a javelin to his heart and he do cause the death of the king immediately that he do not awake his servant . alma and he return again privily to his own camp and behold his men be asleep and he awake them and tell them all the thing that he have do . alma and he cause that his army should stand in readiness lest the lamanites have awaken and should come upon them . alma and thus endeth the twenty and fifth year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi and thus endeth the day of amalickiah . alma chapter alma and now it come to pass in the twenty and sixth year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi behold when the lamanites awake on the first morning of the first month behold they find amalickiah be dead in his own tent and they also saw that teancum be ready to give them battle on that day . alma and now when the lamanites saw this they be affright and they abandon their design in march into the land northward and retreat with all their army into the city of mulek and sought protection in their fortification . alma and it come to pass that the brother of amalickiah be appoint king over the people and his name be ammoron thus king ammoron the brother of king amalickiah be appoint to reign in his stead . alma and it come to pass that he do command that his people should maintain those city which they have take by the shedding of blood for they have not take any city save they have lose much blood . alma and now teancum saw that the lamanites be determine to maintain those city which they have take and those part of the land which they have obtain possession of and also see the enormity of their number teancum think it be not expedient that he should attempt to attack them in their fort . alma but he keep his men round about a if make preparation for war yea and truly he be prepare to defend himself against them by cast up wall round about and prepare place of resort . alma and it come to pass that he keep thus prepare for war until moroni have send a large number of men to strengthen his army . alma and moroni also send order unto him that he should retain all the prisoner who fell into his hand for a the lamanites have take many prisoner that he should retain all the prisoner of the lamanites a a ransom for those whom the lamanites have take . alma and he also send order unto him that he should fortify the land bountiful and secure the narrow pas which lead into the land northward lest the lamanites should obtain that point and should have power to harass them on every side . alma and moroni also send unto him desire him that he would be faithful in maintain that quarter of the land and that he would seek every opportunity to scourge the lamanites in that quarter as much a be in his power that perhaps he might take again by stratagem or some other way those city which have be take out of their hand and that he also would fortify and strengthen the city round about which have not fall into the hand of the lamanites . alma and he also say unto him i would come unto you but behold the lamanites be upon u in the border of the land by the west sea and behold i go against them therefore i can not come unto you . alma now the king ammoron have depart out of the land of zarahemla and have make know unto the queen concern the death of his brother and have gather together a large number of men and have march forth against the nephites on the border by the west sea . alma and thus he be endeavor to harass the nephites and to draw away a part of their force to that part of the land while he have command those whom he have leave to possess the city which he have take that they should also harass the nephites on the border by the east sea and should take possession of their land as much a it be in their power accord to the power of their army . alma and thus be the nephites in those dangerous circumstance in the end of the twenty and sixth year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi . alma but behold it come to pass in the twenty and seventh year of the reign of the judge that teancum by the command of moroni who have establish army to protect the south and the west border of the land and have begin his march towards the land bountiful that he might assist teancum with his men in retake the city which they have lose alma and it come to pass that teancum have receive order to make an attack upon the city of mulek and retake it if it be possible . alma and it come to pass that teancum make preparation to make an attack upon the city of mulek and march forth with his army against the lamanites but he saw that it be impossible that he could overpower them while they be in their fortification therefore he abandon his design and return again to the city bountiful to wait for the come of moroni that he might receive strength to his army . alma and it come to pass that moroni do arrive with his army at the land of bountiful in the latter end of the twenty and seventh year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi . alma and in the commencement of the twenty and eighth year moroni and teancum and many of the chief captain hold a council of war what they should do to cause the lamanites to come out against them to battle or that they might by some mean flatter them out of their stronghold that they might gain advantage over them and take again the city of mulek . alma and it come to pass they send embassy to the army of the lamanites which protect the city of mulek to their leader whose name be jacob desire him that he would come out with his army to meet them upon the plain between the two city . but behold jacob who be a zoramite would not come out with his army to meet them upon the plain . alma and it come to pass that moroni have no hope of meet them upon fair ground therefore he resolve upon a plan that he might decoy the lamanites out of their stronghold . alma therefore he cause that teancum should take a small number of men and march down near the seashore and moroni and his army by night march in the wilderness on the west of the city mulek and thus on the morrow when the guard of the lamanites have discover teancum they run and tell it unto jacob their leader . alma and it come to pass that the army of the lamanites do march forth against teancum supposing by their number to overpower teancum because of the smallness of his number . and a teancum saw the army of the lamanites come out against him he begin to retreat down by the seashore northward . alma and it come to pass that when the lamanites saw that he begin to flee they take courage and pursue them with vigor . and while teancum be thus lead away the lamanites who be pursue them in vain behold moroni command that a part of his army who be with him should march forth into the city and take possession of it . alma and thus they do and slew all those who have be leave to protect the city yea all those who would not yield up their weapon of war . alma and thus moroni have obtain possession of the city mulek with a part of his army while he march with the remainder to meet the lamanites when they should return from the pursuit of teancum . alma and it come to pass that the lamanites do pursue teancum until they come near the city bountiful and then they be meet by lehi and a small army which have be leave to protect the city bountiful . alma and now behold when the chief captain of the lamanites have behold lehi with his army come against them they flee in much confusion l perhaps they should not obtain the city mulek before lehi should overtake them for they be weary because of their march and the men of lehi be fresh . alma now the lamanites do not know that moroni have be in their rear with his army and all they fear be lehi and his men . alma now lehi be not desirous to overtake them till they should meet moroni and his army . alma and it come to pass that before the lamanites have retreat far they be surround by the nephites by the men of moroni on one hand and the men of lehi on the other all of whom be fresh and full of strength but the lamanites be weary because of their long march . alma and moroni command his men that they should fall upon them until they have give up their weapon of war . alma and it come to pass that jacob be their leader be also a zoramite and have an unconquerable spirit he lead the lamanites forth to battle with exceed fury against moroni . alma moroni be in their course of march therefore jacob be determine to slay them and cut his way through to the city of mulek . but behold moroni and his men be more powerful therefore they do not give way before the lamanites . alma and it come to pass that they fight on both hand with exceed fury and there be many slain on both side yea and moroni be wound and jacob be kill . alma and lehi press upon their rear with such fury with his strong men that the lamanites in the rear deliver up their weapon of war and the remainder of them be much confuse know not whither to go or to strike . alma now moroni see their confusion he say unto them if ye will bring forth your weapon of war and deliver them up behold we will forbear shed your blood . alma and it come to pass that when the lamanites have hear these word their chief captain all those who be not slay come forth and throw down their weapon of war at the foot of moroni and also command their men that they should do the same . alma but behold there be many that would not and those who would not deliver up their sword be take and bind and their weapon of war be take from them and they be compel to march with their brother forth into the land bountiful . alma and now the number of prisoner who be take exceeded more than the number of those who have be slay yea more than those who have be slay on both side . alma chapter alma and it come to pass that they do set guard over the prisoner of the lamanites and do compel them to go forth and bury their dead yea and also the dead of the nephites who be slay and moroni place men over them to guard them while they should perform their labor . alma and moroni go to the city of mulek with lehi and take command of the city and give it unto lehi . now behold this lehi be a man who have be with moroni in the more part of all his battle and he be a man like unto moroni and they rejoice in each other 's safety yea they be beloved by each other and also beloved by all the people of nephi . alma and it come to pass that after the lamanites have finish bury their dead and also the dead of the nephites they be march back into the land bountiful and teancum by the order of moroni cause that they should commence labor in dig a ditch round about the land or the city bountiful . alma and he cause that they should build a breastwork of timber upon the inner bank of the ditch and they cast up dirt out of the ditch against the breastwork of timber and thus they do cause the lamanites to labor until they have encircle the city of bountiful round about with a strong wall of timber and earth to an exceed height . alma and this city become an exceeding stronghold ever after and in this city they do guard the prisoner of the lamanites yea even within a wall which they have cause them to build with their own hand . now moroni be compel to cause the lamanites to labor because it be easy to guard them while at their labor and he desire all his force when he should make an attack upon the lamanites . alma and it come to pass that moroni have thus gain a victory over one of the great of the army of the lamanites and have obtain possession of the city of mulek which be one of the strong hold of the lamanites in the land of nephi and thus he have also build a stronghold to retain his prisoner . alma and it come to pass that he do no more attempt a battle with the lamanites in that year but he do employ his men in prepare for war yea and in make fortification to guard against the lamanites yea and also deliver their woman and their child from famine and affliction and provide food for their army . alma and now it come to pass that the army of the lamanites on the west sea south while in the absence of moroni on account of some intrigue amongst the nephites which cause dissension amongst them have gain some ground over the nephites yea insomuch that they have obtain possession of a number of their city in that part of the land . alma and thus because of iniquity amongst themselves yea because of dissension and intrigue among themselves they be place in the most dangerous circumstance . alma and now behold i have somewhat to say concern the people of ammon who in the beginning be lamanites but by ammon and his brother or rather by the power and word of god they have be convert unto the lord and they have be bring down into the land of zarahemla and have ever since be protect by the nephites . alma and because of their oath they have be keep from take up arm against their brother for they have take an oath that they never would shed blood more and accord to their oath they would have perish yea they would have suffer themselves to have fall into the hand of their brother have it not be for the pity and the exceed love which ammon and his brother have have for them . alma and for this cause they be bring down into the land of zarahemla and they ever have be protect by the nephites . alma but it come to pass that when they saw the danger and the many affliction and tribulation which the nephites bore for them they be move with compassion and be desirous to take up arm in the defence of their country . alma but behold a they be about to take their weapon of war they be overpower by the persuasion of helaman and his brother for they be about to break the oath which they have make . alma and helaman fear l by so do they should lose their soul therefore all those who have enter into this covenant be compel to behold their brother wade through their affliction in their dangerous circumstance at this time . alma but behold it come to pass they have many son who have not enter into a covenant that they would not take their weapon of war to defend themselves against their enemy therefore they do assemble themselves together at this time as many a be able to take up arm and they call themselves nephites . alma and they enter into a covenant to fight for the liberty of the nephites yea to protect the land unto the lay down of their life yea even they covenant that they never would give up their liberty but they would fight in all case to protect the nephites and themselves from bondage . alma now behold there be two thousand of those young men who enter into this covenant and take their weapon of war to defend their country . alma and now behold a they never have hitherto be a disadvantage to the nephites they become now at this period of time also a great support for they take their weapon of war and they would that helaman should be their leader . alma and they be all young men and they be exceedingly valiant for courage and also for strength and activity but behold this be not all they be men who be true at all time in whatsoever thing they be entrust . alma yea they be men of truth and soberness for they have be teach to keep the commandment of god and to walk uprightly before him . alma and now it come to pass that helaman do march at the head of his two thousand stripling soldier to the support of the people in the border of the land on the south by the west sea . alma and thus end the twenty and eighth year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi . alma chapter alma and now it come to pass in the commencement of the twenty and ninth year of the judge that ammoron send unto moroni desiring that he would exchange prisoner . alma and it come to pass that moroni felt to rejoice exceedingly at this request for he desire the provision which be impart for the support of the lamanite prisoner for the support of his own people and he also desire his own people for the strengthening of his army . alma now the lamanites have take many woman and child and there be not a woman nor a child among all the prisoner of moroni or the prisoner whom moroni have take therefore moroni resolve upon a stratagem to obtain a many prisoner of the nephites from the lamanites a it be possible . alma therefore he write an epistle and send it by the servant of ammoron the same who have bring an epistle to moroni . now these be the word which he write unto ammoron say alma behold ammoron i have write unto you somewhat concern this war which ye have wag against my people or rather which thy brother hath wag against them and which ye be still determine to carry on after his death . alma behold i would tell you somewhat concern the justice of god and the sword of his almighty wrath which doth hang over you except ye repent and withdraw your army into your own land or the land of your possession which be the land of nephi . alma yea i would tell you these thing if ye be capable of hearken unto them yea i would tell you concern that awful hell that await to receive such murderer a thou and thy brother have be except ye repent and withdraw your murderous purpose and return with your army to your own land . alma but a ye have once reject these thing and have fight against the people of the lord even so i may expect you will do it again . alma and now behold we be prepared to receive you yea and except you withdraw your purpose behold ye will pull down the wrath of that god whom you have reject upon you even to your utter destruction . alma but a the lord liveth our army shall come upon you except ye withdraw and ye shall soon be visit with death for we will retain our city and our land yea and we will maintain our religion and the cause of our god . alma but behold it supposeth me that i talk to you concern these thing in vain or it supposeth me that thou art a child of hell therefore i will close my epistle by tell you that i will not exchange prisoner save it be on condition that ye will deliver up a man and his wife and his child for one prisoner if this be the case that ye will do it i will exchange . alma and behold if you do not this i will come against you with my army yea even i will arm my woman and my child and i will come against you and i will follow you even into your own land which be the land of our first inheritance yea and it shall be blood for blood yea life for life and i will give you battle even until you be destroy from off the face of the earth . alma behold i be in my anger and also my people ye have seek to murder u and we have only seek to defend ourselves . but behold if ye seek to destroy u more we will seek to destroy you yea and we will seek our land the land of our first inheritance . alma now i close my epistle . i be moroni i be a leader of the people of the nephites . alma now it come to pass that ammoron when he have receive this epistle be angry and he write another epistle unto moroni and these be the word which he write say alma i be ammoron the king of the lamanites i be the brother of amalickiah whom ye have murder . behold i will avenge his blood upon you yea and i will come upon you with my army for i fear not your threatenings . alma for behold your father do wrong their brother insomuch that they do rob them of their right to the government when it rightly belong unto them . alma and now behold if ye will lay down your arm and subject yourselves to be govern by those to whom the government doth rightly belong then will i cause that my people shall lay down their weapon and shall be at war no more . alma behold ye have breathe out many threatenings against me and my people but behold we fear not your threatenings . alma nevertheless i will grant to exchange prisoner accord to your request gladly that i may preserve my food for my men of war and we will wage a war which shall be eternal either to the subject the nephites to our authority or to their eternal extinction . alma and a concern that god whom ye say we have reject behold we know not such a be neither do ye but if it so be that there be such a thing we know not but that he hath make u as well a you . alma and if it so be that there be a devil and a hell behold will he not send you there to dwell with my brother whom ye have murder whom ye have hint that he hath go to such a place ? but behold these thing matter not . alma i be ammoron and a descendant of zoram whom your father press and bring out of jerusalem . alma and behold now i be a bold lamanite behold this war hath be wag to avenge their wrong and to maintain and to obtain their right to the government and i close my epistle to moroni . alma chapter alma now it come to pass that when moroni have receive this epistle he be more angry because he know that ammoron have a perfect knowledge of his fraud yea he know that ammoron know that it be not a just cause that have cause him to wage a war against the people of nephi . alma and he say behold i will not exchange prisoner with ammoron save he will withdraw his purpose a i have state in my epistle for i will not grant unto him that he shall have any more power than what he hath get . alma behold i know the place where the lamanites do guard my people whom they have take prisoner and a ammoron would not grant unto me mine epistle behold i will give unto him accord to my word yea i will seek death among them until they shall sue for peace . alma and now it come to pass that when moroni have say these word he cause that a search should be make among his men that perhaps he might find a man who be a descendant of laman among them . alma and it come to pass that they find one whose name be laman and he be one of the servant of the king who be murder by amalickiah . alma now moroni cause that laman and a small number of his men should go forth unto the guard who be over the nephites . alma now the nephites be guard in the city of gid therefore moroni appoint laman and cause that a small number of men should go with him . alma and when it be even laman go to the guard who be over the nephites and behold they saw him come and they hail him but he saith unto them fear not behold i be a lamanite . behold we have escape from the nephites and they sleep and behold we have take of their wine and brought with u . alma now when the lamanites hear these word they receive him with joy and they say unto him give u of your wine that we may drink we be glad that ye have thus take wine with you for we be weary . alma but laman say unto them let u keep of our wine till we go against the nephites to battle . but this say only make them more desirous to drink of the wine alma for say they we be weary therefore let u take of the wine and by and by we shall receive wine for our ration which will strengthen u to go against the nephites . alma and laman say unto them you may do accord to your desire . alma and it come to pass that they do take of the wine freely and it be pleasant to their taste therefore they take of it more freely and it be strong have be prepare in it strength . alma and it come to pass they do drink and be merry and by and by they be all drunken . alma and now when laman and his men saw that they be all drunken and be in a deep sleep they return to moroni and tell him all the thing that have happen . alma and now this be accord to the design of moroni . and moroni have prepare his men with weapon of war and he go to the city gid while the lamanites be in a deep sleep and drunken and cast in weapon of war unto the prisoner insomuch that they be all arm alma yea even to their woman and all those of their child as many a be able to use a weapon of war when moroni have arm all those prisoner and all those thing be do in a profound silence . alma but have they awaken the lamanites behold they be drunken and the nephites could have slay them . alma but behold this be not the desire of moroni he do not delight in murder or bloodshed but he delight in the saving of his people from destruction and for this cause he might not bring upon him injustice he would not fall upon the lamanites and destroy them in their drunkenness . alma but he have obtain his desire for he have arm those prisoner of the nephites who be within the wall of the city and have give them power to gain possession of those part which be within the wall . alma and then he cause the men who be with him to withdraw a pace from them and surround the army of the lamanites . alma now behold this be do in the night time so that when the lamanites awake in the morning they behold that they be surround by the nephites without and that their prisoner be arm within . alma and thus they saw that the nephites have power over them and in these circumstance they find that it be not expedient that they should fight with the nephites therefore their chief captain demand their weapon of war and they bring them forth and cast them at the foot of the nephites plead for mercy . alma now behold this be the desire of moroni . he take them prisoner of war and take possession of the city and cause that all the prisoner should be liberate who be nephites and they do join the army of moroni and be a great strength to his army . alma and it come to pass that he do cause the lamanites whom he have take prisoner that they should commence a labor in strengthen the fortification round about the city gid . alma and it come to pass that when he have fortify the city gid accord to his desire he cause that his prisoner should be take to the city bountiful and he also guard that city with an exceedingly strong force . alma and it come to pass that they do notwithstanding all the intrigue of the lamanites keep and protect all the prisoner whom they have take and also maintain all the ground and the advantage which they have retake . alma and it come to pass that the nephites begin again to be victorious and to reclaim their right and their privilege . alma many time do the lamanites attempt to encircle them about by night but in these attempt they do lose many prisoner . alma and many time do they attempt to administer of their wine to the nephites that they might destroy them with poison or with drunkenness . alma but behold the nephites be not slow to remember the lord their god in this their time of affliction . they could not be take in their snare yea they would not partake of their wine save they have first give to some of the lamanite prisoner . alma and they be thus cautious that no poison should be administer among them for if their wine would poison a lamanite it would also poison a nephite and thus they do try all their liquor . alma and now it come to pass that it be expedient for moroni to make preparation to attack the city morianton for behold the lamanites have by their labor fortify the city morianton until it have become an exceed stronghold . alma and they be continually bring new force into that city and also new supply of provision . alma and thus end the twenty and ninth year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi . alma chapter alma and now it come to pass in the commencement of the thirtieth year of the reign of the judge on the second day in the first month moroni receive an epistle from helaman state the affair of the people in that quarter of the land . alma and these be the word which he write say my dearly beloved brother moroni as well in the lord a in the tribulation of our warfare behold my beloved brother i have somewhat to tell you concern our warfare in this part of the land . alma behold two thousand of the son of those men whom ammon bring down out of the land of nephi now ye have know that these be descendant of laman who be the eldest son of our father lehi alma now i need not rehearse unto you concern their tradition or their unbelief for thou knowest concern all these thing alma therefore it sufficeth me that i tell you that two thousand of these young men have take their weapon of war and would that i should be their leader and we have come forth to defend our country . alma and now ye also know concern the covenant which their father make that they would not take up their weapon of war against their brother to shed blood . alma but in the twenty and sixth year when they saw our affliction and our tribulation for them they be about to break the covenant which they have make and take up their weapon of war in our defence . alma but i would not suffer them that they should break this covenant which they have make suppose that god would strengthen u insomuch that we should not suffer more because of the fulfil the oath which they have take . alma but behold here be one thing in which we may have great joy . for behold in the twenty and sixth year i helaman do march at the head of these two thousand young men to the city of judea to assist antipus whom ye have appoint a leader over the people of that part of the land . alma and i do join my two thousand son for they be worthy to be call son to the army of antipus in which strength antipus do rejoice exceedingly for behold his army have be reduce by the lamanites because their force have slay a vast number of our men for which cause we have to mourn . alma nevertheless we may console ourselves in this point that they have die in the cause of their country and of their god yea and they be happy . alma and the lamanites have also retain many prisoner all of whom be chief captain for none other have they spar alive . and we suppose that they be now at this time in the land of nephi it be so if they be not slain . alma and now these be the city of which the lamanites have obtain possession by have fight valiantly by day and toil by night to maintain their city and thus they have suffer great affliction of every kind . alma and now they be determine to conquer in this place or die therefore you may well suppose that this little force which i brought with me yea those son of mine give them great hope and much joy . alma and now it come to pass that when the lamanites saw that antipus have receive a great strength to his army they be compel by the order of ammoron to not come against the city of judea or against u to battle . alma and thus be we favor of the lord for have they come upon u in this our weakness they might have perhaps destroy our little army but thus be we preserve . alma they be command by ammoron to maintain those city which they have take . and thus end the twenty and sixth year . and in the commencement of the twenty and seventh year we have prepare our city and ourselves for defence . alma now we be desirous that the lamanites should come upon u for we be not desirous to make an attack upon them in their stronghold . alma and it come to pass that we keep spy out round about to watch the movement of the lamanites that they might not pass u by night nor by day to make an attack upon our other city which be on the northward . alma for we know in those city they be not sufficiently strong to meet them therefore we be desirous if they should pass by u to fall upon them in their rear and thus bring them up in the rear at the same time they be meet in the front . we suppose that we could overpower them but behold we be disappoint in this our desire . alma they durst not pass by u with their whole army neither durst they with a part lest they should not be sufficiently strong and they should fall . alma neither durst they march down against the city of zarahemla neither durst they cross the head of sidon over to the city of nephihah . alma and thus with their force they be determine to maintain those city which they have take . alma and now it come to pass in the second month of this year there be bring unto u many provision from the father of those my two thousand son . alma and also there be send two thousand men unto u from the land of zarahemla . and thus we be prepare with ten thousand men and provision for them and also for their wife and their child . alma and the lamanites thus see our force increase daily and provision neighboring city . alma and we be to march near the city of antiparah a if we be go to the city beyond in the border by the seashore . alma and it come to pass that we do march forth a if with our provision to go to that city . alma and it come to pass that antipus do march forth with a part of his army leave the remainder to maintain the city . but he do not march forth until i have go forth the lamanites alma yea even to a considerable distance insomuch that when they saw the army of antipus pursue them with their might they do not turn to the right nor to the left but pursue their march in a straight course after u and a we suppose it be their intent to slay u before antipus should overtake them and this that they might not be surround by our people . alma and now antipus behold our danger do speed the march of his army . but behold it be night therefore they do not overtake u neither do antipus overtake them therefore we do camp for the night . alma and it come to pass that before the dawn of the morning behold the lamanites be pursue u . now we be not sufficiently strong to contend with them yea i would not suffer that my little son should fall into their hand therefore we do continue our march and we take our march into the wilderness . alma now they durst not turn to the right nor to the leave l they should be surround neither would i turn to the right nor to the chapter alma and now it come to pass that i receive an epistle from ammoron the king state that if i would deliver up those prisoner of war whom we have take that he would deliver up the city of go against the city of antiparah . alma but the people of antiparah do leave the city and flee to their other city which they have possession of to fortify them and thus the city of antiparah fell into our hand . alma and thus end the twenty and eighth year of the reign of the judge . alma and it come to pass that in the commencement of the twenty and ninth year we receive a supply of provision my little band of two thousand . and now behold we be strong yea and we have also plenty of provision bring unto u . alma and it come to pass that it be our desire to wage a battle with the army which and it come to pass that not many day have pass away before the lamanites begin to lose all hope of succor therefore they yield up the city unto our hand and thus we have accomplish our design in obtain the city cumeni . alma but it come to pass that our prisoner be so numerous that notwithstanding the enormity of our number we be oblige to employ all our force to keep them or to put them to death . alma for behold they would break out in great number and would fight with stone and with club or whatsoever thing they could get into their hand insomuch that we do slay upwards of two thousand of them after they have surrender themselves prisoner of war . alma therefore it become expedient for u that we should put an end to their life or guard them sword in hand down to the land of zarahemla and also our provision be not any more than sufficient for our own people notwithstanding that which we have take from the lamanites . alma and now in those critical circumstance it become a very serious matter to determine concern these prisoner of war nevertheless we do resolve to send them down to the land of zarahemla therefore we select a part of our men and give them charge over our prisoner to go down to the land of zarahemla . alma but it come to pass that on the morrow they do return . and now behold we do not inquire of them concern the prisoner for behold the lamanites be upon u and they return in season to save u from fall into their hand . for behold ammoron have send to their support a new supply of provision and also a numerous army of men . alma and it come to pass that those men whom we send with the prisoner do arrive in season to check them a they be about to overpower u . alma but behold my little band of two thousand and sixty fought most desperately yea they be firm before the lamanites and do administer death unto all those who oppose them . alma and a the remainder of our army be about to give way before the lamanites behold those two thousand and sixty be firm and undaunted . alma yea and they do obey and observe to perform every word of command with exactness yea and even accord to their faith it be do unto them and i do remember the word which they say unto me that their mother have teach them . alma and now behold it be these my son and those men who have be select to convey the prisoner to whom we owe this great victory for it be they who do beat the lamanites therefore they be drive back to the city of manti . alma and we retain our city cumeni and be not all destroy by the sword nevertheless we have suffer great loss . alma and it come to pass that after the lamanites have flee i immediately give order that my men who have be wound should be take from among the dead and cause that their wound should be dress . alma and it come to pass that there be two hundred out of my two thousand and sixty who have faint because of the loss of blood nevertheless accord to the goodness of god and to our great astonishment and also the joy of our whole army there be not one soul of them who do perish yea and neither be there one soul among them who have not receive many wound . alma and now their preservation be astonish to our whole army yea that they should be spar while there be a thousand of our brother who be slay . and we do justly ascribe it to the miraculous power of god because of their exceed faith in that which they have be teach to believe that there be a just god and whosoever do not doubt that they should be preserve by his marvelous power . alma now this be the faith of these of whom i have speak they be young and their mind be firm and they do put their trust in god continually . alma and now it come to pass that after we have thus take care of our wound men and have bury our dead and also the dead will fall upon them yea and will destroy our people . alma and it come to pass that our prisoner do hear their cry which cause them to take courage and they do rise up in rebellion against u . alma and it come to pass because of their rebellion we do cause that our sword should come upon them . and it come to pass that they do in a body run upon our sword in the which the great number of them be slay and the remainder of them break through and flee from u . alma and behold when they have flee and we could not overtake them we take our march with speed towards the city cumeni and behold we do arrive in time that we might assist our brother in preserve the city . alma and behold we be again deliver out of the hand of our enemy . and bless be the name of our god for behold it be he that have we might not all perish yea and i trust that the soul of them who have be slay have enter into the rest of their god . alma chapter alma and behold now it come to pass that our next object be to obtain the city of manti but behold there be no way that we could lead them out of the city by our small band . for behold they remember that which we have hitherto do therefore we could not decoy them away from their stronghold . alma and they be so much more numerous than be our army that we durst not go forth and attack them in their stronghold . alma yea and it become expedient that we should employ our men to the maintain those part of the land which we have regain of our possession therefore it become expedient that we should wait that we might receive more strength from the land
