pestilence and destruction accord to the wickedness of this people . helaman behold i give unto you power that whatsoever ye shall seal on earth shall be seal in heaven and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loose in heaven and thus shall ye have power among this people . helaman and thus if ye shall say unto this temple it shall be rent in twain it shall be do . helaman and if ye shall say unto this mountain be thou cast down and become smooth it shall be do . helaman and behold if ye shall say that god shall smite this people it shall come to pass . helaman and now behold i command you that ye shall go and declare unto this people that thus saith the lord god who be the almighty except ye repent ye shall be smite even unto destruction . helaman and behold now it come to pass that when the lord have speak these word unto nephi he do stop and do not go unto his own house but do return unto the multitude who be scatter about upon the face of the land and begin to declare unto them the word of the lord which have be speak unto him concern their destruction if they do not repent . helaman now behold notwithstanding that great miracle which nephi have do in tell them concern the death of the chief judge they do harden their heart and do not hearken unto the word of the lord . helaman therefore nephi do declare unto them the word of the lord say except ye repent thus saith the lord ye shall be smite even unto destruction . helaman and it come to pass that when nephi have declare unto them the word behold they do still harden their heart and would not hearken unto his word therefore they do revile against him and do seek to lay their hand upon him that they might cast him into prison . helaman but behold the power of god be with him and they could not take him to cast him into prison for he be take by the spirit and convey away out of the midst of them . helaman and it come to pass that thus he do go forth in the spirit from multitude to multitude declare the word of god even until he have declare it unto them all or send it forth among all the people . helaman and it come to pass that they would not hearken unto his word and there begin to be contention insomuch that they be divide against themselves and begin to slay one another with the sword . helaman and thus end the seventy and first year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi . helaman chapter helaman and now it come to pass in the seventy and second year of the reign of the judge that the contention do increase insomuch that there be war throughout all the land among all the people of nephi . helaman and it be this secret band of robber who do carry on this work of destruction and wickedness . and this war do last all that year and in the seventy and third year it do also last . helaman and it come to pass that in this year nephi do cry unto the lord say helaman o lord do not suffer that this people shall be destroy by the sword but o lord rather let there be a famine in the land to stir them up in remembrance of the lord their god and perhaps they will repent and turn unto thee . helaman and so it be do accord to the word of nephi . and there be a great famine upon the land among all the people of nephi . and thus in the seventy and fourth year the famine do continue and the work of destruction do cease by the sword but become sore by famine . helaman and this work of destruction do also continue in the seventy and fifth year . for the earth be smite that it be dry and do not yield forth grain in the season of grain and the whole earth be smite even among the lamanites as well a among the nephites so that they be smite that they do perish by thousand in the more wicked part of the land . helaman and it come to pass that the people saw that they be about to perish by famine and they begin to remember the lord their god and they begin to remember the word of nephi . helaman and the people begin to plead with their chief judge and their leader that they would say unto nephi behold we know that thou art a man of god and therefore cry unto the lord our god that he turn away from u this famine l all the word which thou hast speak concern our destruction be fulfil . helaman and it come to pass that the judge do say unto nephi accord to the word which have be desire . and it come to pass that when nephi saw that the people have repent and do humble themselves in sackcloth he cry again unto the lord say helaman o lord behold this people repenteth and they have sweep away the band of gadianton from amongst them insomuch that they have become extinct and they have conceal their secret plan in the earth . helaman now o lord because of this their humility wilt thou turn away thine anger and let thine anger be appease in the destruction of those wicked men whom thou hast already destroy . helaman o lord wilt thou turn away thine anger yea thy fierce anger and cause that this famine may cease in this land . helaman o lord wilt thou hearken unto me and cause that it may be do accord to my word and send forth rain upon the face of the earth that she may bring forth her fruit and her grain in the season of grain . helaman o lord thou didst hearken unto my word when i say let there be a famine that the pestilence of the sword might cease and i know that thou wilt even at this time hearken unto my word for thou saidst that if this people repent i will spare them . helaman yea o lord and thou seest that they have repent because of the famine and the pestilence and destruction which have come unto them . helaman and now o lord wilt thou turn away thine anger and try again if they will serve thee ? and if so o lord thou canst bless them accord to thy word which thou hast say . helaman and it come to pass that in the seventy and sixth year the lord do turn away his anger from the people and cause that rain should fall upon the earth insomuch that it do bring forth her fruit in the season of her fruit . and it come to pass that it do bring forth her grain in the season of her grain . helaman and behold the people do rejoice and glorify god and the whole face of the land be fill with rejoice and they do no more seek to destroy nephi but they do esteem him a a great prophet and a man of god have great power and authority give unto him from god . helaman and behold lehi his brother be not a whit behind him a to thing pertain to righteousness . helaman and thus it do come to pass that the people of nephi begin to prosper again in the land and begin to build up their waste place and begin to multiply and spread even until they do cover the whole face of the land both on the northward and on the southward from the sea west to the sea east . helaman and it come to pass that the seventy and sixth year do end in peace . and the seventy and seventh year begin in peace and the church do spread throughout the face of all the land and the more part of the people both the nephites and the lamanites do belong to the church and they do have exceedingly great peace in the land and thus end the seventy and seventh year . helaman and also they have peace in the seventy and eighth year save it be a few contention concern the point of doctrine which have be lay down by the prophet . helaman and in the seventy and ninth year there begin to be much strife . but it come to pass that nephi and lehi and many of their brother who know concern the true point of doctrine have many revelation daily therefore they do preach unto the people insomuch that they do put an end to their strife in that same year . helaman and it come to pass that in the eightieth year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi there be a certain number of the dissenter from the people of nephi who have some year before go over unto the lamanites and take upon themselves the name of lamanites and also a certain number who be real descendant of the lamanites be stir up to anger by them or by those dissenter therefore they commence a war with their brother . helaman and they do commit murder and plunder and then they would retreat back into the mountain and into the wilderness and secret place hide themselves that they could not be discover receive daily an addition to their number inasmuch a there be dissenter that go forth unto them . helaman and thus in time yea even in the space of not many year they become an exceedingly great band of robber and they do search out all the secret plan of gadianton and thus they become robber of gadianton . helaman now behold these robber do make great havoc yea even great destruction among the people of nephi and also among the people of the lamanites . helaman and it come to pass that it be expedient that there should be a stop put to this work of destruction therefore they send an army of strong men into the wilderness and upon the mountain to search out this band of robber and to destroy them . helaman but behold it come to pass that in that same year they be drive back even into their own land . and thus end the eightieth year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi . helaman and it come to pass in the commencement of the eighty and first year they do go forth again against this band of robber and do destroy many and they be also visit with much destruction . helaman and they be again oblige to return out of the wilderness and out of the mountain unto their own land because of the exceed greatness of the number of those robber who infest the mountain and the wilderness . helaman and it come to pass that thus end this year . and the robber do still increase and wax strong insomuch that they do defy the whole army of the nephites and also of the lamanites and they do cause great fear to come unto the people upon all the face of the land . helaman yea for they do visit many part of the land and do do great destruction unto them yea do kill many and do carry away others captive into the wilderness yea and more especially their woman and their child . helaman now this great evil which come unto the people because of their iniquity do stir them up again in remembrance of the lord their god . helaman and thus end the eighty and first year of the reign of the judge . helaman and in the eighty and second year they begin again to forget the lord their god . and in the eighty and third year they begin to wax strong in iniquity . and in the eighty and fourth year they do not mend their way . helaman and it come to pass in the eighty and fifth year they do wax strong and strong in their pride and in their wickedness and thus they be ripen again for destruction . helaman and thus end the eighty and fifth year . helaman chapter helaman and thus we can behold how false and also the unsteadiness of they will not remember him . helaman o how foolish and how vain and how evil and devilish and how quick to do iniquity and how slow to do good be the child of men yea how quick to hearken unto the helaman yea i say unto you that in the latter time the promise of the lord have be extend to our brother the lamanites and notwithstanding the many affliction which they shall have and notwithstanding
