you it shall be good for them than for you except ye repent . helaman for behold have the mighty work be show unto them which have be show unto you yea unto them who have dwindle in unbelief because of the tradition of their father ye can see of yourselves that they never would again have dwindle in unbelief . helaman therefore saith the lord i will not utterly destroy them but i will cause that in the day of my wisdom they shall return again unto me saith the lord . helaman and now behold saith the lord concern the people of the nephites if they will not repent and observe to do my will i will utterly destroy them saith the lord because of their unbelief notwithstanding the many mighty work which i have do among them and as surely a the lord liveth shall these thing be saith the lord . helaman chapter helaman and now it come to pass that there be many who hear the word of samuel the lamanite which he spake upon the wall of the city . and as many a believe on his word go forth and seek for nephi and when they have come forth and find him they confess unto him their sin and deny not desire that they might be baptize unto the lord . helaman but as many a there be who do not believe in the word of samuel be angry with him and they cast stone at him upon the wall and also many shot arrow at him a he stand upon the wall but the spirit of the lord be with him insomuch that they could not hit him with their stone neither with their arrow . helaman now when they saw that they could not hit him there be many more who do believe on his word insomuch that they go away unto nephi to be baptize . helaman for behold nephi be baptize and prophesy and preach cry repentance unto the people show sign and wonder work miracle among the people that they might know that the christ must shortly come helaman tell them of thing which must shortly come that they might know and remember at the time of their come that they have be make know unto them beforehand to the intent that they might believe therefore as many a believe on the word of samuel go forth unto him to be baptize for they come repent and confess their sin . helaman but the more part of them do not believe in the word of samuel therefore when they saw that they could not hit him with their stone and their arrow they cry unto their captain say take this fellow and bind him for behold he hath a devil and because of the power of the devil which be in him we can not hit him with our stone and our arrow therefore take him and bind him and away with him . helaman and a they go forth to lay their hand on him behold he do cast himself down from the wall and do flee out of their land yea even unto his own country and begin to preach and to prophesy among his own people . helaman and behold he be never hear of more among the nephites and thus be the affair of the people . helaman and thus end the eighty and sixth year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi . helaman and thus end also the eighty and seventh year of the reign of the judge the more part of the people remain in their pride and wickedness and the less part walk more circumspectly before god . helaman and these be the condition also in the eighty and eighth year of the reign of the judge . helaman and there be but little alteration in the affair of the people save it be the people begin to be more harden in iniquity and do more and more of that which be contrary to the commandment of god in the eighty and ninth year of the reign of the judge . helaman but it come to pass in the ninetieth year of the reign of the judge there be great sign give unto the people and wonder and the word of the prophet begin to be fulfil . helaman and angel do appear unto men wise men and do declare unto them glad tidings of great joy thus in this year the scripture begin to be fulfil . helaman nevertheless the people begin to harden their heart all save it be the most believing part of them both of the nephites and also of the lamanites and begin to depend upon their own strength and upon their own wisdom say helaman some thing they may have guess right among so many but behold we know that all these great and marvelous work can not come to pas of which have be speak . helaman and they begin to reason and to contend among themselves say helaman that it be not reasonable that such a be a a christ shall come if so and he be the son of god the father of heaven and of earth a it have be speak why will he not show himself unto u as well a unto them who shall be at jerusalem ? helaman yea why will he not show himself in this land as well a in the land of jerusalem ? helaman but behold we know that this be a wicked tradition which have be hand down unto u by our father to cause u that we should believe in some great and marvelous thing which should come to pass but not among u but in a land which be far distant a land which we know not therefore they can keep u in ignorance for we can not witness with our own eye that they be true . helaman and they will by the cunning and the mysterious art of the evil one work some great mystery which we can not understand which will keep u down to be servant to their word and also servant unto them for we depend upon them to teach u the word and thus will they keep u in ignorance if we will yield ourselves unto them all the day of our life . helaman and many more thing do the people imagine up in their heart which be foolish and vain and they be much disturb for satan do stir them up to do iniquity continually yea he do go about spread rumor and contention upon all the face of the land that he might harden the heart of the people against that which be good and against that which should come . helaman and notwithstanding the sign and the wonder which be work among the people of the lord and the many miracle which they do satan do get great hold upon the heart of the people upon all the face of the land . helaman and thus end the ninetieth year of the reign of the judge over the people of nephi . helaman and thus end the book of helaman accord to the record of helaman and his son . third book of nephi the son of nephi who be the son of helaman and helaman be the son of helaman who be the son of alma who be the son of alma be a descendant of nephi who be the son of lehi who come out of jerusalem in the first year of the reign of zedekiah the king of judah . nephi chapter nephi now it come to pass that the ninety and first year have pass away and it be six hundred year from the time that lehi leave jerusalem and it be in the year that lachoneus be the chief judge and the governor over the land . nephi and nephi the son of helaman have depart out of the land of zarahemla give charge unto his son nephi who be his eldest son concern the plate of brass and all the record which have be keep and all those thing which have be keep sacred from the departure of lehi out of jerusalem . nephi then he depart out of the land and whither he go no man knoweth and his son nephi do keep the record in his stead yea the record of this people . nephi and it come to pass that in the commencement of the ninety and second year behold the prophecy of the prophet begin to be fulfil more fully for there begin to be great sign and great miracle work among the people . nephi but there be some who begin to say that the time be past for the word to be fulfil which be speak by samuel the lamanite . nephi and they begin to rejoice over their brother say behold the time be past and the word of samuel be not fulfil therefore your joy and your faith concern this thing hath be vain . nephi and it come to pass that they do make a great uproar throughout the land and the people who believe begin to be very sorrowful l by any mean those thing which have be speak might not come to pass . nephi but behold they do watch steadfastly for that day and that night and that day which should be a one day a if there be no night that they might know that their faith have not be vain . nephi now it come to pass that there be a day set apart by the unbeliever that all those who believe in those tradition should be put to death except the sign should come to pass which have be give by samuel the prophet . nephi now it come to pass that when nephi the son of nephi saw this wickedness of his people his heart be exceedingly sorrowful . nephi and it come to pass that he go out and bow himself down upon the earth and cry mightily to his god in behalf of his people yea those who be about to be destroy because of their faith in the tradition of their father . nephi and it come to pass that he cry mightily unto the lord all that day and behold the voice of the lord come unto him say nephi lift up your head and be of good cheer for behold the time be at hand and on this night shall the sign be give and on the morrow come i into the world to show unto the world that i will fulfill all that which i have cause to be speak by the mouth of my holy prophet . nephi behold i come unto my own to fulfill all thing which i have make know unto the child of men from the foundation of the world and to do the will both of the father and of the son of the father because of me and of the son because of my flesh . and behold the time be at hand and this night shall the sign be give . nephi and it come to pass that the word which come unto nephi be fulfil accord a they have be speak for behold at the go down of the sun there be no darkness and the people begin to be astonish because there be no darkness when the night come . nephi and there be many who have not believe the word of the prophet who fell to the earth and become a if they be dead for they know that the great plan of destruction which they have lay for those who believe in the word of the prophet have be frustrate for the sign which have be give be already at hand . nephi and they begin to know that the son of god must shortly appear yea in fine all the people upon the face of the whole earth from the west to the east both in the land north and in the land south be so exceedingly astonish that they fell to the earth . nephi for they know that the prophet have testify of these thing for many year and that the sign which have be give be already at hand and they begin to fear because of their iniquity and their unbelief . nephi and it come to pass that there be no darkness in all that night but it be as light a though it be mid day . and it come to pass that the sun do rise in the morning again accord to it proper order and they know that it be the day that the lord should be bear because of the sign which have be give . nephi and it have come to pass yea all thing every whit accord to the word of the prophet . nephi and it come to pass also that a new star do appear accord to the word . nephi and it come to pass that from this time forth there begin to be lyings sent forth among the people by satan to harden their heart to the intent that they might not believe in those sign and wonder which they have see but notwithstanding these lying and deceive the more part of the people do believe and be convert unto the lord . nephi and it come to pass that nephi go forth among the people and also many others baptize unto repentance in the which there be a great remission of sin . and thus the people begin again to have peace in the land . nephi and there be no contention save it be a few that begin to preach endeavor to prove by the scripture that it be no more expedient to observe the law of moses . now in this thing they do err have not understood the scripture . nephi but it come to pass that they soon become converted and be convince of the error which they be in for it be make know unto them that the law be not yet fulfil and that it must be fulfil in every whit yea the word come unto them that it must be fulfil yea that one jot or tittle should not pass away till it should all be fulfil therefore in this same year be they bring to a knowledge of their error and do confess their fault . nephi and thus the ninety and second year do pass away bring glad tidings unto the people because of the sign which do come to pass accord to the word of the prophecy of all the holy prophet . nephi and it come to pass that the ninety and third year do also pass away in peace save it be for the gadianton robber who dwell upon the mountain who do infest the land for so strong be their hold and their secret place that the people could not overpower them therefore they do commit many murder and do do much slaughter among the people . nephi and it come to pass that in the ninety and fourth year they begin to increase in great degree because there be many dissenter of the nephites who do flee unto them which do cause much sorrow unto those nephites who do remain in the land . nephi and there be also a cause of much sorrow among the lamanites for behold they have many child who do grow up and begin to wax strong in year that they become for themselves and be lead away by some who be zoramites by their lying and their flattering word to join those gadianton robber . nephi and thus be the lamanites afflict also and begin to decrease a to their faith and righteousness because of the wickedness of the rise generation . nephi chapter nephi and it come to pass that thus pass away the ninety and fifth year also and the people begin to forget those sign and wonder which they have hear and begin to be less and less astonish at a sign or a wonder from heaven insomuch that they begin to be hard in their heart and blind in their mind and begin to disbelieve all which they have hear and see nephi imagine up some vain thing in their heart that it be work by men and by the power of the devil to lead away and deceive the heart of the people and thus do satan get possession of the heart of the people again insomuch that he do blind their eye and lead them away to believe that the doctrine of christ be a foolish and a vain thing . nephi and it come to pass that the people begin to wax strong in wickedness and abomination and they do not believe that there should be any more sign or wonder give and satan do go about lead away the heart of the people tempt them and cause them that they should do great wickedness in the land . nephi and thus do pass away the ninety and sixth year and also the ninety and seventh year and also the ninety and eighth year and also the ninety and ninth year nephi and also an hundred year have pass away since the day of mosiah who be king over the people of the nephites . nephi and six hundred and nine year have pass away since lehi leave jerusalem . nephi and nine year have pass away from the time when the sign be give which be speak of by the prophet that christ should come into the world . nephi now the nephites begin to reckon their time from this period when the sign be give or from the come of christ therefore nine year have pass away . nephi and nephi who be the father of nephi who have the charge of the record do not return to the land of zarahemla and could nowhere be find in all the land . nephi and it come to pass that the people do still remain in wickedness notwithstanding the much preaching and prophesy which be send among them and thus pass away the tenth year also and the eleventh year also pass away in iniquity . nephi and it come to pass in the thirteenth year there begin to be war and contention throughout all the land for the gadianton robber have become so numerous and do slay so many of the people and do lay waste so many city and do spread so much death and carnage throughout the land that it become expedient that all the people both the nephites and the lamanites should take up arm against them . nephi therefore all the lamanites who have become convert unto the lord do unite with their brother the nephites and be compel for the safety of their life and their woman and their child to take up arm against those gadianton robber yea and also to maintain their right and the privilege of their church and of their worship and their freedom and their liberty . nephi and it come to pass that before this thirteenth year have pass away the nephites be threaten with utter destruction because of this war which have become exceedingly sore . nephi and it come to pass that those lamanites who have unite with the nephites be number among the nephites nephi and their curse be take from them and their skin become white like unto the nephites nephi and their young men and their daughter become exceedingly fair and they be number among the nephites and be call nephites . and thus end the thirteenth year . nephi and it come to pass in the commencement of the fourteenth year the war between the robber and the people of nephi do continue and do become exceedingly sore nevertheless the people of nephi do gain some advantage of the robber insomuch that they do drive them back out of their land into the mountain and into their secret place . nephi and thus end the fourteenth year . and in the fifteenth year they do come forth against the people of nephi and because of the wickedness of the people of nephi and their many contention and dissension the gadianton robber do gain many advantage over them . nephi and thus end the fifteenth year and thus be the people in a state of many affliction and the sword of destruction do hang over them insomuch that they be about to be smite down by it and this because of their iniquity . nephi chapter nephi and now it come to pass that in the sixteenth year from the come of christ lachoneus the governor of the land receive an epistle from the leader and the governor of this band of robber and these be the word which be write say nephi lachoneus most noble and chief governor of the land behold i write this epistle unto you and do give unto you exceedingly great praise because of your firmness and also the firmness of your people in maintain that which ye suppose to be your right and liberty yea ye do stand well a if ye be support by the hand of a god in the defence of your liberty and your property and your country or that which ye do call so . nephi and it seemeth a pity unto me most noble lachoneus that ye should be so foolish and vain a to suppose that ye can stand against so many brave men who be at my command who do now at this time stand in their arm and do await with great anxiety for the word go down upon the nephites and destroy them . nephi and i knowing of their unconquerable spirit have prove them in the field of battle and knowing of their everlasting hatred towards you because of the many wrong which ye have do unto them therefore if they should come down against you they would visit you with utter destruction . nephi therefore i have write this epistle seal it with mine own hand feel for your welfare because of your firmness in that which ye believe to be right and your noble spirit in the field of battle . nephi therefore i write unto you desire that ye would yield up unto this my people your city your land and your possession rather than that they should visit you with the sword and that destruction should come upon you . nephi or in other word yield yourselves up unto u and unite with u and become acquaint with our secret work and become our brother that ye may be like unto u not our slave but our brother and partner of all our substance . nephi and behold i swear unto you if ye will do this with an oath ye shall not be destroy but if ye will not do this i swear unto you with an oath that on the morrow month i will command that my army shall come down against you and they shall not stay their hand and shall spare not but shall slay you and shall let fall the sword upon you even until ye shall become extinct . nephi and behold i be giddianhi and i be the governor of this the secret society of gadianton which society and the work thereof i know to be good and they be of ancient date and they have be hand down unto u . nephi and i write this epistle unto you lachoneus and i hope that ye will deliver up your land and your possession without the shedding of blood that this my people may recover their right and government who have dissent away from you because of your wickedness in retain from them their right of government and except ye do this i will avenge their wrong . i be giddianhi . nephi and now it come to pass when lachoneus receive this epistle he be exceedingly astonished because of the boldness of giddianhi demand the possession of the land of the nephites and also of threaten the people and avenge the wrong of those that have receive no wrong save it be they have wrong themselves by dissent away unto those wicked and abominable robber . nephi now behold this lachoneus the governor be a just man and could not be frighten by the demand and the threatenings of a robber therefore he do not hearken to the epistle of giddianhi the governor of the robber but he do cause that his people should cry unto the lord for strength against the time that the robber should come down against them . nephi yea he send a proclamation among all the people that they should gather together their woman and their child their flock and their herd and all their substance save it be their land unto one place . nephi and he cause that fortification should be build round about them and the strength thereof should be exceedingly great . and he cause that armies both of the nephites and of the lamanites or of all them who be number among the nephites should be place a guard round about to watch them and to guard them from the robber day and night . nephi yea he say unto them a the lord liveth except ye repent of all your iniquity and cry unto the lord ye will in no wise be deliver out of the hand of those gadianton robber . nephi and so great and marvelous be the word and prophecy of lachoneus that they do cause fear to come upon all the people and they do exert themselves in their might to do accord to the word of lachoneus . nephi and it come to pass that lachoneus do appoint chief captain over all the army of the nephites to command them at the time that the robber should come down out of the wilderness against them . nephi now the chief among all the chief captain and the great commander of the army of the nephites be appoint and his name be gidgiddoni . nephi now it be the custom among all the nephites to appoint for their chief captain save it be in their time of wickedness some one that have the spirit of revelation and also prophecy therefore this gidgiddoni be a great prophet among them a also be the chief judge . nephi now the people say unto gidgiddoni pray unto the lord and let u go up upon the mountain and into the wilderness that we may fall upon the robber and destroy them in their own land . nephi but gidgiddoni saith unto them the lord forbid for if we should go up against them the lord would deliver u into their hand therefore we will prepare ourselves in the center of our land and we will gather all our army together and we will not go against them but we will wait till they shall come against u therefore a the lord liveth if we do this he will deliver them into our hand . nephi and it come to pass in the seventeenth year in the latter end of the year the proclamation of lachoneus have go forth throughout all the face of the land and they have take their horse and their chariot and their cattle and all their flock and their herd and their grain and all their substance and do march forth by thousand and by ten of thousand until they have all go forth to the place which have be appoint that they should gather themselves together to defend themselves against their enemy . nephi and the land which be appoint be the land of zarahemla and the land which be between the land zarahemla and the land bountiful yea to the line which be between the land bountiful and the land desolation . nephi and there be a great many thousand people who be call nephites who do gather themselves together in this land . now lachoneus do cause that they should gather themselves together in the land southward because of the great curse which be upon the land northward . nephi and they do fortify themselves against their enemy and they do dwell in one land and in one body and they do fear the word which have be speak by lachoneus insomuch that they do repent of all their sin and they do put up their prayer unto the lord their god that he would deliver them in the time that their enemy should come down against them to battle . nephi and they be exceedingly sorrowful because of their enemy . and gidgiddoni do cause that they should make weapon of war of every kind and they should be strong with armor and with shield and with buckler after the manner of his instruction . nephi chapter nephi and it come to pass that in the latter end of the eighteenth year those army of robber have prepare for battle and begin to come down and to sally forth from the hill and out of the mountain and the wilderness and their stronghold and their secret place and begin to take possession of the land both which be in the land south and which be in the land north and begin to take possession of all the land which have be desert by the nephites and the city which have be leave desolate . nephi but behold there be no wild beast nor game in those land which have be desert by the nephites and there be no game for the robber save it be in the wilderness . nephi and the robber could not exist save it be in the wilderness for the want of food for the nephites have leave their land desolate and have gather their flock and their herd and all their substance and they be in one body . nephi therefore there be no chance for the robber to plunder and to obtain food save it be to come up in open battle against the nephites and the nephites be in one body and have so great a number and have reserve for themselves provision and horse and cattle and flock of every kind that they might subsist for the space of seven year in the which time they do hope to destroy the robber from off the face of the land and thus the eighteenth year do pass away . nephi and it come to pass that in the nineteenth year giddianhi find that it be expedient that he should go up to battle against the nephites for there be no way that they could subsist save it be to plunder and rob and murder . nephi and they durst not spread themselves upon the face of the land insomuch that they could raise grain lest the nephites should come upon them and slay them therefore giddianhi give commandment unto his army that in this year they should go up to battle against the nephites . nephi and it come to pass that they do come up to battle and it be in the sixth month and behold great and terrible be the day that they do come up to battle and they be gird about after the manner of robber and they have a lamb skin about their loin and they be dye in blood and their head be shorn and they have head plate upon them and great and terrible be the appearance of the army of giddianhi because of their armor and because of their be dye in blood . nephi and it come to pass that the army of the nephites when they saw the appearance of the army of giddianhi have all fall to the earth and do lift their cry to the lord their god that he would spare them and deliver them out of the hand of their enemy . nephi and it come to pass that when the army of giddianhi saw this they begin to shout with a loud voice because of their joy for they have suppose that the nephites have fall with fear because of the terror of their army . nephi but in this thing they be disappoint for the nephites do not fear them but they do fear their god and do supplicate him for protection therefore when the army of giddianhi do rush upon them they be prepare to meet them yea in the strength of the lord they do receive them . nephi and the battle commence in this the sixth month and great and terrible be the battle thereof yea great and terrible be the slaughter thereof insomuch that there never be know so great a slaughter among all the people of lehi since he leave jerusalem . nephi and notwithstanding the threatenings and the oath which giddianhi have make behold the nephites do beat them insomuch that they do fall back from before them . nephi and it come to pass that gidgiddoni command that his army should pursue them as far a the border of the wilderness and that they should not spare any that should fall into their hand by the way and thus they do pursue them and do slay them to the border of the wilderness even until they have fulfil the commandment of gidgiddoni . nephi and it come to pass that giddianhi who have stand and fight with boldness be pursue a he flee and be weary because of his much fighting he be overtake and slay . and thus be the end of giddianhi the robber . nephi and it come to pass that the army of the nephites do return again to their place of security . and it come to pass that this nineteenth year do pass away and the robber do not come again to battle neither do they come again in the twentieth year . nephi and in the twenty and first year they do not come up to battle but they come up on all side to lay siege round about the people of nephi for they do suppose that if they should cut off the people of nephi from their land and should hem them in on every side and if they should cut them off from all their outward privilege that they could cause them to yield themselves up accord to their wish . nephi now they have appoint unto themselves another leader whose name be zemnarihah therefore it be zemnarihah that do cause that this siege should take place . nephi but behold this be an advantage to the nephites for it be impossible for the robber to lay siege sufficiently long to have any effect upon the nephites because of their much provision which they have lay up in store nephi and because of the scantiness of provision among the robber for behold they have nothing save it be meat for their subsistence which meat they do obtain in the wilderness nephi and it come to pass that the wild game become scarce in the wilderness insomuch that the robber be about to perish with hunger . nephi and the nephites be continually march out by day and by night and fall upon their army and cut them off by thousand and by ten of thousand . nephi and thus it become the desire of the people of zemnarihah to withdraw from their design because of the great destruction which come upon them by night and by day . nephi and it come to pass that zemnarihah do give command unto his people that they should withdraw themselves from the siege and march into the furthermost part of the land northward . nephi and now gidgiddoni be aware of their design and knowing of their weakness because of the want of food and the great slaughter which have be make among them therefore he do send out his army in the night time and do cut off the way of their retreat and do place his army in the way of their retreat . nephi and this do they do in the night time and get on their march beyond the robber so that on the morrow when the robber begin their march they be meet by the army of the nephites both in their front and in their rear . nephi and the robber who be on the south be also cut off in their place of retreat . and all these thing be do by command of gidgiddoni . nephi and there be many thousand who do yield themselves up prisoner unto the nephites and the remainder of them be slay . nephi and their leader zemnarihah be take and hang upon a tree yea even upon the top thereof until he be dead . and when they have hang him until he be dead they do fell the tree to the earth and do cry with a loud voice say nephi may the lord preserve his people in righteousness and in holiness of heart that they may cause to be fell to the earth all who shall seek to slay them because of power and secret combination even a this man hath be fell to the earth . nephi and they do rejoice and cry again with one voice say may the god of abraham and the god of isaac and the god of jacob protect this people in righteousness so long a they shall call on the name of their god for protection . nephi and it come to pass that they do break forth all a one in singing and praise their god for the great thing which he have do for them in preserve them from fall into the hand of their enemy . nephi yea they do cry hosanna to the most high god . and they do cry bless be the name of the lord god almighty the most high god . nephi and their heart be swell with joy unto the gush out of many tear because of the great goodness of god in deliver them out of the hand of their enemy and they know it be because of their repentance and their humility that they have be deliver from an everlasting destruction . nephi chapter nephi and now behold there be not a living soul among all the people of the nephites who do doubt in the least the word of all the holy prophet who have speak for they know that it must needs be that they must be fulfil . nephi and they know that it must be expedient that christ have come because of the many sign which have be give accord to the word of the prophet and because of the thing which have come to pass already they know that it must needs be that all thing should come to pass accord to that which have be speak . nephi therefore they do forsake all their sin and their abomination and their whoredom and do serve god with all diligence day and night . nephi and now it come to pass that when they have take all the robber prisoner insomuch that none do escape who be not slay they do cast their prisoner into prison and do cause the word of god to be preach unto them and as many a would repent of their sin and enter into a covenant that they would murder no more be set at liberty . nephi but as many a there be who do not enter into a covenant and who do still continue to have those secret murder in their heart yea as many a be find breathe out threatenings against their brother be condemn and punish accord to the law . nephi and thus they do put an end to all those wicked and secret and abominable combination in the which there be so much wickedness and so many murder commit . nephi and thus have the twenty and second year pass away and the twenty and third year also and the twenty and fourth and the twenty and fifth and thus have twenty and five year pass away . nephi and there have many thing transpire which in the eye of some would be great and marvelous nevertheless they can not all be write in this book yea this book can not contain even a hundredth part of what be do among so many people in the space of twenty and five year nephi but behold there be record which do contain all the proceeding of this people and a short but true account be give by nephi . nephi therefore i have make my record of these thing accord to the record of nephi which be engraven on the plate which be call the plate of nephi . nephi and behold i do make the record on plate which i have make with mine own hand . nephi and behold i be call mormon be call after the land of mormon the land in which alma do establish the church among the people yea the first church which be establish among them after their transgression . nephi behold i be a disciple of jesus christ the son of god . i have be call of him to declare his word among his people that they might have everlasting life . nephi and it hath become expedient that i accord to the will of god that the prayer of those who have go hence who be the holy one should be fulfil accord to their faith should make a record of these thing which have be do nephi yea a small record of that which hath take place from the time that lehi leave jerusalem even down until the present time . nephi therefore i do make my record from the account which have be give by those who be before me until the commencement of my day nephi and then i do make a record of the thing which i have see with mine own eye . nephi and i know the record which i make to be a just and a true record nevertheless there be many thing which accord to our language we be not able to write . nephi and now i make an end of my say which be of myself and proceed to give my account of the thing which have be before me . nephi i be mormon and a pure descendant of lehi . i have reason to bless my god and my savior jesus christ that he bring our father out of the land of jerusalem and no one know it save it be himself and those whom he bring out of that land and that he hath give me and my people so much knowledge unto the salvation of our soul . nephi surely he hath bless the house of jacob and hath be merciful unto the seed of joseph . nephi and insomuch a the child of lehi have keep his commandment he hath bless them and prosper them accord to his word . nephi yea and surely shall he again bring a remnant of the seed of joseph to the knowledge of the lord their god . nephi and as surely a the lord liveth will he gather in from the four quarter of the earth all the remnant of the seed of jacob who be scatter abroad upon all the face of the earth . nephi and a he hath covenant with all the house of jacob even so shall the covenant wherewith he hath covenant with the house of jacob be fulfil in his own due time unto the restore all the house of jacob unto the knowledge of the covenant that he hath covenant with them . nephi and then shall they know their redeemer who be jesus christ the son of god and then shall they be gather in from the four quarter of the earth unto their own land from whence they have be disperse yea a the lord liveth so shall it be . amen . nephi chapter nephi and now it come to pass that the people of the nephites do all return to their own land in the twenty and sixth year every man with his family his flock and his herd his horse and his cattle and all thing whatsoever do belong unto them . nephi and it come to pass that they have not eat up all their provision therefore they do take with them all that they have not devour of all their grain of every kind and their gold and their silver and all their precious thing and they do return to their own land and their possession both on the north and on the south both on the land northward and on the land southward . nephi and they grant unto those robber who have enter into a covenant to keep the peace of the land who be desirous to remain lamanites land accord to their number that they might have with their labor wherewith to subsist upon and thus they do establish peace in all the land . nephi and they begin again to prosper and to wax great and the twenty and sixth and seventh year pass away and there be great order in the land and they have form their law accord to equity and justice . nephi and now there be nothing in all the land to hinder the people from prosper continually except they should fall into transgression . nephi and now it be gidgiddoni and the judge lachoneus and those who have be appoint leader who have establish this great peace in the land . nephi and it come to pass that there be many city build anew and there be many old city repair . nephi and there be many highway cast up and many road make which lead from city to city and from land to land and from place to place . nephi and thus pass away the twenty and eighth year and the people have continual peace . nephi but it come to pass in the twenty and ninth year there begin to be some disputings among the people and some be lift up unto pride and boasting because of their exceedingly great rich yea even unto great persecution nephi for there be many merchant in the land and also many lawyer and many officer . nephi and the people begin to be distinguish by rank accord to their rich and their chance for learn yea some be ignorant because of their poverty and others do receive great learning because of their rich . nephi some be lift up in pride and others be exceedingly humble some do return rail for rail while others would receive railing and persecution and all manner of affliction and would not turn and revile again but be humble and penitent before god . nephi and thus there become a great inequality in all the land insomuch that the church begin to be break up yea insomuch that in the thirtieth year the church be break up in all the land save it be among a few of the lamanites who be convert unto the true faith and they would not depart from it for they be firm and steadfast and immovable willing with all diligence to keep the commandment of the lord . nephi now the cause of this iniquity of the people be this satan have great power unto the stir up of the people to do all manner of iniquity and to the puff them up with pride tempt them to seek for power and authority and rich and the vain thing of the world . nephi and thus satan do lead away the heart of the people to do all manner of iniquity therefore they have enjoy peace but a few year . nephi and thus in the commencement of the thirtieth year the people have be deliver up for the space of a long time to be carry about by the temptation of the devil whithersoever he desire to carry them and to do whatsoever iniquity he desire they should and thus in the commencement of this the thirtieth year they be in a state of awful wickedness . nephi now they do not sin ignorantly for they know the will of god concern them for it have be teach unto them therefore they do wilfully rebel against god . nephi and now it be in the day of lachoneus the son of lachoneus for lachoneus do fill the seat of his father and do govern the people that year . nephi and there begin to be men inspire from heaven and send forth standing among the people in all the land preaching and testify boldly of the sin and iniquity of the people and testify unto them concern the redemption which the lord would make for his people or in other word the resurrection of christ and they do testify boldly of his death and suffering . nephi now there be many of the people who be exceedingly angry because of those who testify of these thing and those who be angry be chiefly the chief judge and they who have be high priest and lawyer yea all those who be lawyer be angry with those who testify of these thing . nephi now there be no lawyer nor judge nor high priest that could have power to condemn any one to death save their condemnation be sign by the governor of the land . nephi now there be many of those who testify of the thing pertain to christ who testify boldly who be take and put to death secretly by the judge that the knowledge of their death come not unto the governor of the land until after their death . nephi now behold this be contrary to the law of the land that any man should be put to death except they have power from the governor of the land nephi therefore a complaint come up unto the land of zarahemla to the governor of the land against these judge who have condemn the prophet of the lord unto death not accord to the law . nephi now it come to pass that they be take and bring up before the judge to be judge of the crime which they have do accord to the law which have be give by the people . nephi now it come to pass that those judge have many friend and kindred and the remainder yea even almost all the lawyer and the high priest do gather themselves together and unite with the kindred of those judge who be to be try accord to the law . nephi and they do enter into a covenant one with another yea even into that covenant which be give by them of old which covenant be give and administer by the devil to combine against all righteousness . nephi therefore they do combine against the people of the lord and enter into a covenant to destroy them and to deliver those who be guilty of murder from the grasp of justice which be about to be administer accord to the law . nephi and they do set at defiance the law and the right of their country and they do covenant one with another to destroy the governor and to establish a king over the land that the land should no more be at liberty but should be subject unto king . nephi chapter nephi now behold i will show unto you that they do not establish a king over the land but in this same year yea the thirtieth year they do destroy upon the judgment seat yea do murder the chief judge of the land . nephi and the people be divide one against another and they do separate one from another into tribes every man accord to his family and his kindred and friend and thus they do destroy the government of the land . nephi and every tribe do appoint a chief or a leader over them and thus they become tribe and leader of tribe . nephi now behold there be no man among them save he have much family and many kindred and friend therefore their tribe become exceedingly great . nephi now all this be do and there be no war a yet among them and all this iniquity have come upon the people because they do yield themselves unto the power of satan . nephi and the regulation of the government be destroy because of the secret combination of the friend and kindred of those who murder the prophet . nephi and they do cause a great contention in the land insomuch that the more righteous part of the people have nearly all become wicked yea there be but few righteous men among them . nephi and thus six year have not pass away since the more part of the people have turn from their righteousness like the dog to his vomit or like the sow to her wallowing in the mire . nephi now this secret combination which have bring so great iniquity upon the people do gather themselves together and do place at their head a man whom they do call jacob nephi and they do call him their king therefore he become a king over this wicked band and he be one of the chiefest who have give his voice against the prophet who testify of jesus . nephi and it come to pass that they be not so strong in number a the tribe of the people who be unite together save it be their leader do establish their law every one accord to his tribe nevertheless they be enemy notwithstanding they be not a righteous people yet they be unite in the hatred of those who have enter into a covenant to destroy the government . nephi therefore jacob see that their enemy be more numerous than they he be the king of the band therefore he command his people that they should take their flight into the northernmost part of the land and there build up unto themselves a kingdom until they be join by dissenter for he flatter them that there would be many dissenter and they become sufficiently strong to contend with the tribe of the people and they do so . nephi and so speedy be their march that it could not be impede until they have go forth out of the reach of the people . and thus end the thirtieth year and thus be the affair of the people of nephi . nephi and it come to pass in the thirty and first year that they be divide into tribes every man accord to his family kindred and friend nevertheless they have come to an agreement that they would not go to war one with another but they be not unite a to their law and their manner of government for they be establish accord to the mind of those who be their chief and their leader . but they do establish very strict law that one tribe should not trespass against another insomuch that in some degree they have peace in the land nevertheless their heart be turn from the lord their god and they do stone the prophet and do cast them out from among them . nephi and it come to pass that nephi have be visit by angel and also the voice of the lord therefore have see angel and be eye witness and have have power give unto him that he might know concern the ministry of christ and also be eye witness to their quick return from righteousness unto their wickedness and abomination nephi therefore be grieve for the hardness of their heart and the blindness of their mind go forth among them in that same year and begin to testify boldly repentance and remission of sin through faith on the lord jesus christ . nephi and he do minister many thing unto them and all of them can not be write and a part of them would not suffice therefore they be not write in this book . and nephi do minister with power and with great authority . nephi and it come to pass that they be angry with him even because he have great power than they for it be not possible that they could disbelieve his word for so great be his faith on the lord jesus christ that angel do minister unto him daily . nephi and in the name of jesus do he cast out devil and unclean spirit and even his brother do he raise from the dead after he have be stone and suffer death by the people . nephi and the people saw it and do witness of it and be angry with him because of his power and he do also do many more miracle in the sight of the people in the name of jesus . nephi and it come to pass that the thirty and first year do pass away and there be but few who be convert unto the lord but as many a be convert do truly signify unto the people that they have be visit by the power and spirit of god which be in jesus christ in whom they believe . nephi and as many a have devil cast out from them and be heal of their sickness and their infirmity do truly manifest unto the people that they have be work upon by the spirit of god and have be heal and they do show forth sign also and do do some miracle among the people . nephi thus pass away the thirty and second year also . and nephi do cry unto the people in the commencement of the thirty and third year and he do preach unto them repentance and remission of sin . nephi now i would have you to remember also that there be none who be bring unto repentance who be not baptize with water . nephi therefore there be ordain of nephi men unto this ministry that all such a should come unto them should be baptize with water and this a a witness and a testimony before god and unto the people that they have repent and receive a remission of their sin . nephi and there be many in the commencement of this year that be baptize unto repentance and thus the more part of the year do pass away . nephi chapter nephi and now it come to pass that accord to our record and we know our record to be true for behold it be a just man who do keep the record for he truly do many miracle in the name of jesus and there be not any man who could do a miracle in the name of jesus save he be cleanse every whit from his iniquity nephi and now it come to pass if there be no mistake make by this man in the reckoning of our time the thirty and third year have pass away nephi and the people begin to look with great earnestness for the sign which have be give by the prophet samuel the lamanite yea for the time that there should be darkness for the space of three day over the face of the land . nephi and there begin to be great doubtings and disputation among the people notwithstanding so many sign have be give . nephi and it come to pass in the thirty and fourth year in the first month on the fourth day of the month there arise a great storm such an one a never have be know in all the land . nephi and there be also a great and terrible tempest and there be terrible thunder insomuch that it do shake the whole earth a if it be about to divide asunder . nephi and there be exceedingly sharp lightning such a never have be know in all the land . nephi and the city of zarahemla do take fire . nephi and the city of moroni do sink into the depth of the sea and the inhabitant thereof be drown . nephi and the earth be carry up upon the city of moronihah that in the place of the city there become a great mountain . nephi and there be a great and terrible destruction in the land southward . nephi but behold there be a more great and terrible destruction in the land northward for behold the whole face of the land be change because of the tempest and the whirlwind and the thunderings and the lightning and the exceedingly great quaking of the whole earth nephi and the highway be break up and the level road be spoil and many smooth place become rough . nephi and many great and notable city be sunk and many be burn and many be shake till the building thereof have fall to the earth and the inhabitant thereof be slay and the place be leave desolate . nephi and there be some city which remain but the damage thereof be exceedingly great and there be many of them who be slain . nephi and there be some who be carry away in the whirlwind and whither they go no man knoweth save they know that they be carry away . nephi and thus the face of the whole earth become deformed because of the tempest and the thunderings and the lightning and the quaking of the earth . nephi and behold the rock be rent in twain they be break up upon the face of the whole earth insomuch that they be find in broken fragment and in seam and in crack upon all the face of the land . nephi and it come to pass that when the thunderings and the lightning and the storm and the tempest and the quakings of the earth do cease for behold they do last for about the space of three hour and it be say by some that the time be great nevertheless all these great and terrible thing be do in about the space of three hour and then behold there be darkness upon the face of the land . nephi and it come to pass that there be thick darkness upon all the face of the land insomuch that the inhabitant thereof who have not fall could feel the vapor of darkness nephi and there could be no light because of the darkness neither candle neither torch neither could there be fire kindle with their fine and exceedingly dry wood so that there could not be any light at all nephi and there be not any light see neither fire nor glimmer neither the sun nor the moon nor the star for so great be the mist of darkness which be upon the face of the land . nephi and it come to pass that it do last for the space of three day that there be no light see and there be great mourning and howling and weeping among all the people continually yea great be the groanings of the people because of the darkness and the great destruction which have come upon them . nephi and in one place they be hear to cry say o that we have repent before this great and terrible day and then would our brother have be spar and they would not have be burn in that great city zarahemla . nephi and in another place they be hear to cry and mourn say o that we have repent before this great and terrible day and have not kill and stone the prophet and cast them out then would our mother and our fair daughter and our child have be spar and not have be bury up in that great city moronihah . and thus be the howling of the people great and terrible . nephi chapter nephi and it come to pass that there be a voice heard among all the inhabitant of the earth upon all the face of this land cry nephi wo wo wo unto this people wo unto the inhabitant of the whole earth except they shall repent for the devil laugheth and his angel rejoice because of the slain of the fair son and daughter of my people and it be because of their iniquity and abomination that they be fall ! nephi behold that great city zarahemla have i burn with fire and the inhabitant thereof . nephi and behold that great city moroni have i cause to be sink in the depth of the sea and the inhabitant thereof to be drown . nephi and behold that great city moronihah have i cover with earth and the inhabitant thereof to hide their iniquity and their abomination from before my face that the blood of the prophet and the saint shall not come any more unto me against them . nephi and behold the city of gilgal have i cause to be sink and the inhabitant thereof to be bury up in the depth of the earth nephi yea and the city of onihah and the inhabitant thereof and the city of mocum and the inhabitant thereof and the city of jerusalem and the inhabitant thereof and water have i cause to come up in the stead thereof to hide their wickedness and abomination from before my face that the blood of the prophet and the saint shall not come up any more unto me against them . nephi and behold the city of gadiandi and the city of gadiomnah and the city of jacob and the city of gimgimno all these have i cause to be sink and make hill and valley in the place thereof and the inhabitant thereof have i bury up in the depth of the earth to hide their wickedness and abomination from before my face that the blood of the prophet and the saint should not come up any more unto me against them . nephi and behold that great city jacobugath which be inhabit by the people of king jacob have i cause to be burn with fire because of their sin and their wickedness which be above all the wickedness of the whole earth because of their secret murder and combination for it be they that do destroy the peace of my people and the government of the land therefore i do cause them to be burn to destroy them from before my face that the blood of the prophet and the saint should not come up unto me any more against them . nephi and behold the city of laman and the city of josh and the city of gad and the city of kishkumen have i cause to be burn with fire and the inhabitant thereof because of their wickedness in cast out the prophet and stone those whom i do send to declare unto them concern their wickedness and their abomination . nephi and because they do cast them all out that there be none righteous among them i do send down fire and destroy them that their wickedness and abomination might be hide from before my face that the blood of the prophet and the saint whom i send among them might not cry unto me from the ground against them . nephi and many great destruction have i cause to come upon this land and upon this people because of their wickedness and their abomination . nephi o all ye that be spar because ye be more righteous than they will ye not now return unto me and repent of your sin and be convert that i may heal you ? nephi yea verily i say unto you if ye will come unto me ye shall have eternal life . behold mine arm of mercy be extend towards you and whosoever will come him will i receive and bless be those who come unto me . nephi behold i be jesus christ the son of god . i create the heaven and the earth and all thing that in them be . i be with the father from the beginning . i be in the father and the father in me and in me hath the father glorify his name . nephi i come unto my own and my own receive me not . and the scripture concern my come be fulfil . nephi and as many a have receive me to them have i give to become the son of god and even so will i to as many a shall believe on my name for behold by me redemption cometh and in me be the law of moses fulfil . nephi i be the light and the life of the world . i be alpha and omega the beginning and the end . nephi and ye shall offer up unto me no more the shedding of blood yea your sacrifice and your burnt offering shall be do away for i will accept none of your sacrifice and your burnt offering . nephi and ye shall offer for a sacrifice unto me a broken heart and a contrite spirit . and whoso cometh unto me with a broken heart and a contrite spirit him will i baptize with fire and with the holy ghost even a the lamanites because of their faith in me at the time of their conversion be baptize with fire and with the holy ghost and they know it not . nephi behold i have come unto the world to bring redemption unto the world to save the world from sin . nephi therefore whoso repenteth and cometh unto me a a little child him will i receive for of such be the kingdom of god . behold for such i have lay down my life and have take it up again therefore repent and come unto me ye end of the earth and be save . nephi chapter nephi and now behold it come to pass that all the people of the land do hear these saying and do witness of it . and after these saying there be silence in the land for the space of many hour nephi for so great be the astonishment of the people that they do cease lamenting and howling for the loss of their kindred which have be slay therefore there be silence in all the land for the space of many hour . nephi and it come to pass that there come a voice again unto the people and all the people do hear and do witness of it say nephi o ye people of these great city which have fall who be descendant of jacob yea who be of the house of israel how oft have i gather you a a hen gathereth her chicken under her wing and have nourish you . nephi and again how oft would i have gather you a a hen gathereth her chicken under her wing yea o ye people of the house of israel who have fall yea o ye people of the house of israel ye that dwell at jerusalem a ye that have fall yea how oft would i have gather you a a hen gathereth her chicken and ye would not . nephi o ye house of israel whom i have spar how oft will i gather you a a hen gathereth her chicken under her wing if ye will repent and return unto me with full purpose of heart . nephi but if not o house of israel the place of your dwelling shall become desolate until the time of the fulfilling of the covenant to your father . nephi and now it come to pass that after the people have hear these word behold they begin to weep and howl again because of the loss of their kindred and friend . nephi and it come to pass that thus do the three day pass away . and it be in the morning and the darkness disperse from off the face of the land and the earth do cease to tremble and the rock do cease to rend and the dreadful groanings do cease and all the tumultuous noise do pass away . nephi and the earth do cleave together again that it stand and the mourning and the weeping and the wailing of the people who be spar alive do cease and their mourning be turn into joy and their lamentation into the praise and thanksgiving unto the lord jesus christ their redeemer . nephi and thus far be the scripture fulfil which have be speak by the prophet . nephi and it be the more righteous part of the people who be save and it be they who receive the prophet and stone them not and it be they who have not shed the blood of the saint who be spar nephi and they be spar and be not sunk and bury up in the earth and they be not drown in the depth of the sea and they be not burn by fire neither be they fall upon and crush to death and they be not carry away in the whirlwind neither be they overpower by the vapor of smoke and of darkness . nephi and now whoso readeth let him understand he that hath the scripture let him search them and see and behold if all these death and destruction by fire and by smoke and by tempest and by whirlwind and by the opening of the earth to receive them and all these thing be not unto the fulfilling of the prophecy of many of the holy prophet . nephi behold i say unto you yea many have testify of these thing at the come of christ and be slay because they testify of these thing . nephi yea the prophet zeno do testify of these thing and also zenock spake concern these thing because they testify particularly concern u who be the remnant of their seed . nephi behold our father jacob also testify concern a remnant of the seed of joseph . and behold be not we a remnant of the seed of joseph ? and these thing which testify of u be they not write upon the plate of brass which our father lehi bring out of jerusalem ? nephi and it come to pass that in the end of the thirty and fourth year behold i will show unto you that the people of nephi who be spar and also those who have be call lamanites who have be spar do have great favor show unto them and great blessing pour out upon their head insomuch that soon after the ascension of christ into heaven he do truly manifest himself unto them nephi show his body unto them and minister unto them and an account of his ministry shall be give hereafter . therefore for this time i make an end of my saying . nephi chapter nephi and now it come to pass that there be a great multitude gather together of the people of nephi round about the temple which be in the land bountiful and they be marvel and wonder one with another and be show one to another the great and marvelous change which have take place . nephi and they be also converse about this jesus christ of whom the sign have be give concern his death . nephi and it come to pass that while they be thus converse one with another they hear a voice a if it come out of heaven and they cast their eye round about for they understand not the voice which they hear and it be not a harsh voice neither be it a loud voice nevertheless and notwithstanding it be a small voice it do pierce them that do hear to the center insomuch that there be no part of their frame that it do not cause to quake yea it do pierce them to the very soul and do cause their heart to burn . nephi and it come to pass that again they hear the voice and they understand it not . nephi and again the third time they do hear the voice and do open their ear to hear it and their eye be towards the sound thereof and they do look steadfastly towards heaven from whence the sound come . nephi and behold the third time they do understand the voice which they hear and it say unto them nephi behold my beloved son in whom i be well pleased in whom i have glorify my name hear ye him . nephi and it come to pass a they understand they cast their eye up again towards heaven and behold they saw a man descend out of heaven and he be clothe in a white robe and he come down and stand in the midst of them and the eye of the whole multitude be turn upon him and they durst not open their mouth even one to another and wist not what it mean for they think it be an angel that have appear unto them . nephi and it come to pass that he stretch forth his hand and spake unto the people say nephi behold i be jesus christ whom the prophet testify shall come into the world . nephi and behold i be the light and the life of the world and i have drink out of that bitter cup which the father hath give me and have glorify the father in take upon me the sin of the world in the which i have suffer the will of the father in all thing from the beginning . nephi and it come to pass that when jesus have speak these word the whole multitude fell to the earth for they remember that it have be prophesy among them that christ should show himself unto them after his ascension into heaven . nephi and it come to pass that the lord spake unto them say nephi arise and come forth unto me that ye may thrust your hand into my side and also that ye may feel the print of the nail in my hand and in my foot that ye may know that i be the god of israel and the god of the whole earth and have be slay for the sin of the world . nephi and it come to pass that the multitude go forth and thrust their hand into his side and do feel the print of the nail in his hand and in his foot and this they do do go forth one by one until they have all go forth and do see with their eye and do feel with their hand and do know of a surety and do bear record that it be he of whom it be write by the prophet that should come . nephi and when they have all go forth and have witness for themselves they do cry out with one accord say nephi hosanna ! bless be the name of the most high god ! and they do fall down at the foot of jesus and do worship him . nephi and it come to pass that he spake unto nephi for nephi be among the multitude and he command him that he should come forth . nephi and nephi arose and go forth and bow himself before the lord and do kiss his foot . nephi and the lord command him that he should arise . and he arise and stand before him . nephi and the lord say unto him i give unto you power that ye shall baptize this people when i be again ascend into heaven . nephi and again the lord call others and say unto them likewise and he give unto them power to baptize . and he say unto them on this wise shall ye baptize and there shall be no disputation among you . nephi verily i say unto you that whoso repenteth of his sin through your word and desireth to be baptize in my name on this wise shall ye baptize them behold ye shall go down and stand in the water and in my name shall ye baptize them . nephi and now behold these be the word which ye shall say call them by name say nephi have authority give me of jesus christ i baptize you in the name of the father and of the son and of the holy ghost . amen . nephi and then shall ye immerse them in the water and come forth again out of the water . nephi and after this manner shall ye baptize in my name for behold verily i say unto you that the father and the son and the holy ghost be one and i be in the father and the father in me and the father and i be one . nephi and accord a i have command you thus shall ye baptize . and there shall be no disputation among you a there have hitherto be neither shall there be disputation among you concern the point of my doctrine a there have hitherto be . nephi for verily verily i say unto you he that hath the spirit of contention be not of me but be of the devil who be the father of contention and he stirreth up the heart of men to contend with anger one with another . nephi behold this be not my doctrine to stir up the heart of men with anger one against another but this be my doctrine that such thing should be do away . nephi behold verily verily i say unto you i will declare unto you my doctrine . nephi and this be my doctrine and it be the doctrine which the father hath give unto me and i bear record of the father and the father beareth record of me and the holy ghost beareth record of the father and me and i bear record that the father commandeth all men everywhere to repent and believe in me . nephi and whoso believeth in me and be baptize the same shall be save and they be they who shall inherit the kingdom of god . nephi and whoso believeth not in me and be not baptize shall be damn . nephi verily verily i say unto you that this be my doctrine and i bear record of it from the father and whoso believeth in me believeth in the father also and unto him will the father bear record of me for he will visit him with fire and with the holy ghost . nephi and thus will the father bear record of me and the holy ghost will bear record unto him of the father and me for the father and i and the holy ghost be one . nephi minister for ye know not but what they will return and repent and come unto me with full purpose of heart and i shall heal them and ye shall be the mean of bring salvation unto them . nephi therefore keep these saying which i have command you that ye come not under condemnation for wo unto him whom the father condemneth . nephi and i give you these commandment because of the disputation which have be among you . and bless be ye if ye have no disputation among you . nephi and now i go unto the father because it be expedient that i should go unto the father for your sake . nephi and it come to and the multitude heard not the word which he spake therefore they do not bear record but the disciple bare record that he give them power to give the holy ghost . and i will show unto you hereafter nephi and it come to pass that they do do all thing even a jesus have command them . nephi and they who be baptize in the name of jesus be call the church of christ . nephi chapter nephi and it come to pass that a the disciple of jesus be journey and be preach the thing which they have both heard and see and be baptize in the name of jesus it come to pass that the disciple be gather together and be unite in mighty prayer and fasting . nephi and jesus again show himself unto them for they be pray unto the father in his name and jesus come and stand in the midst of them and say unto them what will ye that i shall give unto you ? nephi and they say unto him lord we will that thou wouldst tell u the name whereby we shall call this church for there be disputation among the people concern this matter . nephi and the lord say unto them verily verily i say unto you why be it that the people should murmur and dispute because of this thing ? nephi have they not read the scripture which say ye must take upon you the name of christ which be my name ? for by this name shall ye be call at the last day nephi and whoso taketh upon him my name and endureth to the end the same shall be save at the last day . nephi therefore whatsoever ye shall do ye shall do it in my name therefore ye shall call the church in my name and ye shall call upon the father in my name that he will bless the church for my sake . nephi and how be it my church save it be call in my name ? for if a church be call in moses ' name then it be moses ' church or if it be call in the name of a man then it be the church of a man but if it be call in my name then it be my church if it so be that they be build upon my gospel . nephi verily i say unto you that ye be build upon my gospel therefore ye shall call whatsoever thing ye do call in my name therefore if ye call upon the father for the church if it be in my name the father will hear you nephi and if it so be that the church be build upon my gospel then will the father show forth his own work in it . nephi but if it be not build upon my gospel and be build upon the work of men or upon the work of the devil verily i say unto you they have joy in their work for a season and by and by the end cometh and they be hew down and cast into the fire from whence there be no return . nephi for their work do follow them for it be because of their work that they be hew down therefore remember the thing that i have tell you . nephi behold i have give unto you my gospel and this be the gospel which i have give unto you that i come into the world to do the will of my father because my father send me . nephi and my father send me that i might be lift up upon the cross and after that i have be lift up upon the cross that i might draw all men unto me that a i have be lift up by men even so should men be lift up by the father to stand before me to be judge of their work whether they be good or whether they be evil nephi and for this cause have i be lift up therefore accord to the power of the father i will draw all men unto me that they may be judge accord to their work . nephi and it shall come to pass that whoso repenteth and be baptize in my name shall be fill and if he endureth to the end behold him will i hold guiltless before my father at that day when i shall stand to judge the world . nephi and he that endureth not unto the end the same be he that be also hewn down and cast into the fire from whence they can no more return because of the justice of the father . nephi and this be the word which he hath give unto the child of men . and for this cause he fulfilleth the word which he hath give and he lieth not but fulfilleth all his word . nephi and no unclean thing can enter into his kingdom therefore nothing entereth into his rest save it be those who have wash their garment in my blood because of their faith and the repentance of all their sin and their faithfulness unto the end . nephi now this be the commandment repent all ye end of the earth and come unto me and be baptize in my name that ye may be sanctify by the reception of the holy ghost that ye may stand spotless before me at the last day . nephi verily verily i nephi therefore if ye do these thing bless be ye for ye shall be lift up at the last day . nephi write the thing which ye have see and hear save it be those which be forbidden . nephi write the work of this people which shall be even a hath be write of that which hath be . nephi for behold out of the book which have be write and which shall be write shall this people be judge for by them shall their work be know unto men . nephi and behold all thing be write by the father therefore out of the book which shall be write shall the world be judge . nephi and know ye that ye shall be judge of this people accord to the judgment which i shall give unto you which shall be just . therefore what manner of men ought ye to be ? verily i say unto you even a i be . nephi and now i go unto the asketh receiveth and unto him that knocketh it shall be open . nephi and now behold my joy be great even unto fulness because of you and also this generation yea and even the father rejoiceth and also all the holy angel because of you and this generation for none of them be lose . nephi behold i would that ye should understand for i mean them who be now alive of this generation and none of them be lose and in them i have fulness of joy . nephi but behold it sorroweth me because of the fourth generation from this generation for they be lead away captive by him even a be the son of perdition for they will sell me for silver and for gold and for that which moth doth corrupt and which thief can break through and steal . and in that day will i visit them even in turn their work upon their own head . nephi and it come to pass that when jesus have end these saying he say unto his disciple enter ye in at the strait gate for strait be the gate and narrow be the way that lead to life and few there be that find it but wide be the gate and broad the way which lead to death and many there be that travel therein until the night cometh wherein no man can work . nephi chapter nephi and it come to pass when jesus have say these word he spake unto his disciple one by one say unto them what be it that ye desire of me after that i be go to the father ? nephi and they all spake save it be three say we desire that after we have live unto the age of man that our ministry wherein thou hast call u may have an end that we may speedily come unto thee in thy kingdom . nephi and he say unto them desire of me . nephi therefore more bless be ye for ye shall never taste of death but ye shall live to behold all the doings of the father unto the child of men even until all thing shall be fulfil accord to the will of the father when i shall come in my glory with the power of heaven . nephi and ye shall never endure the pain of death but when i shall come in my glory ye shall be change in the twinkling of an eye from mortality to immortality and then shall ye be bless in the kingdom of my father . nephi and again ye shall not have pain while ye shall dwell in the flesh neither sorrow save it be for the sin of the world and all this will i do because of the thing which ye have desire of me for ye have desire that ye might bring the soul of men unto me while the world shall stand . nephi and for this cause ye shall have fulness of joy and ye shall sit down in the kingdom of my father yea your joy shall be full even a the father hath give me fulness of joy and ye shall be even a i be state that they could behold the thing of god . nephi but it come to pass that they do again minister upon the face of the earth nevertheless they do not minister of the thing which they have hear and down into the earth but they do smite the earth with the word of god insomuch that by his power they be deliver out of the depth of the earth and therefore they could not dig pit sufficient to hold them . nephi and thrice they be cast into a furnace and receive no harm . nephi and twice be they cast into a den of wild beast and behold they do play with the beast a a child with a suckle lamb and that he could not tempt them and they be sanctify in the flesh that they be holy and that the power of the earth could not hold them . nephi and in this state they be to remain until the judgment day of christ and at that day they be to receive a great change and to be receive into the kingdom of the father to go no more out but to dwell eternally in the heaven . nephi chapter nephi and now behold
