pass away and the second generation have all pass away save it be a few . nephi and now i mormon would that ye should know that the people have multiply insomuch that they be spread upon all the face of the land and that they have become exceedingly rich because of their prosperity in christ . nephi and now in this two hundred and first year there begin to be among them those who be lift up in among them . nephi and they begin to be divide into class and they begin to build up church unto themselves to get gain and begin to deny the true church of christ . nephi and it come to pass that when two hundred and ten year have pass away there be many church in the land yea there be many church which profess to know the christ and yet they do deny the more part of his gospel insomuch that they do receive all manner of wickedness and do administer that which be sacred unto him to whom it have be forbidden because of unworthiness . nephi and this church do multiply exceedingly because of iniquity and because of the power of satan who do get hold upon their heart . nephi and again there be another church which deny the christ and they do persecute the true church of christ because of their humility and their belief in christ and they do despise them because of the many miracle which be work among them . nephi therefore they do exercise power and authority over the disciple of nevertheless and notwithstanding all these miracles the people do harden their heart and do seek to kill them even a the jew at jerusalem seek to kill jesus accord to his word . nephi and they do cast them into furnace of fire and they come forth receive no harm . nephi and they also cast them into den of wild beast and they do play with the wild beast even a a child with a lamb and they do come forth from among them receive no harm . nephi nevertheless the people do harden their heart for they be lead by many priest and false prophet to build up many church and to do all manner of iniquity . and they do smite upon the people of jesus but the people of jesus do not smite again . and thus they do dwindle in unbelief and wickedness from year to year even until two hundred and thirty year have pass away . nephi and now it come to pass in this year yea in the two hundred and thirty and first year there be a great division among the people . nephi and it come to pass that in this year there arise a people who be call the nephites and they be true believer in christ and among them there be those who be call by the lamanites jacobite and josephites and zoramites nephi therefore the true believer in christ and the true worshiper of christ among whom be the three disciple of jesus who should tarry be call nephites and jacobite and josephites and zoramites . nephi and it come to pass that they who reject the gospel be call lamanites and lemuelites and ishmaelites and they do not dwindle in unbelief but they do wilfully rebel against the gospel of christ and they do teach their child that they should not believe even a their father from the beginning do dwindle . nephi and it be because of the wickedness and abomination of their father even a it be in the beginning . and they be teach to hate the child of god even a the lamanites be teach to hate the child of nephi from the beginning . nephi and it come to pass that two hundred and forty and four year have pass away and thus be the affair of the people . and the more wicked part of the people do wax strong and become exceedingly more numerous than be the people of god . nephi and they do still continue to build up church unto themselves and adorn them with all manner of precious thing . and thus do two hundred and fifty year pass away and also two hundred and sixty year . nephi and it come to pass that nephi and it come to pass that after three hundred and five year have pass away and the people do still remain in wickedness amos die and his brother ammaron do keep the record in his stead . nephi and it come to pass that when three hundred and twenty year have pass away ammaron be constrain by the holy ghost do hide up the record which be sacred yea even all the sacred record which have be unto the remnant of the house of jacob accord to the prophecy and the promise of the lord . and thus be the end of the record of ammaron . the book of mormon mormon chapter mormon and now i mormon remember the thing which ammaron command me . mormon and it come to pass that i be eleven year old be carry by my father into the land southward even to the land of zarahemla . mormon the whole face of the land have become cover with building and the people be a numerous almost a it be the sand of the sea . mormon and it come to pass in this year there begin to be a war between the nephites who consist of the nephites and the jacobite and the josephites and the zoramites and this war be between the nephites and the lamanites and the lemuelites and the ishmaelites . mormon now the lamanites and the lemuelites and the ishmaelites be call lamanites and the two party be nephites and lamanites . mormon and it come to pass that the war begin to be among them in the border of zarahemla by the land and peace do remain for the space of about four year that there be no bloodshed . mormon but wickedness do prevail upon the face of the whole land insomuch that the lord do take away his beloved disciple and the work of miracle and of heal do cease because of the iniquity of the people . mormon and there be no gift from the lord and the holy ghost do not come upon any because of their wickedness and unbelief . mormon and i be fifteen year of age and be somewhat of a sober mind therefore i be visit of the lord and taste and knew of the goodness of jesus . mormon and i do endeavor to preach unto this people but my mouth be shut and i be forbidden that i should preach unto them for behold they have wilfully rebel against their god and the beloved disciple be take away out of the land because of their iniquity . mormon but i do remain among them but i be forbid to preach unto them because of the hardness of their heart and because of the hardness of their heart the land be curse for their sake . mormon and these gadianton robber who be among the lamanites do infest the land insomuch that the inhabitant thereof begin to hide up their treasure in the earth and they become slippery because the lord have curse the land that they could not hold them nor retain them again . mormon and it come to pass that there be sorcery and witchcraft and magic and the power of the evil one be work upon all the face of the land even unto the fulfilling of all the word of abinadi and also samuel the lamanite . mormon chapter mormon and it come to pass in that same year there begin to be a war again between the nephites and the lamanites . and notwithstanding i be young be large in stature therefore the people of nephi appoint me that i should be their leader or the leader of their army . mormon therefore it come to pass that in my sixteenth year i do go forth at the head of an army of the nephites against the lamanites therefore three hundred and twenty and six year have pass away . mormon and it come to pass that in the three hundred and twenty and seventh year the lamanites do come upon u with exceedingly great power insomuch that they do frighten my army therefore they would not fight and they begin to retreat towards the north country . mormon and it come to pass that we do come to the city of angola and we do take possession of the city and make preparation to defend ourselves against the lamanites . and it come to pass that we do fortify the city with our might but notwithstanding all our fortification the lamanites do come upon u and do drive u out of the city . mormon and they do also drive u forth out of the land of david . mormon and we march forth and come to the land of joshua which be in the border west by the seashore . mormon and it come to pass that we do gather in our people as fast a it be possible that we might get them together in one body . mormon but behold the land be fill with robber and with lamanites and notwithstanding the great destruction which hung over my people they do not repent of their evil doings therefore there be blood and carnage spread throughout all the face of the land both on the part of the nephites and also on the part of the lamanites and it be one complete revolution throughout all the face of the land . mormon and now the lamanites have a king and his name be aaron and he come against u with an army of forty and four thousand . and behold i withstand him with forty and two thousand . and it come to pass that i beat him with my army that he flee before me . and behold all this be do and three hundred and thirty year have pass away . mormon and it come to pass that the nephites begin to repent of their iniquity and begin to cry even a have be prophesy by samuel the prophet for behold no man could keep that which be his own for the thief and the robber and the murderer and the magic art and the witchcraft which be in the land . mormon thus there begin to be a mourning and a lamentation in all the land because of these thing and more especially among the people of nephi . mormon and it come to pass that when i mormon saw their lamentation and their mourning and their sorrow before the lord my heart do begin to rejoice within me know the mercy and the long suffering of the lord therefore suppose that he would be merciful unto them that they would again become a righteous people . mormon but behold this my joy be vain for their sorrowing be not unto repentance because of the goodness of god but it be rather the sorrowing of the damn because the lord would not always suffer them to take happiness in sin . mormon and they do not come unto jesus with broken heart and contrite spirit but they do curse god and wish to die . nevertheless they would struggle with the sword for their life . mormon and it come to pass that my sorrow do return unto me again and i saw that the day of grace be pass with them both temporally and spiritually for i saw thousand of them hew down in full account of their wickedness and abomination for behold a continual scene of wickedness and abomination have be before mine eye ever since i have be sufficient to behold the way of man . mormon and wo be me because of their wickedness for my heart have be fill with sorrow because of their wickedness all my day nevertheless i know that i shall be lift up at the last day . mormon and it come and fight for their wife and their child and their house and their home . mormon and my word do arouse them somewhat to vigor insomuch that they do not flee from before the lamanites but do stand with one have become polluted because of the pride of your heart . mormon for behold ye do love money and your substance and your fine apparel and the adorning of your church more than ye love the poor and the needy the sick and the afflict . mormon o ye pollution ye hypocrite ye teacher who sell yourselves for that which will canker why have ye pollute the holy church of god ? why be ye ashamed to take upon you the name of christ ? why do ye not think that great be the value of an endless happiness than that misery which never die because of the praise of the world ? mormon why do ye adorn yourselves with that which hath no life and yet suffer the hungry and the needy and the naked and the sick and the afflict to pass by you and notice them not ? mormon yea why do ye build up your secret abomination to get gain and cause that widow should mourn before the lord and also orphan to mourn before the lord and also the blood of their father and their husband to cry unto the lord from the ground for vengeance upon your head ? mormon behold the sword of vengeance hangeth over you and the time soon cometh that he avengeth the blood of the saint upon you for he will not suffer their cry any longer . mormon chapter mormon and now i speak also concern those who do not believe in christ . mormon behold will ye believe in the day of your visitation behold when the lord shall come yea even that great day when the earth shall be roll together a a scroll and the element shall melt with fervent heat yea in that great day when ye shall be bring to stand before the lamb of god then will ye say that there be no god ? mormon then will ye long deny the christ or can ye behold the lamb of god ? do ye suppose that ye shall dwell with him under a consciousness of your guilt ? do ye suppose that ye could be happy to dwell with that holy be when your soul be rack with a consciousness of guilt that ye have ever abuse his law ? mormon behold i say unto you that ye would be more miserable to dwell with a holy and just god under a consciousness of your filthiness before him than ye would to dwell with the damned soul in hell . mormon for behold when ye shall be bring to see your nakedness before god and also the glory of god and the holiness of jesus christ it will kindle a flame of unquenchable fire upon you . mormon o then ye unbelieving turn ye unto the lord cry mightily unto the father in the name of jesus that perhaps ye may be find spotless pure fair and white have be cleanse by the blood of the lamb at that great and last day . mormon and again i speak unto you who deny the revelation of god and say that they be do away that there be no revelation nor prophecy nor gift nor heal nor speak with tongue and the interpretation of tongue mormon behold i say unto you he that denieth these thing knoweth not the gospel of christ yea he have not read the scripture if so he do not understand them . mormon for do we not read that god be the same yesterday today and forever and in him there be no variableness neither shadow of change ? mormon and now if ye have imagine up unto yourselves a god who doth vary and in whom there be shadow of change then have ye imagine up unto yourselves a god who be not god of miracle . mormon but behold i will show unto you a god of miracle even the god of abraham and the god of isaac and the god of jacob and it be that same god who create the heaven and the earth and all thing that in them be . mormon behold he create adam and by adam come the fall of man . and because of the fall of man come jesus christ even the father and the son and because of jesus christ come the redemption of man . mormon and because of the redemption of man which come by jesus christ they be bring back into the presence of the lord yea this be wherein all men be redeem because the death of christ bringeth to pass the resurrection which bringeth to pass a redemption from an endless sleep from which sleep all men shall be awaken by the power of god when the trump shall sound and they shall come forth both small and great and all shall stand before his bar be redeem and loose from this eternal band of death which death be a temporal death . mormon and then cometh the judgment of the holy one upon them and then cometh the time that he that be filthy shall be filthy still and he that be righteous shall be righteous still he that be happy shall be happy still and he that be unhappy shall be unhappy still . mormon and now o all ye that have imagine up unto yourselves a god who can do no miracle i would ask of you have all these thing pass of which i have speak ? have the end come yet ? behold i say unto you nay and god have not cease to be a god of miracle . mormon behold be not the thing that god hath wrought marvelous in our eye ? yea and who can comprehend the marvelous work of god ? mormon who shall say that it be not a miracle that by his word the heaven and the earth should be and by the power of his word man be create of the dust of the earth and by the power of his word have miracle be work ? mormon and who shall say that jesus christ do not many mighty miracle ? and there be many mighty miracle work by the hand of the apostle . mormon and if there be miracle work then why have god cease to be a god of miracle and yet be an unchangeable be ? and behold i say unto you he changeth not if so he would cease to be god and he ceaseth not to be god and be a god of miracle . mormon and the reason why he ceaseth to do miracle among the child of men be because that they dwindle in unbelief and depart from the right way and know not the god in whom they should trust . mormon behold i say unto you that whoso believeth in christ doubt nothing whatsoever he shall ask the father in the name of christ it shall be grant him and this promise be unto all even unto the end of the earth . mormon for behold thus say jesus christ the son of god unto his disciple who should tarry yea and also to all his disciple in the hearing of the multitude go ye into all the world and preach the gospel to every creature mormon and he that believeth and be baptize shall be save but he that believeth not shall be damn mormon and these sign shall follow them that believe in my name shall they cast out devil they shall speak with new tongue they shall take up serpent and if they drink any deadly thing it shall not hurt them they shall lay hand on the sick and they shall recover mormon and whosoever shall believe in my name doubt nothing unto him will i confirm all my word even unto the end of the earth . mormon and now behold who can stand against the work of the lord ? who can deny his saying ? who will rise up against the almighty power of the lord ? who will despise the work of the lord ? who will despise the child of christ ? behold all ye who be despisers of the work of the lord for ye shall wonder and perish . mormon o then despise not and wonder not but hearken unto the word of the lord and ask the father in the name of jesus for what thing soever ye shall stand in need . doubt not but be believing and begin as in time of old and come unto the lord with all your heart and work out your own salvation with fear and tremble before him . mormon be wise in the day of your probation strip yourselves of all uncleanness ask not that ye may consume it on your lust but ask with a firmness unshaken that ye will yield to no temptation but that ye will serve the true and living god . mormon see that ye be not baptize unworthily see that ye partake not of the sacrament of christ unworthily but see that ye do all thing in worthiness and do it in the name of jesus christ the son of the living god and if ye do this and endure to the end ye will in nowise be cast out . mormon behold i speak unto you a though i spake from the dead for i know that ye shall have my word . mormon condemn me not because of mine imperfection neither my father because of his imperfection neither them who have write before him but rather give thanks unto god that he hath make manifest unto you our imperfection that ye may learn to be more wise than we have be . mormon and now behold we have write this record accord to our knowledge in the character which be call among u the reformed egyptian be hand down and alter by u accord to our manner of speech . mormon and if our plate have be sufficiently large we should have write in hebrew but the hebrew hath be alter by u also and if we could have write in hebrew behold ye would have have no imperfection in our record . mormon but the lord knoweth the thing which we have write and also that none other people knoweth our language and because that none other people knoweth our language therefore he hath prepared mean for the interpretation thereof . mormon and these thing be write that we may rid our garment of the blood of our brother who have dwindle in unbelief . mormon and behold these thing which we have desire concern our brother yea even their restoration to the knowledge of christ be accord to the prayer of all the saint who have dwell in the land . mormon and may the lord jesus christ grant that their prayer may be answer accord to their faith and may god the father remember the covenant which he hath make with the house of israel and may he bless them forever through faith on the name of jesus christ . amen . the book of ether the record of the jaredites take from the twenty four plate find by the people of limhi in the day of king mosiah . ether chapter ether and now i moroni proceed to give an account of those ancient inhabitant who be destroy by the hand of the lord upon the face of this north country . ether and i take mine account from the twenty and four plate which be find by the people of limhi which be call the book of ether . ether and a i suppose that the first part of this record which speak concern the creation of the world and also of adam and an account from that time even to the great tower and whatsoever thing transpire among the child of men until that time be have among the jew ether therefore i do not write those thing which transpire from the day of adam until that time but they be have upon the plate and whoso findeth them the same will have power that he may get the full account . ether but behold i give not the full account but a part of the account i give from the tower down until they be destroy . ether and on this wise do i give the account . he that write this record be ether and he be a descendant of coriantor . ether coriantor be the son of moron . ether and moron be the son of ethem . ether and ethem be the son of ahah . ether and ahah be the son of seth . ether and seth be the son of shiblon . ether and shiblon be the son of hearthom . ether and hearthom be the son of lib . ether and lib be the son of kish . ether and kish be the son of corom . ether and corom be the son of levi . ether and levi be the son of kim . ether and kim be the son of morianton . ether and morianton be a descendant of riplakish . ether and riplakish be the son of shez . ether and shez be the son of heth . ether and heth be the son of com . ether and com be the son of coriantum . ether and coriantum be the son of emer . ether and emer be the son of omer . ether and omer be the son of shule . ether and shule be the son of kib . ether and kib be the son of orihah who be the son of jared ether which jar come forth with his brother and their family with some others and their family from the great tower at the time the lord confound the language of the people and swore in his wrath that they should be scatter upon all the face of the earth and accord to the word of the lord the people be scatter . ether and the brother of jared be a large and mighty man and a man highly favor of the lord jar his brother say unto him cry unto the lord that he will not confound u that we may not understand our word . ether and it come to pass that the brother of jared do cry unto the lord and the lord have compassion upon jar therefore he do not confound the language of jared and jared and his brother be not confound . ether then jar say unto his brother cry again unto the lord and it may be that he will turn away his anger from them who be our friend that he confound not their language . ether and it come to pass that the brother of jared do cry unto the lord and the lord have compassion upon their friend and their family also that they be not confound . ether and it come to pass that jar spake again unto his brother say go and inquire of the lord whether he will drive u out of the land and if he will drive u out of the land cry unto him whither we shall go . and who knoweth but the lord will carry u forth into a land which be choice above all the earth ? and if it so be let u be faithful unto the lord that we may receive it for our inheritance . ether and it come to pass that the brother of jared do cry unto the lord accord to that which have be speak by the mouth of jared . ether and it come to pass that the lord do hear the brother of jared and have compassion upon him and say unto him ether go to and gather together thy flock both male and female of every kind and also of the seed of the earth of every kind and thy family and also jar thy brother and his family and also thy friend and their family and the friend of jared and their family . ether and when thou hast do this thou shalt go at the head of them down into the valley which be northward . and there will i meet thee and i will go before thee into a land which be choice above all the land of the earth . ether and there will i bless thee and thy seed and raise up unto me of thy seed and of the seed of thy brother and they who shall go with thee a great nation . and there shall be none great than the nation which i will raise up unto me of thy seed upon all the face of the earth . and thus i will do unto thee because this long time ye have cry unto me . ether chapter ether and it come to pass that jared and his brother and their family and also the friend of jared and his brother and their family go down into the valley which be northward and the name of the valley be nimrod be call after the mighty hunter with their flock which they have gather together male and female of every kind . ether and they do also lay snare and catch fowl of the air and they do also prepare a vessel in which they do carry with them the fish of the water . ether and they do also carry with them deseret which by interpretation be a honey bee and thus they do carry with them swarm of bee and all manner of that which be upon the face of the land seed of every kind . ether and it come to pass that when they have come down into the valley of nimrod the lord come down and talk with the brother of jared and he be in a cloud and the brother of jared saw him not . ether and it come to pass that the lord command them that they should go forth into the wilderness yea into that quarter where there never have man be . and it come to pass that the lord do go before them and do talk with them a he stand in a cloud and give direction whither they should travel . ether and it come to pass that they do travel in the wilderness and do build barge in which they do cross many water be direct continually by the hand of the lord . ether and the lord would not suffer that they should stop beyond the sea in the wilderness but he would that they should come forth even unto the land of promise which be choice above all other land which the lord god have preserve for a righteous people . ether and he have swear in his wrath unto the brother of jared that whoso should possess this land of promise from that time henceforth and forever should serve him the true and only god or they should be sweep off when the fulness of his wrath should come upon them . ether and now we can behold the decree of god concern this land that it be a land of promise and whatsoever nation shall possess it shall serve god or they shall be sweep off when the fulness of his wrath shall come upon them . and the fulness of his wrath cometh upon them when they be ripen in iniquity . ether for behold this be a land which be choice above all other land wherefore he that doth posse it shall serve god or shall be sweep off for it be the everlasting decree of god . and it be not until the fulness of iniquity among the child of the land that they be sweep off . ether and this cometh unto you o ye gentile that ye may know the decree of god that ye may repent and not continue in your iniquity until the fulness come that ye may not bring down the fulness of the wrath of god upon you a the inhabitant of the land have hitherto do . ether behold this be a choice land and whatsoever nation shall possess it shall be free from bondage and from captivity and from all other nation under heaven if they will but serve the god of the land who be jesus christ who hath be manifest by the thing which we have write . ether and now i proceed with my record for behold it come to pass that the lord do bring jared and his brother forth even to that great sea which divideth the land . and a they come to the sea they pitch their tent and they call the name of the place moriancumer and they dwell in tent and dwelt in tent upon the seashore for the space of four year . ether and it come to pass at the end of four year that the lord come again unto the brother of jared and stand in a cloud and talk with him . and for the space of three hour do the lord talk with the brother of jared and chasten him because he remember not to call upon the name of the lord . ether and the brother of jared repent of the evil which he have do and do call upon the name of the lord for his brother who be with him . and the lord say unto him i will forgive thee and thy brother of their sin but thou shalt not sin any more for ye shall remember that my spirit will not always strive with man wherefore if ye will sin until ye be fully ripe ye shall be cut off from the presence of the lord . and these be my thought upon the land which i shall give you for your inheritance for it shall be a land choice above all other land . ether and the lord say go to work and build after the manner of barge which ye have hitherto build . and it come to pass that the brother of jared do go to work and also his brother and build barge after the manner which they have build accord to the instruction of the lord . and they be small and they be light upon the water even like unto the lightness of a fowl upon the water . ether and they be build after a manner that they be exceedingly tight even that they would hold water like unto a dish and the bottom thereof be tight like unto a dish and the side thereof be tight like unto a dish and the end thereof be peak and the top thereof be tight like unto a dish and the length thereof be the length of a tree and the door thereof when it be shut be tight like unto a dish . ether and it come to pass that the brother of jared cry unto the lord say o lord i have perform the work which thou hast command me and i have make the barge accord a thou hast direct me . ether and behold o lord in them there be no light whither shall we steer ? and also we shall perish for in them we can not breathe save it be the air which be in them therefore we shall perish . ether and the lord say unto the brother of jared behold thou shalt make a hole in the top and also in the bottom and when thou shalt suffer for air thou shalt unstop the hole and receive air . and if it be so that the water come in upon thee behold ye shall stop the hole that ye may not perish in the flood . ether and it come to pass that the brother of jared do so accord a the lord have command . ether and he cry again unto the lord say o lord behold i have do even a thou hast command me and i have prepare the vessel for my people and behold there be no light in them . behold o lord wilt thou suffer that we shall cross this great water in darkness ? ether and the lord say unto the brother of jar what will ye that i should do that ye may have light in your vessel ? for behold ye can not have window for they will be dash in piece neither shall ye take fire with you for ye shall not go by the light of fire . ether for behold ye shall be a a whale in the midst of the sea for the mountain wave shall dash upon you . nevertheless i will bring you up again out of the depth of the sea for the wind have go forth out of my mouth and also the rain and the flood have i sent forth . ether and behold i prepare you against these thing for ye can not cross this great deep save i prepare you against the wave of the sea and the wind which have go forth and the flood which shall come . therefore what will ye that i should prepare for you that ye may have light when ye be swallow up in the depth of the sea ? ether chapter ether and it come to pass that the brother of jar now the number of the vessel which have be prepare be eight go forth unto the mount which they call the mount shelem because of it exceed height and do melt out of a rock sixteen small stone and they be white and clear even a transparent glass and he do carry them in his hand upon the top of the mount and cry again unto the lord say ether o lord thou hast say that we must be encompass about by the flood . now behold o lord and do not be angry with thy servant because of his weakness before thee for we know that thou art holy and dwellest in the heaven and that we be unworthy before thee because of the fall our nature have become evil continually nevertheless o lord thou hast give u a commandment that we must call upon thee that from thee we may receive accord to our desire . ether behold o lord thou hast smite u because of our iniquity and hast drive u forth and for these many year we have be in the wilderness nevertheless thou hast be merciful unto u . o lord look upon me in pity and turn away thine anger from this thy people and suffer not that they shall go forth across this rag deep in darkness but behold these thing which i have melt out of the rock . ether and i know o lord that thou hast all power and can do whatsoever thou wilt for the benefit of man therefore touch these stone o lord with thy finger and prepare them that they may shine forth in darkness and they shall shine forth unto u in the vessel which we have prepare that we may have light while we shall cross the sea . ether behold o lord thou canst do this . we know that thou art able to show forth great power which look small unto the understanding of men . ether and it come to pass that when the brother of jared have say these word behold the lord stretch forth his hand and touch the stone one by one with his finger . and the veil be take from off the eye of the brother of jared and he saw the finger of the lord and it be a the finger of a man like unto flesh and blood and the brother of jared fell down before the lord for he be strike with fear . ether and the lord saw that the brother of jared have fall to the earth and the lord say unto him arise why hast thou fall ? ether and he saith unto the lord i saw the finger of the lord and i fear l he should smite me for i know not that the lord have flesh and blood . ether and the lord say unto him because of more than this ? ether and he answer nay lord show thyself unto me . ether and the lord say unto him believest thou the word which i shall speak ? ether and he answer yea lord i know that thou jesus christ . i be the father and the son . in me shall all mankind have life and that eternally even they who shall believe on my name and they shall become my son and my daughter . ether and never even after the manner and in the likeness of the same body even a he show himself unto the nephites . ether and he minister unto him even a he minister unto the nephites and all this that this man wisdom in god . ether and behold ye may be privilege that ye may show the plate unto those who shall assist to bring forth this work ether and unto three shall they be show by the power of god so be that they repent and come unto the father in the name of jesus they shall be receive into the kingdom of god . ether and now if i have no authority for these thing judge ye for ye shall know it come to pass after the lord have prepare the stone which the brother of jared have carry up into the mount the brother of jared come down out of the mount and he do put forth the stone into the vessel which be prepared one in each end thereof and behold they do give light unto the vessel . ether and thus the lord cause stone to shine in darkness to give light unto men woman and child that they might not cross the great water in darkness . ether and it come to pass that when they have prepare all manner of food that thereby they might subsist upon the water and also food for their flock and herd and whatsoever beast or animal or fowl that they should carry with them and it come to pass that when they have do all these thing they get aboard of their vessel or barge and set forth into the sea commend themselves unto the lord their god . ether and it come to pass that the lord god cause that there should be a furious wind blow upon the face of the water towards the promised land and thus they be toss upon the wave of the sea before the wind . ether and it come to pass that they be many time bury in the depth of the sea because of the mountain wave which break upon them and also
