water . ether and it come to pass that the wind do never cease to blow towards the promise land while they be upon the water and thus they be drive forth before the wind . ether and they do sing praise unto the lord yea the brother of jared do sing praise unto the lord and he do thank and praise the lord all the day long and when the night come they do not cease to praise the lord . ether and thus they be drive forth and no monster of the sea could break them neither whale that could mar them and they do have light continually whether it be above the water or under the water . ether and thus they be drive forth three hundred and forty and four day upon the water . ether and they do land upon the shore of the promised land . and when they have set their foot upon the shore of the promise land they bow themselves down upon the face of the land and do humble themselves before the lord and do shed tear of joy before the lord because of the multitude of his tender mercy over them . ether and it come to pass that they go forth upon the face of the land and begin to till the earth . ether and jar have four son and they be call jacom and gilgah and mahah and orihah . ether and the brother of jared also begat son and daughter . ether and the friend of jared and his brother be in number about twenty and two soul and they also beget son and daughter before they come to the promise land and therefore they begin to be many . ether and they be teach to walk humbly before the lord and they be also teach from on high . ether and it come to pass that they begin to spread upon the face of the land and to multiply and to till the earth and they do wax strong in the land . ether and the brother of jared begin to be old and saw that he must soon go down to the grave wherefore he say unto jared let u gather together our people that we may number them that we may know of them what they will desire of u before we go down to our graf . ether and accordingly the people be gather together . now the number of the son and the daughter of the brother of jar be twenty and two soul and the number of son and daughter of jared be twelve he have four son . ether and it come to pass that they do number their people and after that they have number them they do desire of them the thing which they would that they should do before they go down to their graf . ether and it come to pass that the people desire of them that they should anoint one of their son to be a king over them . ether and now behold this be grievous unto them . and the brother of jar say unto them surely this thing leadeth into captivity . ether but jar say unto his brother suffer them that they may have a king . and therefore he say unto them choose ye out from among our son a king even whom ye will . ether and it come to pass that they choose even the firstborn of the brother of jared and his name be pagag . and it come to pass that he refuse and would not be their king . and the people would that his father should constrain him but his father would not and he command them that they should constrain no man to be their king . ether and it come to pass that they choose all the brother of pagag and they would not . ether and it come to pass that neither would the son of jared even all save it be one and orihah be anoint to be king over the people . ether and he begin to reign and the people begin to prosper and they become exceedingly rich . ether and it come to pass that jar die and his brother also . ether and it come to pass that orihah do walk humbly before the lord and do remember how great thing the lord have do for his father and also teach his people how great thing the lord have do for their father . ether chapter ether and it come to pass that orihah do execute judgment upon the land in righteousness all his day whose day be exceedingly many . ether and he beget son and daughter yea he beget thirty and one among whom be twenty and three son . ether and it come to pass that he also beget kib in his old age . and it come to pass that kib reign in his stead and kib begat corihor . ether and when corihor be thirty and two year old he rebel against his father and go over and dwell in the land of nehor and he beget son and daughter and they become exceedingly fair wherefore corihor draw away many people after him . ether and when he have gather together an army he come up unto the land of moron where the king dwelt and take him captive which bring to pass the saying of the brother of jar that they would be bring into captivity . ether now the land of moron where the king dwelt be near the land which be call desolation by the nephites . ether and it come to pass that kib dwelt in captivity and his people under corihor his son until he become exceedingly old nevertheless kib begat shule in his old age while he be yet in captivity . ether and it come to pass that shule be angry with his brother and shule wax strong and become mighty a to the strength of a man and he be also mighty in judgment . ether wherefore he come to the hill ephraim and he do melt out of the hill and make sword out of steel for those whom he have draw away with him and after he have arm them with sword he return to the city nehor and give battle unto his brother corihor by which mean he obtain the kingdom and restore it unto his father kib . ether and now because of the thing which shule have do his father bestow upon him the kingdom therefore he begin to reign in the stead of his father . ether and it come to pass that he do execute judgment in righteousness and he do spread his kingdom upon all the face of the land for the people have become exceedingly numerous . ether and it come to pass that shule also beget many son and daughter . ether and corihor repent of the many evil which he have do wherefore shule give him power in his kingdom . ether and it come to pass that corihor have many son and daughter . and among the son of corihor there be one whose name be noah . ether and it come to pass that noah rebel against shule the king and also his father corihor and draw away cohor his brother and also all his brother and many of the people . ether and he give battle unto shule the king in which he do obtain the land of their first inheritance and he become a king over that part of the land . ether and it come to pass that he give battle again unto shule the king and he take shule the king and carry him away captive into moron . ether and it come to pass a he be about to put him to death the son of shule crept into the house of noah by night and slew him and break down the door of the prison and bring out their father and place him upon his throne in his own kingdom . ether wherefore the son of noah do build up his kingdom in his stead nevertheless they do not gain power any more over shule the king and the people who be under the reign of shule the king do prosper exceedingly and wax great . ether and the country be divide and there be two kingdom the kingdom of shule and the kingdom of cohor the son of noah . ether and cohor the son of noah cause that his people should give battle unto shule in which shule do beat them and do slay cohor . ether and now cohor have a son who be call nimrod and nimrod give up the kingdom of cohor unto shule and he do gain favor in the eye of shule wherefore shule do bestow great favor upon him and he do do in the kingdom of shule accord to his desire . ether and also in the reign of shule there come prophet among the people who be send from the lord prophesying that the wickedness and idolatry of the people be bring a curse upon the land and they should be destroy if they do not repent . ether and it come to pass that the people do revile against the prophet and do mock them . and it come to pass that king shule do execute judgment against all those who do revile against the prophet . ether and he do execute a law throughout all the land which give power unto the prophet that they should go whithersoever they would and by this cause the people be bring unto repentance . ether and because the people do repent of their iniquity and idolatries the lord do spare them and they begin to prosper again in the land . and it come to pass that shule begat son and daughter in his old age . ether and there be no more war in the day of shule and he remember the great thing that the lord have do for his father in bring them across the great deep into the promised land wherefore he do execute judgment in righteousness all his day . ether chapter ether and it come to pass that he beget omer and omer reign in his stead . and omer begat jar and jar begat son and daughter . ether and jar rebel against his father and come and dwelt in the land of heth . and it come to pass that he do flatter many people because of his cunning word until he have gain the half of the kingdom . ether and when he have gain the half of the kingdom he give battle unto his father and he do carry away his father into captivity and do make him serve in captivity ether and now in the day of the reign of omer he be in captivity the half of his day . and it come to pass that he beget son and daughter among whom be esrom and coriantumr ether and they be exceedingly angry because of the doings of jar their brother insomuch that they do raise an army and give battle unto jar . and it come to pass that they do give battle unto him by night . ether and it come to pass that when they have slay the army of jared they be about to slay him also and he plead with them that they would not slay him and he would give up the kingdom unto his father . and it come to pass that they do grant unto him his life . ether and now jared become exceedingly sorrowful because of the loss of the kingdom for he have set his heart upon the kingdom and upon the glory of the world . ether now the daughter of jared be exceedingly expert and see the sorrow of her father thought to devise a plan whereby she could redeem the kingdom unto her father . ether now the daughter of jared be exceedingly fair . and it come to pass that she do talk with her father and say unto him whereby hath my father so much sorrow ? hath he not read the record which our father bring across the great deep ? behold be there not an account concern them of old that they by their secret plan do obtain kingdom and great glory ? ether and now therefore let my father send for akish the son of kimnor and behold i be fair and i will dance before him and i will please him that he will desire me to wife wherefore if he shall desire of thee that ye shall give unto him me to wife then shall ye say i will give her if ye will bring unto me the head of my father the king . ether and now omer be a friend to akish wherefore when jared have send for akish the daughter of jared dance before him that she please him insomuch that he desire her to wife . and it come to pass that he say unto jared give her unto me to wife . ether and jar say unto him i will give her unto you if ye will bring unto me the head of my father the king . ether and it come to pass that akish gather in unto the house of jar all his kinsfolk and say unto them will ye swear unto me that ye will be faithful unto me in the thing which i shall desire of you ? ether and it come to pass that they all sware unto him by the god of heaven and also by the heaven and also by the earth and by their head that whoso should vary from the assistance which akish desire should lose his head and whoso should divulge whatsoever thing akish make know unto them the same should lose his life . ether and it come to pass that thus they do agree with akish . and akish do administer unto them the oath which be give by them of old who also seek power which have be hand down even from cain who be a murderer from the beginning . ether and they be keep up by the power of the devil to administer these oath unto the people to keep them in darkness to help such a sought power to gain power and to murder and to plunder and to lie and to commit all manner of wickedness and whoredom . ether and it be the daughter of jared who put it into his heart to search up these thing of old and jar put it into the heart of akish wherefore akish administer it unto his kindred and friend lead them away by fair promise to do whatsoever thing he desire . ether and it come to pass that they form a secret combination even a they of old which combination be most abominable and wicked above all in the sight of god ether for the lord worketh not in secret combination neither doth he will that man should shed blood but in all thing hath forbidden it from the beginning of man . ether and now i moroni do not write the manner of their oath and combination for it hath be make know unto me that they be have among all people and they be have among the lamanites . ether and they have cause the destruction of this people of whom i be now speak and also the destruction of the people of nephi . ether and whatsoever nation shall uphold such secret combination to get power and gain until they shall spread over the nation behold they shall be destroy for the lord will not suffer that the blood of his saint which shall be shed by them shall always cry unto him from the ground for vengeance upon them and yet he avenge them not . ether wherefore o ye gentile it be wisdom in god that these thing should be show unto you that thereby ye may repent of your sin and suffer not that these murderous combination shall get above you which be build up to get power and gain and the work yea even the work of destruction come upon you yea even the sword of the justice of the eternal god shall fall upon you to your overthrow and destruction if ye shall suffer these thing to be . ether wherefore the lord commandeth you when ye shall see these thing come among you that ye shall awake to a sense of your awful situation because of this secret combination which shall be among you or wo be unto it because of the blood of them who have be slay for they cry from the dust for vengeance upon it and also upon those who build it up . ether for it cometh to pass that whoso buildeth it up seeketh to overthrow the freedom of all land nation and country and it bringeth to pass the destruction of all people for it be build up by the devil who be the father of all lie even that same liar who beguile our first parent yea even that same liar who hath cause man to commit murder from the beginning who hath harden the heart of men that they have murder the prophet and stone them and cast them out from the beginning . ether wherefore i moroni be command to write these thing that evil may be do away and that the time may come that satan may have no power upon the heart of the child of men but that they may be persuade to do good continually that they may come unto the fountain of all righteousness and be save . ether chapter ether and now i moroni proceed with my record . therefore behold it come to pass that because of the secret combination of akish and his friend behold they do overthrow the kingdom of omer . ether nevertheless the lord be merciful unto omer and also to his son and to his daughter who do not seek his destruction . ether and the lord warn omer in a dream that he should depart out of the land wherefore omer depart out of the land with his family and travel many day and come over and pass by the hill of shim and come over by the place where the nephites be destroy and from thence eastward and come to a place which be call ablom by the seashore and there he pitch his tent and also his son and his daughter and all his household save it be jar and his family . ether and it come to pass that jared be anoint king over the people by the hand of wickedness and he give unto akish his daughter to wife . ether and it come to pass that akish seek the life of his father in law and he apply unto those whom he have swear by the oath of the ancient and they obtain the head of his father in law a he sit upon his throne give audience to his people . ether for so great have be the spreading of this wicked and secret society that it have corrupt the heart of all the people therefore jar be murder upon his throne and akish reign in his stead . ether and it come to pass that akish begin to be jealous of his son therefore he shut him up in prison and keep him upon little or no food until he have suffer death . ether and now the brother of him that suffer death and his name be nimrah be angry with his father because of that which his father have do unto his brother . ether and it come to pass that nimrah gather together a small number of men and flee out of the land and come over and dwell with omer . ether and it come to pass that akish begat other son and they win the heart of the people notwithstanding they have swear unto him to do all manner of iniquity accord to that which he desire . ether now the people of akish be desirous for gain even a akish be desirous for power wherefore the son of akish do offer them money by which mean they draw away the more part of the people after them . ether and there begin to be a war between the son of akish and akish which last for the space of many year yea unto the destruction of nearly all the people of the kingdom yea even all save it be thirty soul and they who flee with the house of omer . ether wherefore omer be restore again to the land of his inheritance . ether and it come to pass that omer begin to be old nevertheless in his old age he beget emer and he anoint emer to be king to reign in his stead . ether and after that he have anoint emer to be king he saw peace in the land for the space of two year and he die have see exceedingly many day which be full of sorrow . and it come to pass that emer do reign in his stead and do fill the step of his father . ether and the lord begin again to take the curse from off the land and the house of emer do prosper exceedingly under the reign of emer and in the space of sixty and two year they have become exceedingly strong insomuch that they become exceedingly rich ether have all manner of fruit and of grain and of silk and of fine linen and of gold and of silver and of precious thing ether and also all manner of cattle of ox and cow and of sheep and of swine and of goat and also many other kind of animal which be useful for the food of man . ether and they also have horse and ass and there be elephant and cureloms and cumoms all of which be useful unto man and more especially the elephant and cureloms and cumoms . ether and thus the lord do pour out his blessing upon this land which be choice above all other land and he command that whoso should possess the land should possess it unto the lord or they should be destroy when they be ripen in iniquity for upon such saith the lord i will pour out the fulness of my wrath . ether and emer do execute judgment in righteousness all his day and he beget many son and daughter and he beget coriantum and he anoint coriantum to reign in his stead . ether and after he have anoint coriantum to reign in his stead he live four year and he saw peace in the land yea and he even saw the son of righteousness and do rejoice and glory in his day and he die in peace . ether and it come to pass that coriantum do walk in the step of his father and do build many mighty city and do administer that which be good unto his people in all his day . and it come to pass that he have no child even until he be exceedingly old . ether and it come to pass that his wife die be an hundred and two year old . and it come to pass that coriantum take to wife in his old age a young maid and begat son and daughter wherefore he live until he be an hundred and forty and two year old . ether and it come to pass that he beget com and com reign in his stead and he reign forty and nine year and he beget heth and he also beget other son and daughter . ether and the people have spread again over all the face of the land and there begin again to be an exceedingly great wickedness upon the face of the land and heth begin to embrace the secret plan again of old to destroy his father . ether and it come to pass that he do dethrone his father for he slew him with his own sword and he do reign in his stead . ether and there come prophet in the land again cry repentance unto them that they must prepare the way of the lord or there should come a curse upon the face of the land yea even there should be a great famine in which they should be destroy if they do not repent . ether but the people believe not the word of the prophet but they cast them out and some of them they cast into pit and leave them to perish . and it come to pass that they do all these thing accord to the commandment of the king heth . ether and it come to pass that there begin to be a great dearth upon the land and the inhabitant begin to be destroy exceedingly fast because of the dearth for there be no rain upon the face of the earth . ether and there come forth poisonous serpent also upon the face of the land and do poison many people . and it come to pass that their flock begin to flee before the poisonous serpent towards the land southward which be call by the nephites zarahemla . ether and it come to pass that there be many of them which do perish by the way nevertheless there be some which flee into the land southward . ether and it come to pass that the lord do cause the serpent that they should pursue them no more but that they should hedge up the way that the people could not pass that whoso should attempt to pass might fall by the poisonous serpent . ether and it come to pass that the people do follow the course of the beast and do devour the carcass of them which fell by the way until they have devour them all . now when the people saw that they must perish they begin to repent of their iniquity and cry unto the lord . ether and it come to pass that when they have humble themselves sufficiently before the lord he do send rain upon the face of the earth and the people begin to revive again and there begin to be fruit in the north country and in all the country round about . and the lord do show forth his power unto them in preserve them from famine . ether chapter ether and it come to pass that shez who be a descendant of heth for heth have perish by the famine and all his household save it be shez wherefore shez begin to build up again a broken people . ether and it come to pass that shez do remember the destruction of his father and he do build up a righteous kingdom for he remember what the lord have do in bringing jared and his brother across the deep and he do walk in the way of the lord and he beget son and daughter . ether and his eldest son whose name be shez do rebel against him nevertheless shez be smite by the hand of a robber because of his exceed rich which bring peace again unto his father . ether and it come to pass that his father do build up many city upon the face of the land and the people begin again to spread over all the face of the land . and shez do live to an exceedingly old age and he beget riplakish . and he die and riplakish reign in his stead . ether and it come to pass that riplakish do not do that which be right in the sight of the lord for he do have many wife and concubine and do lay that upon men 's shoulder which be grievous to be borne yea he do tax them with heavy tax and with the tax he do build many spacious building . ether and he do erect him an exceedingly beautiful throne and he do build many prison and whoso would not be subject unto tax he do cast into prison and whoso be not able to pay tax he do cast into prison and he do cause that they should labor continually for their support and whoso refuse to labor he do cause to be put to death . ether wherefore he do obtain all his fine work yea even his fine gold he do cause to be refine in prison and all manner of fine workmanship he do cause to be work in prison . and it come to pass that he do afflict the people with his whoredom and abomination . ether and when he have reign for the space of forty and two year the people do rise up in rebellion against him and there begin to be war again in the land insomuch that riplakish be kill and his descendant be drive out of the land . ether and it come to pass after the space of many year morianton he be a descendant of riplakish gather together an army of outcast and go forth and give battle unto the people and he gain power over many city and the war become exceedingly sore and do last for the space of many year and he do gain power over all the land and do establish himself king over all the land . ether and after that he have establish himself king he do ease the burden of the people by which he do gain favor in the eye of the people and they do anoint him to be their king . ether and he do do justice unto the people but not unto himself because of his many whoredom wherefore he be cut off from the presence of the lord . ether and it come to pass that morianton build up many city and the people become exceedingly rich under his reign both in building and in gold and silver and in raise grain and in flock and herd and such thing which have be restore unto them . ether and morianton do live to an exceedingly great age and then he beget kim and kim do reign in the stead of his father and he do reign eight year and his father die . and it come to pass that kim do not reign in righteousness wherefore he be not favor of the lord . ether and his brother do rise up in rebellion against him by which he do bring him into captivity and he do remain in captivity all his day and he beget son and daughter in captivity and in his old age he beget levi and he die . ether and it come to pass that levi do serve in captivity after the death of his father for the space of forty and two year . and he do make war against the king of the land by which he do obtain unto himself the kingdom . ether and after he have obtain unto himself the kingdom he do that which be right in the sight of the lord and the people do prosper in the land and he do live to a good old age and begat son and daughter and he also beget corom whom he anoint king in his stead . ether and it come to pass that corom do that which be good in the sight of the lord all his day and he beget many son and daughter and after he have see many day he do pass away even like unto the rest of the earth and kish reign in his stead . ether and it come to pass that kish pass away also and lib reign in his stead . ether and it come to pass that lib also do that which be good in the sight of the lord . and in the day of lib the poisonous serpent be destroy . wherefore they do go into the land southward to hunt food for the people of the land for the land be cover with animal of the forest . and lib also himself become a great hunter . ether and they build a great city by the narrow neck of land by the place where the sea divide the land . ether and they do preserve the land southward for a wilderness to get game . and the whole face of the land northward be cover with inhabitant . ether and they be exceedingly industrious and they do buy and sell and traffic one with another that they might get gain . ether and they do work in all manner of ore and they do make gold and silver and iron and brass and all manner of metal and they do dig it out of the earth wherefore they do cast up mighty heap of earth to get ore of gold and of silver and of iron and of copper . and they do work all manner of fine work . ether and they do have silk and fine twin linen and they do work all manner of cloth that they might clothe themselves from their nakedness . ether and they do make all manner of tool to till the earth both to plow and to sow to reap and to hoe and also to thrash . ether and they do make all manner of tool with which they do work their beast . ether and they do make all manner of weapon of war . and they do work all manner of work of exceedingly curious workmanship . ether and never could be a people more blessed than be they and more prosper by the hand of the lord . and they be in a land that be choice above all land for the lord have speak it . ether and it come to pass that lib do live many year and begat son and daughter and he also beget hearthom . ether and it come to pass that hearthom reign in the stead of his father . and when hearthom have reign twenty and four year behold the kingdom be take away from him . and he serve many year in captivity yea even all the remainder of his day . ether and he beget heth and heth live in captivity all his day . and heth begat aaron and aaron dwelt in captivity all his day and he beget amnigaddah and amnigaddah also dwell in captivity all his day and he beget coriantum and coriantum dwelt in captivity all his day and he beget com . ether and it come to pass that com draw away the half of the kingdom . and he reign over the half of the kingdom forty and two year and he go to battle against the king amgid and they fight for the space of many year during which time com gain power over amgid and obtained power over the remainder of the kingdom . ether and in the day of com there begin to be robber in the land and they adopt the old plan and administer oath after the manner of the ancient and seek again to destroy the kingdom . ether now com do fight against them much nevertheless he do not prevail against them . ether chapter ether and there come also in the day of com many prophet and prophesy of the destruction of that great people except they should repent and turn unto the lord and forsake their murder and wickedness . ether and it come to pass that the prophet be reject by the people and they flee unto com for protection for the people seek to destroy them . ether and they prophesy unto com many thing and he be bless in all the remainder of his day . ether and he live to a good old age and begat shiblom and shiblom reign in his stead . and the brother of shiblom rebel against him and there begin to be an exceedingly great war in all the land . ether and it come to pass that the brother of shiblom cause that all the prophet who prophesy of the destruction of the people should be put to death ether and there be great calamity in all the land for they have testify that a great curse should come upon the land and also upon the people and that there should be a great destruction among them such an one a never have be upon the face of the earth and their bone should become a heap of earth upon the face of the land except they should repent of their wickedness . ether and they hearken not unto the voice of the lord because of their wicked combination wherefore there begin to be war and contention in all the land and also many famine and pestilence insomuch that there be a great destruction such an one a never have be know upon the face of the earth and all this come to pass in the day of shiblom . ether and the people begin to repent of their iniquity and inasmuch a they do the lord do have mercy on them . ether and it come to pass that shiblom be slay and seth be bring into captivity and do dwell in captivity all his day . ether and it come to pass that ahah his son do obtain the kingdom and he do reign over the people all his day . and he do do all manner of iniquity in his day by which he do cause the shedding of much blood and few be his day . ether and ethem be a descendant of ahah do obtain the kingdom and he also do do that which be wicked in his day . ether and it come to pass that in the day of ethem there come many prophet and prophesy again unto the people yea they do prophesy that the lord would utterly destroy them from off the face of the earth except they repent of their iniquity . ether and it come to pass that the people harden their heart and would not hearken unto their word and the prophet mourn and withdraw from among the people . ether and it come to pass that ethem do execute judgment in wickedness all his day and he beget moron . and it come to pass that moron do reign in his stead and moron do that which be wicked before the lord . ether and it come to pass that there arise a rebellion among the people because of that secret combination which be build up to get power and gain and there arise a mighty man among them in iniquity and give battle unto moron in which he do overthrow the half of the kingdom and he do maintain the half of the kingdom for many year . ether and it come to pass that moron do overthrow him and do obtain the kingdom again . ether and it come to pass that there arise another mighty man and he be a descendant of the brother of jared . ether and it come to pass that he do overthrow moron and obtain the kingdom wherefore moron dwelt in captivity all the remainder of his day and he beget coriantor . ether and it come to pass that coriantor dwell in captivity all his day . ether and in the day of coriantor there also come many prophet and prophesy of great and marvelous thing and cry repentance unto the people and except they should repent the lord god would execute judgment against them to their utter destruction ether and that the lord god would send or bring forth another people to possess the land by his power after the manner by which he bring their father . ether and they do reject all the word of the prophet because of their secret society and wicked abomination . ether and it come to pass that coriantor beget ether and he die have dwelt in captivity all his day . ether chapter ether and it come to pass that the day of ether be in the day of coriantumr and coriantumr be king over all the land . ether and ether be a prophet of the lord wherefore ether come forth in the day of coriantumr and begin to prophesy unto the people for he could not be restrain because of the spirit of the lord which be in him . ether for he do cry from the morning even until the go down of the sun exhort the people to believe in god unto repentance l they should be destroy say unto them that by faith all thing be fulfil ether wherefore whoso believeth in god might with surety hope for a good world yea even a place at the right hand of god which hope cometh of faith maketh an anchor to the soul of men which would make them sure and steadfast always abound in good work be lead to glorify god . ether and it come to pass that ether do prophesy great and marvelous thing unto the people which they do not believe because they saw them not . ether and now i moroni would speak somewhat concern these thing i would show unto the world that faith be thing which be hop for and not see wherefore dispute not because ye see not for ye receive no witness until after the trial of your faith . ether for it be by faith that christ show himself unto our father after he have rise from the dead and he show not himself unto them until after they have faith in him wherefore it must needs be that some have faith in him for he show himself not unto the world . ether but because of the faith of men he have show himself unto the world and glorify the name of the father and prepare a way that thereby others might be partaker of the heavenly gift that they might hope for those thing which they have not see . ether wherefore ye may also have hope and be partaker of the gift if ye will but have faith . ether behold it be by faith that they of old be call after the holy order of god . ether wherefore by faith be the law of moses give . but in the gift of his son hath god prepare a more excellent way and it be by faith that it hath be fulfil . ether for if there be no faith among the child of men god can do no miracle among them wherefore he show not himself until after their faith . ether behold it be the faith of alma and amulek that cause the prison to tumble to the earth . ether behold it be the faith of nephi and lehi that work the change upon the lamanites that they be baptize with fire and with the holy ghost . ether behold it be the faith of ammon and his brother which work so great a miracle among the lamanites . ether yea and even all they who work miracle work them by faith even those who be before christ and also those who be after . ether and it be by faith that the three disciple obtain a promise that they should not taste of death and they obtain not the promise until after their faith . ether and neither at any time hath any wrought miracle until after their faith wherefore they first believe in the son of god . ether and there be many whose faith be so exceedingly strong even before christ come who could not be keep from within the veil but truly saw with their eye the thing which they have behold with an eye of faith and they be glad . ether and behold we have see in this record that one of these be the brother of jared for so great be his faith in god that when god put forth his finger he could not hide it from the sight of the brother of jared because of his word which he have speak unto him which word he have obtain by faith . ether and after the brother of jared have behold the finger of the lord because of the promise which the brother of jared have obtain by faith the lord could not withhold anything from his sight wherefore he show him all thing for he could no longer be keep without the veil . ether and it be by faith that my father have obtain the promise that these thing should come unto their brother through the gentile therefore the lord hath command me yea even jesus christ . ether and i say unto him lord the gentile will mock at these thing because of our weakness in write for lord thou hast make u mighty in word by faith but thou hast not make u mighty in write for thou hast make all this people that they could speak much because of the holy ghost which thou hast give them ether and thou hast make u that we could write but little because of the awkwardness of our hand . behold thou hast not make u mighty in write like unto the brother of jared for thou mad him that the thing which he write be mighty even a thou art unto the overpowering of man to read them . ether thou hast also make our word powerful and great even that we can not write them wherefore when we write we behold our weakness and stumble because of the placing of our word and i fear l the gentile shall mock at our word . ether and when i have say this the lord spake unto me say fools mock but they shall mourn and my grace be sufficient for the meek that they shall take no advantage of your weakness ether and if men come unto me i will show unto them their weakness . i give unto men weakness that they may be humble and my grace be sufficient for all men that humble themselves before me for if they humble themselves before me and have faith in me then will i make weak thing become strong unto them . ether behold i will show unto the gentile their weakness and i will show unto them that faith hope and charity bringeth unto me the fountain of all righteousness . ether and i moroni have hear these word be comfort and say o lord thy righteous will be do for i know that thou workest unto the child of men accord to their faith ether for the brother of jar say unto the mountain zerin remove and it be remove . and if he have not have faith it would not have move wherefore thou workest after men have faith . ether for thus didst thou manifest thyself unto thy disciple for after they have faith and do speak in thy name thou didst show thyself unto them in great power . ether and i also remember that thou hast say that thou hast prepare a house for man yea even among the mansion of thy father in which man might have a more excellent hope wherefore man must hope or he can not receive an inheritance in the place which thou hast prepared . ether and again i remember that thou hast say that thou hast love the world even unto the lay down of thy life for the world that thou mightest take it again to prepare a place for the child of men . ether and now i know that this love which thou hast have for the child of men be charity wherefore except men shall have charity they can not inherit that place which thou hast prepare in the mansion of thy father . ether wherefore i know by this thing which thou hast say that if the gentile have not charity because of our weakness that thou wilt prove them and take away their talent yea even that which they have receive and give unto them who shall have more abundantly . ether and it come to pass that i pray unto the lord that he would give unto the gentile grace that they might have charity . ether and it come to pass that the lord say unto me if they have not charity it mattereth not unto thee thou hast be faithful wherefore thy garment shall be make clean . and because thou hast see thy weakness thou shalt be make strong even unto the sit down in the place which i have prepare in the mansion of my father . ether and now i moroni bid farewell unto the gentile yea and also unto my brethren whom i love until we shall meet before the judgment seat of christ where all men shall know that my garment be not spot with your blood . ether and then shall ye know that i have see jesus and that he hath talk with me face to face and that he tell me in plain humility even a a man telleth another in mine own language concern these thing ether and only a few have i write because of my weakness in write . ether and now i would commend you to seek this jesus of whom the prophet and apostle have write that the grace of god the father and also the lord jesus christ and the holy ghost which beareth record of them may be and abide in you forever . amen . ether chapter ether and now i moroni proceed to finish my record concern the destruction of the people of whom i have be write . ether for behold they reject all the word of ether for he truly tell them of all thing from the beginning of man and that after the water have recede from off the face of this land it become a choice land above all other land a chosen land of the lord wherefore the lord would have that all men should serve him who dwell upon the face thereof ether and that it be the place of the new jerusalem which should come down out of heaven and the holy sanctuary of the lord . ether behold ether saw the day of christ and he spake concern a new jerusalem upon this land . ether and he spake also concern the house of israel and the jerusalem from whence lehi should come after it should be destroy it should be build up again a holy city unto the lord wherefore it could not be a new jerusalem for it have be in a time of old but it should be build up again and become a holy city of the lord and it should be build unto the house of israel . ether and that a new jerusalem should be build upon this land unto the remnant of the seed of joseph for which thing there have be a type . ether for a joseph bring his father down into the land of egypt even so he die there wherefore the lord bring a remnant of the seed of joseph out of the land of jerusalem that he might be merciful unto the seed of joseph that they should perish not even a he be merciful unto the father of joseph that he should perish not . ether wherefore the remnant of the house of joseph shall be build upon this land and it shall be a land of their inheritance and they shall build up a holy city unto the lord like unto the jerusalem of old and they shall no more be confound until the end come when the earth shall pass away . ether and there shall be a new heaven and a new earth and they shall be like unto the old save the old have pass away and all thing have become new . ether and then cometh the new jerusalem and bless be they who dwell therein for it be they whose garment be white through the blood of the lamb and they be they who be number among the remnant of the seed of joseph who be of the house of israel . ether and then also cometh the jerusalem of old and the inhabitant thereof bless be they for they have be wash in the blood of the lamb and they be they who be scatter and gather in from the four quarter of the earth and from the north country and be partaker of the fulfilling of the covenant which god make with their father abraham . ether and when these thing come bringeth to pass the scripture which saith there be they who be first who shall be last and there be they who be last who shall be first . ether and i be about to write more but i be forbidden but great and marvelous be the prophecy of ether but they esteem him a naught and cast him out and he hide himself in the cavity of a rock by day and by night he go forth view the thing which should come upon the people . ether and a he dwell in the cavity of a rock he make the remainder of his record view the destruction which come upon the people by night . ether and it come to pass that in that same year in which he be cast out from among the people there begin to be a great war among the people for there be many who rise up who be mighty men and seek to destroy coriantumr by their secret plan of wickedness of which hath be speak . ether and now coriantumr have study himself in all the art of war and all the cunning of the world wherefore he give battle unto them who seek to destroy him . ether but he repent not neither his fair son nor daughter neither the fair son and daughter of cohor neither the fair son and daughter of corihor and in fine there be none of the fair son and daughter upon the face of the whole earth who repent of their sin . ether wherefore it come to pass that in the first year that ether dwelt in the cavity of a rock there be many people who be slay by the sword of those secret combination fight against coriantumr that they might obtain the kingdom . ether and it come to pass that the son of coriantumr fight much and bleed much . ether and in the second year the word of the lord come to ether that he should go and prophesy unto coriantumr that if he would repent and all his household the lord would give unto him his kingdom and spare the people ether otherwise they should be destroy and all his household save it be himself . and he should only live to see the fulfilling of the prophecy which have be speak concern another people receive the land for their inheritance and coriantumr should receive a burial by them and every soul should be destroy save it be coriantumr . ether and it come to pass that coriantumr repent not neither his household neither the people and the war cease not and they seek to kill ether but he flee from before them and hide again in the cavity of the rock . ether and it come to pass that there arise up share and he also give battle unto coriantumr and he do beat him insomuch that in the third year he do bring him into captivity . ether and the son of coriantumr in the fourth year do beat share and do obtain the kingdom again unto their father . ether now there begin to be a war upon all the face of the land every man with his band fight for that which he desire . ether and there be robber and in fine all manner of wickedness upon all the face of the land . ether and it come to pass that coriantumr be exceedingly angry with share and he go against him with his army to battle and they do meet in great anger and they do meet in the valley of gilgal and the battle become exceedingly sore . ether and it come to pass that share fight against him for the space of three day . and it come to pass that coriantumr beat him and do pursue him until he come to the plain of heshlon . ether and it come to pass that share give him battle again upon the plain and behold he do beat coriantumr and drive him back again to the valley of gilgal . ether and coriantumr give share battle again in the valley of gilgal in which he beat share and slew him . ether and share wound coriantumr in his thigh that he do not go to battle again for the space of two year in which time all the people upon the face of the land be shed blood and there be none to restrain them . ether chapter ether and now there begin to be a great curse upon all the land because of the iniquity of the people in which if a man should lay his tool or his sword upon his shelf or upon the place whither he would keep it behold upon the morrow he could not find it so great be the curse upon the land . ether wherefore every man do cleave unto that which be his own with his hand and would not borrow neither would he lend and every man keep the hilt of his sword in his right hand in the defence of his property and his own life and of his wife and child . ether and now after the space of two year and after the death of share behold there arise the brother of share and he give battle unto coriantumr in which coriantumr do beat him and do pursue him to the wilderness of akish . ether and it come to pass that the brother of share do give battle unto him in the wilderness of akish and the battle become exceedingly sore and many thousand fell by the sword . ether and it come to pass that coriantumr do lay siege to the wilderness and the brother of share do march forth out of the wilderness by night and slew a part of the army of coriantumr a they be drunken . ether and he come forth to the land of moron and place himself upon the throne of coriantumr . ether and it come to pass that coriantumr dwelt with his army in the wilderness for the space of two year in which he do receive great strength to his army . ether now the brother of share whose name be gilead also receive great strength to his army because of secret combination . ether and it come to pass that his high priest murder him a he sit upon his throne . ether and it come to pass that one of the secret combination murder him in a secret pas and obtain unto himself the kingdom and his name be lib and lib be a man of great stature more than any other man among all the people . ether and it come to pass that in the first year of lib coriantumr come up unto the land of moron and give battle unto lib . ether and it come to pass that he fight with lib in which lib do smite upon his arm that he be wound nevertheless the army of coriantumr do press forward upon lib that he flee to the border upon the seashore . ether and it come to pass that coriantumr pursue him and lib give battle unto him upon the seashore . ether and it come to pass that lib do smite the army of coriantumr that they flee again to the wilderness of akish . ether and it come to pass that lib do pursue him until he come to the plain of agosh . and coriantumr have take all the people with him a he flee before lib in that quarter of the land whither he flee . ether and when he have come to the plain of agosh he give battle unto lib and he smite upon him until he die nevertheless the brother of lib do come against coriantumr in the stead thereof and the battle become exceedingly sore in the which coriantumr flee again before the army of the brother of lib . ether now the name of the brother of lib be call shiz . and it come to pass that shiz pursue after coriantumr and he do overthrow many city and he do slay both woman and child and he do burn the city . ether and there go a fear of shiz throughout all the land yea a cry go forth throughout the land who can stand before the army of shiz ? behold he sweepeth the earth before him ! ether and it come to pass that the people begin to flock together in army throughout all the face of the land . ether and they be divide and a part of them flee to the army of shiz and a part of them flee to the army of coriantumr . ether and so great and lasting have be the war and so long have be the scene of bloodshed and carnage that the whole face of the land be cover with the body of the dead . ether and so swift and speedy be the war that there be none leave to bury the dead but they do march forth from the shedding of blood to the shedding of blood leave the body of both men woman and child strew upon the face of the land to become a prey to the worm of the flesh . ether and the scent thereof go forth upon the face of the land even upon all the face of the land wherefore the people become troubled by day and by night because of the scent thereof . ether nevertheless shiz do not cease to pursue coriantumr for he have swear to avenge himself upon coriantumr of the blood of his brother who have be slay and the word of the lord which come to ether that coriantumr should not fall by the sword . ether and thus we see that the lord do visit them in the fulness of his wrath and their wickedness and abomination have prepare a way for their everlasting destruction . ether and it come to pass that shiz do pursue coriantumr eastward even to the border by the seashore and there he give battle unto shiz for the space of three day . ether and so terrible be the destruction among the army of shiz that the people begin to be frighten and begin to flee before the army of coriantumr and they flee to the land of corihor and sweep off the inhabitant before them all them that would not join them . ether and they pitch their tent in the valley of corihor and coriantumr pitch his tent in the valley of shurr . now the valley of shurr be near the hill comnor wherefore coriantumr do gather his army together upon the hill comnor and do sound a trumpet unto the army of shiz to invite them forth to battle . ether and it come to pass that they come forth but be drive again and they come the second time and they be drive again the second time . and it come to pass that they come again the third time and the battle become exceedingly sore . ether and it come to pass that shiz smite upon coriantumr that he give him many deep wound and coriantumr have lose his blood faint and be carry away a though he be dead . ether now the loss of men woman and child on both side be so great that shiz command his people that they should not pursue the army of coriantumr wherefore they return to their camp . ether chapter ether and it come to pass when coriantumr have recover of his wound he begin to remember the word which ether have speak unto him . ether he saw that there have be slay by the sword already nearly two million of his people and he begin to sorrow in his heart yea there have be slay two million of mighty men and also their wife and their child . ether he begin to repent of the evil which he have do he begin to remember the word which have be speak by the mouth of all the prophet and he saw them that they be fulfil thus far every whit and his soul mourn and refuse to be comfort . ether and it come to pass that he write an epistle unto shiz desire him that he would spare the people and he would give up the kingdom for the sake of the life of the people . ether and it come to pass that when shiz have receive his epistle he write an epistle unto coriantumr that if he would give himself up that he might slay him with his own sword that he would spare the life of the people . ether and it come to pass that the people repent not of their iniquity and the people of coriantumr be stir up to anger against the people of shiz and the people of shiz be stir up to anger against the people of coriantumr wherefore the people of shiz do give battle unto the people of coriantumr . ether and when coriantumr saw that he be about to fall he flee again before the people of shiz . ether and it come to pass that he come to the water of ripliancum which by interpretation be large or to exceed all wherefore when they come to these water they pitch their tent and shiz also pitch his tent near unto them and therefore on the morrow they do come to battle . ether and it come to pass that they fight an exceedingly sore battle in which coriantumr be wound again and he faint with the loss of blood . ether and it come to pass that the army of coriantumr do press upon the army of shiz that they beat them that they cause them to flee before them and they do flee southward and do pitch their tent in a place which be call ogath . ether and it come to pass that the army of coriantumr do pitch their tent by the hill ramah and it be that same hill where my father mormon do hide up the record unto the lord which be sacred . ether and it come to pass that they do gather together all the people upon all the face of the land who have not be slay save it be ether . ether and it come to pass that ether do behold all the doings of the
