for the space of four year gather together the people that they might get all who be upon the face of the land and that they might receive all the strength which it be possible that they could receive . ether and it come to pass that when they be all gather together every one to the army which he would with their wife and their child both men woman and child be arm with weapon of war have shield and breastplate and head plate and be clothe after the manner of war they do march forth one against another to battle and they fight all that day and conquer not . ether and it come to pass that when it be night they be weary and retire to their camp and after they have retire to their camp they take up a howling and a lamentation for the loss of the slain of their people and so great be their cry their howling and lamentation that they do rend the air exceedingly . ether and it come to pass that on the morrow they do go again to battle and great and terrible be that day nevertheless they conquer not and when the night come again they do rend the air with their cry and their howling and their mourning for the loss of the slain of their people . ether and it come to pass that coriantumr write again an epistle unto shiz desiring that he would not come again to battle but that he would take the kingdom and spare the life of the people . ether and behold the spirit of the lord have cease strive with them and satan have full power over the heart of the people for they be give up unto the hardness of their heart and the blindness of their mind that they might be destroy wherefore they go again to battle . ether and it come to pass that they fight all that day and when the night come they sleep upon their sword . ether and on the morrow they fight even until the night come . ether and when the night come they be drunken with anger even a a man who be drunken with wine and they sleep again upon their sword . ether and on the morrow they fight again and when the night come they have all fall by the sword save it be fifty and two of the people of coriantumr and sixty and nine of the people of shiz . ether and it come to pass that they sleep upon their sword that night and on the morrow they fight again and they contend in their might with their sword and with their shield all that day . ether and when the night come there be thirty and two of the people of shiz and twenty and seven of the people of coriantumr . ether and it come to pass that they eat and slept and prepared for death on the morrow . and they be large and mighty men a to the strength of men . ether and it come to pass that they fight for the space of three hour and they faint with the loss of blood . ether and it come to pass that when the men of coriantumr have receive sufficient strength that they could walk they be about to flee for their life but behold shiz arose and also his men and he swore in his wrath that he would slay coriantumr or he would perish by the sword . ether wherefore he do pursue them and on the morrow he do overtake them and they fight again with the sword . and it come to pass that when they have all fall by the sword save it be coriantumr and shiz behold shiz have faint with the loss of blood . ether and it come to pass that when coriantumr have lean upon his sword that he rest a little he smite off the head of shiz . ether and it come to pass that after he have smite off the head of shiz that shiz raise upon his hand and fell and after that he have struggle for breath he die . ether and it come to pass that coriantumr fell to the earth and become a if he have no life . ether and the lord spake unto ether and say unto him go forth . and he go forth and beheld that the word of the lord have all be fulfil and he finish his record and the hundredth part i have not write and he hide them in a manner that the people of limhi do find them . ether now the last word which be write by ether be these whether the lord will that i be translate or that i suffer the will of the lord in the flesh it mattereth not if it so be that i be save in the kingdom of god . amen . the book of moroni moroni chapter moroni now i moroni after have make an end of abridge the account of the people of jared i have suppose not to have write more but i have not a yet perish and i make not myself know to the lamanites lest they should destroy me . moroni for behold their war be exceedingly fierce among themselves and because of their hatred they put to death every nephite that will not deny the christ . moroni and i moroni will not deny the christ wherefore i wander whithersoever i can for the safety of mine own life . moroni wherefore i write a few more thing contrary to that which i have suppose for i have suppose not to have write any more but i write a few more thing that perhaps they may be of worth unto my brother the lamanites in some future day accord to the will of the lord . moroni chapter moroni the word of christ which he spake unto his disciple the twelve whom he have choose a he lay his hand upon them moroni and he call them by name say ye shall call on the father in my name in mighty prayer and after ye have do this ye shall have power that to him upon whom ye shall lay your hand ye shall give the holy ghost and in my name shall ye give it for thus do mine apostle . moroni now christ spake these word unto them at the time of his first appearing and the multitude hear it not but the disciple hear it and on as many a they lay their hand fell the holy ghost . moroni chapter moroni the manner which the disciple who be call the elder of the church ordain priest and teacher moroni after they have pray unto the father in the name of christ they lay their hand upon them and say moroni in the name of jesus christ i ordain you to be a priest or if he be a teacher i ordain you to be a teacher to preach repentance and remission of sin through jesus christ by the endurance of faith on his name to the end . amen . moroni and after this manner do they ordain priest and teacher accord to the gift and calling of god unto men and they ordain them by the power of the holy ghost which be in them . moroni chapter moroni the manner of their elder and priest administer the flesh and blood of christ unto the church and they administer it accord to the commandment of christ wherefore we know the manner to be true and the elder or priest do minister it moroni and they do kneel down with the church and pray to the father in the name of christ say moroni o god the eternal father we ask thee in the name of thy son jesus christ to bless and sanctify this bread to the soul of all those who partake of it that they may eat in remembrance of the body of thy son and witness unto thee o god the eternal father that they be willing to take upon them the name of thy son and always remember him and keep his commandment which he hath give them that they may always have his spirit to be with them . amen . moroni chapter moroni the manner of administer the wine behold they take the cup and say moroni o god the eternal father we ask thee in the name of thy son jesus christ to bless and sanctify this wine to the soul of all those who drink of it that they may do it in remembrance of the blood of thy son which be shed for them that they may witness unto thee o god the eternal father that they do always remember him that they may have his spirit to be with them . amen . moroni chapter moroni and now i speak concern baptism . behold elder priest and teacher be baptize and they be not baptize save they bring forth fruit meet that they be worthy of it . moroni neither do they receive any unto baptism save they come forth with a broken heart and a contrite spirit and witness unto the church that they truly repent of all their sin . moroni and none be receive unto baptism save they take upon them the name of christ have a determination to serve him to the end . moroni and after they have be receive unto baptism and be work upon and cleanse by the power of the holy ghost they be number among the people of the church of christ and their name be take that they might be remember and nourish by the good word of god to keep them in the right way to keep them continually watchful unto prayer rely alone upon the merit of christ who be the author and the finisher of their faith . moroni and the church do meet together oft to fast and to pray and to speak one with another concern the welfare of their soul . moroni and they do meet together oft to partake of bread and wine in remembrance of the lord jesus . moroni and they be strict to observe that there should be no iniquity among them and whoso be find to commit iniquity and three witness of the church do condemn them before the elder and if they repent not and confess not their name be blot out and they be not number among the people of christ . moroni but as oft a they repent and seek forgiveness with real intent they be forgive . moroni and their meeting be conduct by the church after the manner of the working of the spirit and by the power of the holy ghost for a the power of the holy ghost lead them whether to preach or to exhort or to pray or to supplicate or to sing even so it be do . moroni chapter moroni and now i moroni write a few of the word of my father mormon which he spake concern faith hope and charity for after this manner do he speak unto the people a he teach them in the synagogue which they have build for the place of worship . moroni and now i mormon speak unto you my beloved brother and it be by the grace of god the father and our lord jesus christ and his holy will because of the gift of his call unto me that i be permit to speak unto you at this time . moroni wherefore i would speak unto you that be of the church that be the peaceable follower of christ and that have obtain a sufficient hope by which ye can enter into the rest of the lord from this time henceforth until ye shall rest with him in heaven . moroni and now my brother i judge these thing of you because of your peaceable walk with the child of men . moroni for i remember the word of god which saith by their work ye shall know them for if their work be good then they be good also . moroni for behold god hath say a man be evil can not do that which be good for if he offereth a gift or prayeth unto god except he shall do it with real intent it profiteth him nothing . moroni for behold it be not count unto him for righteousness . moroni for behold if a man be evil giveth a gift he doeth it grudgingly wherefore it be count unto him the same a if he have retain the gift wherefore he be count evil before god . moroni and likewise also be it count evil unto a man if he shall pray and not with real intent of heart yea and it profiteth him nothing for god receiveth none such . moroni wherefore a man be evil can not do that which be good neither will he give a good gift . moroni for behold a bitter fountain can not bring forth good water neither can a good fountain bring forth bitter water wherefore a man be a servant of the devil can not follow christ and if he follow christ he can not be a servant of the devil . moroni wherefore all thing which be good cometh of god and that which be evil cometh of the devil for the devil be an enemy unto god and fighteth against him continually and inviteth and enticeth to sin and to do that which be evil continually . moroni but behold that which be of god inviteth and enticeth to do good continually wherefore every thing which inviteth and enticeth to do good and to love god and to serve him be inspire of god . moroni wherefore take heed my beloved brother that ye do not judge that which be evil to be of god or that which be good and of god to be of the devil . moroni for behold my brother it be give unto you to judge that ye may know good from evil and the way to judge be as plain that ye may know with a perfect knowledge a the daylight be from the dark night . moroni for behold the spirit of christ be give to every man that he may know good from evil wherefore i show unto you the way to judge for every thing which inviteth to do good and to persuade to believe in christ be send forth by the power and gift of christ wherefore ye may know with a perfect knowledge it be of god . moroni but whatsoever thing persuadeth men to do evil and believe not in christ and deny him and serve not god then ye may know with a perfect knowledge it be of the devil for after this manner doth the devil work for he persuadeth no man to do good no not one neither do his angel neither do they who subject themselves unto him . moroni and now my brother see that ye know the light by which ye may judge which light be the light of christ see that ye do not judge wrongfully for with that same judgment which ye judge ye shall also be judge . moroni wherefore i beseech of you brethren that ye should search diligently in the light of christ that ye may know good from evil and if ye will lay hold upon every good thing and condemn it not ye certainly will be a child of christ . moroni and now my brother how be it possible that ye can lay hold upon every good thing ? moroni and now i come to that faith of which i say i would speak and i will tell you the way whereby ye may lay hold on every good thing . moroni for behold god know all thing be from everlasting to everlasting behold he send angel to minister unto the child of men to make manifest concern the come of christ and in christ there should come every good thing . moroni and god also declare unto prophet by his own mouth that christ should come . moroni and behold there be diver way that he do manifest thing unto the child of men which be good and all thing which be good cometh of christ otherwise men be fall and there could no good thing come unto them . moroni wherefore by the ministering of angel and by every word which proceed forth out of the mouth of god men begin to exercise faith in christ and thus by faith they do lay hold upon every good thing and thus it be until the come of christ . moroni and after that he come men also be save by faith in his name and by faith they become the son of god . and as sure a christ liveth he spake these word unto our father say whatsoever thing ye shall ask the father in my name which be good in faith believing that ye shall receive behold it shall be do unto you . moroni wherefore my beloved brother have miracle cease because christ hath ascend into heaven and hath sit down on the right hand of god to claim of the father his right of mercy which he hath upon the child of men ? moroni for he hath answer the end of the law and he claimeth all those who have faith in him and they who have faith in him will cleave unto every good thing wherefore he advocateth the cause of the child of men and he dwelleth eternally in the heaven . moroni and because he hath do this my beloved brother have miracle cease ? behold i say unto you nay neither have angel cease to minister unto the child of men . moroni for behold they be subject unto him to minister accord to the word of his command show themselves unto them of strong faith and a firm mind in every form of godliness . moroni and the office of their ministry be to call men unto repentance and to fulfill and to do the work of the covenant of the father which he hath make unto the child of men to prepare the way among the child of men by declare the word of christ unto the chosen vessel of the lord that they may bear testimony of him . moroni and by so do the lord god prepareth the way that the residue of men may have faith in christ that the holy ghost may have place in their heart accord to the power thereof and after this manner bringeth to pass the father the covenant which he hath make unto the child of men . moroni and christ hath say if ye will have faith in me ye shall have power to do whatsoever thing be expedient in me . moroni and he hath say repent all ye end of the earth and come unto me and be baptize in my name and have faith in me that ye may be save . moroni and now my beloved brother if this be the case that these thing be true which i have speak unto you and god will show unto you with power and great glory at the last day that they be true and if they be true have the day of miracle cease ? moroni or have angel cease to appear unto the child of men ? or have he withhold the power of the holy ghost from them ? or will he so long a time shall last or the earth shall stand or there shall be one man upon the face thereof to be save ? moroni behold i say unto you nay for it be by faith that miracle be wrought and it be by faith that angels appear and minister unto men wherefore if these thing have cease wo be unto the child of men for it be because of unbelief and all be vain . moroni for no man can be save accord to the word of christ save they shall have faith in his name wherefore if these thing have cease then have faith cease also and awful be the state of man for they be a though there have be no redemption make . moroni but behold my beloved brother i judge good thing of you for i judge that ye have faith in christ because of your meekness for if ye have not faith in him then ye be not fit to be number among the people of his church . moroni and again my beloved brother i would speak unto you concern hope . how be it that ye can attain unto faith save ye shall have hope ? moroni and what be it that ye shall hope for ? behold i say unto you that ye shall have hope through the atonement of christ and the power of his resurrection to be raise unto life eternal and this because of your faith in him accord to the promise . moroni wherefore if a man have faith he must need have hope for without faith there can not be any hope . moroni and again behold i say unto you that he can not have faith and hope save he shall be meek and lowly of heart . moroni if so his faith and hope be vain for none be acceptable before god save the meek and lowly in heart and if a man be meek and lowly in heart and confesses by the power of the holy ghost that jesus be the christ he must need have charity for if he have not charity he be nothing wherefore he must need have charity . moroni and charity suffereth long and be kind and envieth not and be not puff up seeketh not her own be not easily provoke thinketh no evil and rejoiceth not in iniquity but rejoiceth in the truth beareth all thing believeth all thing hopeth all thing endureth all thing . moroni wherefore my beloved brother if ye have not charity ye be nothing for charity never faileth . wherefore cleave unto charity which be the great of all for all thing must fail moroni but charity be the pure love of christ and it endureth forever and whoso be find possessed of it at the last day it shall be well with him . moroni wherefore my beloved brother pray unto the father with all the energy of heart that ye may be fill with this love which he hath bestow upon all who be true follower of his son jesus christ that ye may become the son of god that when he shall appear we shall be like him for we shall see him a he be that we may have this hope that we may be purify even a he be pure . amen . moroni chapter moroni an epistle of my father mormon write to me moroni and it be write unto me soon after my call to the ministry . and on this wise do he write unto me say moroni my beloved son moroni i rejoice exceedingly that your lord jesus christ hath be mindful of you and hath call you to his ministry and to his holy work . moroni i be mindful of you always in my prayer continually pray unto god the father in the name of his holy child jesus that he through his infinite goodness and grace will keep you through the endurance of faith on his name to the end . moroni and now my son i speak unto you concern that which grieveth me exceedingly for it grieveth me that there should disputation rise among you . moroni for if i have learn the truth there have be disputation among you concern the baptism of your little child . moroni and now my son i desire that ye should labor diligently that this gross error should be remove from among you for for this intent i have write this epistle . moroni for immediately after i have learn these thing of you i inquire of the lord concern the matter . and the word of the lord come to me by the power of the holy ghost say moroni listen to the word of christ your redeemer your lord and your god . behold i come into the world not to call the righteous but sinner to repentance the whole need no physician but they that be sick wherefore little child be whole for they be not capable of commit sin wherefore the curse of adam be take from them in me that it hath no power over them and the law of circumcision be do away in me . moroni and after this manner do the holy ghost manifest the word of god unto me wherefore my beloved son i know that it be solemn mockery before god that ye should baptize little child . moroni behold i say unto you that this thing shall ye teach repentance and baptism unto those who be accountable and capable of commit sin yea teach parent that they must repent and be baptize and humble themselves a their little child and they shall all be save with their little child . moroni and their little child need no repentance neither baptism . behold baptism be unto repentance to the fulfil the commandment unto the remission of sin . moroni but little child be alive in christ even from the foundation of the world if not so god be a partial god and also a changeable god and a respecter to person for how many little child have die without baptism ! moroni wherefore if little child could not be save without baptism these must have go to an endless hell . moroni behold i say unto you that he that supposeth that little child need baptism be in the gall of bitterness and in the bond of iniquity for he hath neither faith hope nor charity wherefore should he be cut off while in the thought he must go down to hell . moroni for awful be the wickedness to suppose that god saveth one child because of baptism and the other must perish because he hath no baptism . moroni wo be unto them that shall pervert the way of the lord after this manner for they shall perish except they repent . behold i speak with boldness have authority from god and i fear not what man can do for perfect love casteth out all fear . moroni and i be fill with charity which be everlasting love wherefore all child be alike unto me wherefore i love little child with a perfect love and they be all alike and partaker of salvation . moroni for i know that god be not a partial god neither a changeable be but he be unchangeable from all eternity to all eternity . moroni little child can not repent wherefore it be awful wickedness to deny the pure mercy of god unto them for they be all alive in him because of his mercy . moroni and he that saith that little child need baptism denieth the mercy of christ and setteth at naught the atonement of him and the power of his redemption . moroni wo unto such for they be in danger of death hell and an endless torment . i speak it boldly god hath command me . listen unto them and give heed or they stand against you at the judgment seat of christ . moroni for behold that all little child be alive in christ and also all they that be without the law . for the power of redemption cometh on all them that have no law wherefore he that be not condemn or he that be under no condemnation can not repent and unto such baptism availeth nothing moroni but it be mockery before god deny the mercy of christ and the power of his holy spirit and put trust in dead work . moroni behold my son this thing ought not to be for repentance be unto them that be under condemnation and under the curse of a broken law . moroni and the first fruit of repentance be baptism and baptism cometh by faith unto the fulfil the commandment and the fulfil the commandment bringeth remission of sin moroni and the remission of sin bringeth meekness and lowliness of heart and because of meekness and lowliness of heart cometh the visitation of the holy ghost which comforter filleth with hope and perfect love which love endureth by diligence unto prayer until the end shall come when all the saint shall dwell with god . moroni behold my son i will write unto you again if i go not out soon against the lamanites . behold the pride of this nation or the people of the nephites hath prove their destruction except they should repent . moroni pray for them my son that repentance may come unto them . but behold i fear l the spirit hath cease strive with them and in this part of the land they be also seek to put down all power and authority which cometh from god and they be deny the holy ghost . moroni and after reject so great a knowledge my son they must perish soon unto the fulfilling of the prophecy which be speak by the prophet as well a the word of our savior himself . moroni farewell my son until i shall write unto you or shall meet you again . amen . moroni chapter moroni my beloved son i write unto you again that ye may know that i be yet alive but i write somewhat of that which be grievous . moroni for behold i have have a sore battle with the lamanites in which we do not conquer and archeantus have fall by the sword and also luram and emron yea and we have lose a great number of our choice men . moroni and now behold my son i fear lest the lamanites shall destroy this people for they do not repent and satan stirreth them up continually to anger one with another . moroni behold i be labor with them continually and when i speak the word of god with sharpness they tremble and anger against me and when i use no sharpness they harden their heart against it wherefore i fear l the spirit of the lord hath cease strive with them . moroni for so exceedingly do they anger that it seemeth me that they have no fear of death and they have lose their love one towards another and they thirst after blood and revenge continually . moroni and now my beloved son notwithstanding their hardness let u labor diligently for if we should cease to labor we should be bring under condemnation for we have a labor to perform whilst in this tabernacle of clay that we may conquer the enemy of all righteousness and rest our soul in the kingdom of god . moroni and now i write somewhat concern the suffering of this people . for accord to the knowledge which i have receive from amoron behold the lamanites have many prisoner which they take from the tower of sherrizah and there be men woman and child . moroni and the husband and father of those woman and child they have slay and they fee the woman upon the flesh of their husband and the child upon the flesh of their father and no water save a little do they give unto them . moroni and notwithstanding this great abomination of the lamanites it doth not exceed that of our people in moriantum . for behold many of the daughter of the lamanites have they take prisoner and after deprive them of that which be most dear and precious above all thing which be chastity and virtue moroni and after they have do this thing they do murder them in a most cruel manner torture their body even unto death and after they have do this they devour their flesh like unto wild beast because of the hardness of their heart and they do it for a token of bravery . moroni o my beloved son how can a people like this that be without civilization moroni and only a few year have pass away and they be a civil and a delightsome people moroni but o my son how can a people like this whose delight be in so much abomination moroni how can we expect that god will stay his hand in judgment against u ? moroni behold my heart cry wo unto this people . come out in judgment o god and hide their sin and wickedness and abomination from before thy face ! moroni and again my son there be many widow and their daughter who remain in sherrizah and that part of the provision which the lamanites do not carry away behold the army of zenephi have carry away and leave them to wander whithersoever they can for food and many old woman do faint by the way and die . moroni and the army which be with me be weak and the army of the lamanites be betwixt sherrizah and me and as many a have flee to the army of aaron have fall victim to their awful brutality . moroni o the depravity of my people ! they be without order and without mercy . behold i be but a man and i have but the strength of a man and i can not any longer enforce my command . moroni and they have become strong in their perversion and they be alike brutal spar none neither old nor young and they delight in everything save that which be good and the suffering of our woman and our child upon all the face of this land doth exceed everything yea tongue can not tell neither can it be write . moroni and now my son i dwell no longer upon this horrible scene . behold thou knowest the wickedness of this people thou knowest that they be without principle and past feeling and their wickedness doth exceed that of the lamanites . moroni behold my son i can not recommend them unto god l he should smite me . moroni but behold my son i recommend thee unto god and i trust in christ that thou wilt be save and i pray unto god that he will spare thy life to witness the return of his people unto him or their utter destruction for i know that they must perish except they repent and return unto him . moroni and if they perish it will be like unto the jaredites because of the wilfulness of their heart seek for blood and revenge . moroni and if it so be that they perish we know that many of our brother have desert over unto the lamanites and many more will also desert over unto them wherefore write somewhat a few thing if thou art spar and i shall perish and not see thee but i trust that i may see thee soon for i have sacred record that i would deliver up unto thee . moroni my son be faithful in christ and may not the thing which i have write grieve thee to weigh thee down unto death but may christ lift thee up and may his suffering and death and the show his body unto our father and his mercy and long suffering and the hope of his glory and of eternal life rest in your mind forever . moroni and may the grace of god the father whose throne be high in the heaven and our lord jesus christ who sitteth on the right hand of his power until all thing shall become subject unto him be and abide with you forever . amen . moroni chapter moroni now i moroni write somewhat a seemeth me good and i write unto my brother the lamanites and i would that they should know that more than four hundred and twenty year have pass away since the sign be give of the come of christ . moroni and i seal up these record after i have speak a few word by way of exhortation unto you . moroni behold i would exhort you that when ye shall read these thing if it be wisdom in god that ye should read them that ye would remember how merciful the lord hath be unto the child of men from the creation of adam even down unto the time that ye shall receive these thing and ponder it in your heart . moroni and when ye shall receive these thing i would exhort you that ye would ask god the eternal father in the name of christ if these thing be not true and if ye shall ask with a sincere heart with real intent have faith in christ he will manifest the truth of it unto you by the power of the holy ghost . moroni and by the power of the holy ghost ye may know the truth of all thing . moroni and whatsoever thing be good be just and true wherefore nothing that be good denieth the christ but acknowledgeth that he be . moroni and ye may know that he be by the power of the holy ghost wherefore i would exhort you that ye deny not the power of god for he worketh by power accord to the faith of the child of men the same today and tomorrow and forever . moroni and again i exhort you my brother that ye deny not the gift of god for they be many and they come from the same god . and there be different way that these gift be administer but it be the same god who worketh all in all and they be give by the manifestation of the spirit of god unto men to profit them . moroni for behold to one be give by the spirit of god that he may teach the word of wisdom moroni and to another that he may teach the word of knowledge by the same spirit moroni and to another exceedingly great faith and to another the gift of healing by the same spirit moroni and again to another that he may work mighty miracle moroni and again to another that he may prophesy concern all thing moroni and again to another the beholding of angel and minister spirit moroni and again to another all kind of tongue moroni and again to another the interpretation of language and of diver kind of tongue . moroni and all these gift come by the spirit of christ and they come unto every man severally accord a he will . moroni and i would exhort you my beloved brother that ye remember that every good gift cometh of christ . moroni and i would exhort you my beloved brother that ye remember that he be the same yesterday today and forever and that all these gift of which i have speak which be spiritual never will be do away even as long a the world shall stand only accord to the unbelief of the child of men . moroni wherefore there must be faith and if there must be faith there must also be hope and if there must be hope there must also be charity . moroni and except ye have charity ye can in nowise be save in the kingdom of god neither can ye be save in the kingdom of god if ye have not faith neither can ye if ye have no hope . moroni and if ye have no hope ye must need be in despair and despair cometh because of iniquity . moroni and christ truly say unto our father if ye have faith ye can do all thing which be expedient unto me . moroni and now i speak unto all the end of the earth that if the day cometh that the power and gift of god shall be do away among you it shall be because of unbelief . moroni and wo be unto the child of men if this be the case for there shall be none that doeth good among you no not one . for if there be one among you that doeth good he shall work by the power and gift of god . moroni and wo unto them who shall do these thing away and die for they die in their sin and they can not be save in the kingdom of god and i speak it accord to the word of christ and i lie not . moroni and i exhort you to remember these thing for the time speedily cometh that ye shall know that i lie not for ye shall see me at the bar of god and the lord god will say unto you do i not declare my word unto you which be write by this man like a one cry from the dead yea even a one speak out of the dust ? moroni i declare these thing unto the fulfilling of the prophecy . and behold they shall proceed forth out of the mouth of the everlasting god and his word shall hiss forth from generation to generation . moroni and god shall show unto you that that which i have write be true . moroni and again i would exhort you that ye would come unto christ and lay hold upon every good gift and touch not the evil gift nor the unclean thing . moroni and awake and arise from the dust o jerusalem yea and put on thy beautiful garment o daughter of zion and strengthen thy stake and enlarge thy border forever that thou mayest no more be confound that the covenant of the eternal father which he hath make unto thee o house of israel may be fulfil . moroni yea come unto christ and be perfect in him and deny yourselves of all ungodliness and if ye shall deny yourselves of all ungodliness and love god with all your might mind and strength then be his grace sufficient for you that by his grace ye may be perfect in christ and if by the grace of god ye be perfect in christ ye can in nowise deny the power of god . moroni and again if ye by the grace of god be perfect in christ and deny not his power then be ye sanctify in christ by the grace of god through the shedding of the blood of christ which be in the covenant of the father unto the remission of your sin that ye become holy without spot . moroni and now i bid unto all farewell . i soon go to rest in the paradise of god until my spirit and body shall again reunite and i be brought forth triumphant through the air to meet you before the please bar of the great jehovah the eternal judge of both quick and dead . amen .
